haṅanakǝn brata, dīrgghā yuṣa paripurṇna, riṅ dlāha, mandadi ratu viśeṣā, hayva cavuh yan kalaniṅ ābrattta, tlas, smā, tabrataṅkǝna mravani siṅ pravani, Uttamā dahat, tuhvā gana ta ya bharaṭā, byakta tuṣṭātmakāsaṅ pitārannirā, təka rīṅ kaki buyutira suka, nītya sukātmaka vaneh, Ika ta den agatiniṅ amaṅun ayuniṅ śarīrātma.

§III.65 hana brata hadyus hanuṅku rāt, ṅa, yan riṅ śravaṇā maṣā, hadyusā davuh, 7, pisan riṅ sore, pha, hulun masihi ri kita. yan riṅ bhadravadā, hadyusā davuh, 4, pha, kasubhaganuṅku rāt. yaniṅ hasuji, hadyusā dhavuh, 5, pha, sarva salaka tkā|| yaniṅ karttikā, hadyusā dhavuh, 8, riṅ rātri, pha, bahuputra. yan riṅ margghā sira, hadyusā davuh, 4, riṅ rātri, pha, prabhu masih. yaniṅ poṣya maśa, hadyusa davuh, 6, sore, pha, viryyavan|| yaniṅ maghā maṣā, hadyusa davuh, 8, vaṅun rahina juga, pha, sugih pari. yaniṅ phalguṇa maṣā, hadyusā davuh, 2, rahina, pha, bhoga gə̄ṅ katәmu. yaniṅ cetra maśa, madyusa davuh, 3, rahina, pha, devā [13 r] masih sarva kāryanta siddha. yaniṅ veśaka maṣā, madyusa dhavuh, 4, pha, laraniṅāti hilaṅ. yaniṅ jyeṣṭā, hadyusā dhavuh, 4, pha, siṅ kāryanta katəkan. yaniṅ hasaddha maśa, madyusā davuh, 7, pha, hañjrahakǝn mās pirak, maṅkāna kramanya. Itī śarīra śuddha, bhūmi socca, ṅa.

§III.66 hana brata ṅulante, ṅa, hamilan vulan, kaṣa, tan pamaṅan sarva buṅkah, pha, dadi sarva tinandur. vulan, 2, tan pamaṅan sapi, pha, sugih sapi, tan kagǝriṅǝn,. vulan, 3, tan pamaṅañ celeṅ, pha, sugih vvit, tan gǝriṅ āguṅ, halaṅ halaṅ. vulan, 4, tan pamaṅam sarva roṇḍon, pha, dadi sarva rumambat, sarva gumantuṅ. vulan, 5, tan patukar, tan panǝmbuṅ rare cili, pha, keḍәp havkasa paṅūcapta. vulan, 6, tan paluluṅha, tulak vali, yen luṅha, pha, sugih kavulā,vrәddhi kabeh tur ākeh. vulan, 7, tan pamaṅan sәga, pha, sugih pari, tan kakuraṅan tajak. vulan, 8, haja maṅan [13 v] suku phat, pha, sugih drәvve sarvǝ vdha. vulan, 9, haja maṅan āñjiṅ, pha, hapkik tan pahes. vulan, 10, tan tumṅeṅ tavaṅ, pha, prajñan kita. vulan, jyeṣṭa, tan pamaṅan garәm, pha, sugih bhūmi, tan ilaṅ takonakna, tur keḍәp kapintuhu. vulan, saddhā, tan paturū lavan strī, histri tan paturu lavan lanaṅ, pha, drәmmam halaki, kinasihaniṅ lanaṅ, lanaṅ kinasihaniṅ vadon, tur keḍәp sapaṅucapta.

§III.67 nihan hajī tutug kavruhakna, pūrṇamaniṅ kaṣa, saṅ hyaṅ hamurvva bhuvaṅna, pinaka bala, hasih ri pinakeṅ huluṅ|| purṅnamaniṅ karo, saṅ hyaṅ madhuśuddhaṇā, pinaka babu, hasih ri pinakeṅ hulun. pūrṇamaniṅ katiga, saṅ hyaṅ madhu kusuma, pinakavakiṅ hulun listvayuparipurṇna, drәmman keḍәp puruṣā viśeṣa, prajñan vicakṣaṇā, suka sugih. pūrṇamaniṅ kapat, saṅ hyaṅ āsmara pinaka lakiniṅ hulun, hapkik prajurit vicakṣaṇā, puruṣā viśeṣa, prajñan suka sugih jayeṅ śatru, hasih [14 r] pinakeṅ hulun|| pūrṇamaniṅ kalimā, saṅ hyaṅ manobhava, pinakā hanakiṅ hulun, panǝṅgǝk lanaṅ, hapkikprajurit hasih pinakeṅ hulun. purṇnamāniṅ kanǝm, saṅ hyaṅ hantanū, pinaka sanakiṅ hulun lanaṅ, paṅgulu, suka sugih, hasih pinakeṅ hulun. purṇmaniṅ kapitu, saṅ hyaṅ kama jaya, pinakā sanakiṅ hulun lanaṅ panṅah, hasih pinakeṅ hulun. pūrṇamaniṅ kavolu, saṅ hyaṅ kamā ratih pinaka sanakiṅ hulun lanaṅ vuruju, suka sugih hasih ri pinakeṅ hulun|| pūrṇamaniṅ kasaṅha, saṅ hyaṅ kumarā, pinakā kṣanā , dukiṅ hulun hāpapaṅanten pinaslaṅ. pūrṇamaniṅ kaśapuluh, saṅ hyaṅ hamadhapā, samanā dukiṅ hulun ābobot. pūrṇamaniṅ jyeṣṭā, saṅ hyaṅ kumara, pinakā hanak lanaṅ pambayun, hapkik prajurit, hasihiṅ pinakeṅ hulun, puruṣā viśeṣā, prajñan vicakṣaṇā, jayeṅ śatru, hahidhǝpinakeṅ hulun. pūrṇamaniṅ hasaddhā, saṅ hyaṅ komari, pinakā hanak vadon paṅgu [14 v] ṅgulu, listvasyu paripurṇnā, dhrәman keḍәp, puruṣa viśeṣā, prajñan vicakṣaṇā, hahidhǝpinakeṅ hulun. phalaniṅ hulun āṅajī tutug, haṅavruhākǝn hanutuga bapa, hababu, tutugā malakya rabi, hanak ānak tutugā sanak, tutugākaki hanini, tutugāputu habuyut, tumus riṅ tǝmbe, habagus kalavanāyu, paripurṅnā, drәman keḍәp, suka sugih, śrī sadanā, mās maṇik, dodot lәmǝs, hakveh daśih , vәnaṅ vәnaṅ hasuku pat, hasuku ro, sugih tanyakna hiren, siddha saprayojñaṇā, siddha salampah salaku, lǝvih kapaṅgih riṅ tǝmbe pañjanman, lәvih kapaṅgih maṅke, bhagavan pañarikan hanulisākǝn, saṅ hyaṅ triyodaśa sākṣi hanakṣeni, bhaṭāra hyaṅ kabayan hañjǝnǝṅi.

§III.68 nihan kramaniṅ habrata riṅ śaśih, ka, 4, riṅpraṭipadā śukla, caru suci riṅ saṅgar, sadaṇdhanan sovaṅ, riṅ sor pupulāskar sataman, hnahakna riṅ harәpiṅ saṅ amujā, vu [15 r] sniṅ ābhakti, tinirtthan, tәhәr haṅupavaśā, sadinā sarātri, Ikaṅ pupulā mvaṅ skar sataman, tәhәr vvināveṅ paturvan pinajaṅ pajaṅan, mne riṅ dhavuh, 2, təkaniṅ dhavuh, 7, haṅarәpakna labahan sәga pitā, Ivak hitik ginoreṅ sahā sasahur, yan tan ānaniṅ Iṭik, hantiga kunaṅ, garәm, hantajinya, catūr daśa dinā, tan dadi hanapak rigǝd, hasidhǝmpati, ṅa . mne ri pūrṇamaniṅ kapat, yan āhyun āmūjā smarā, hinyasan tikaṅ yaśa riṅ pamarantyan pinajaṅ pajaṅān, huṅgvaniṅ ābrata, yan vala pitambharā, yan vrәddha śvetāmbharā, hamarәm pva saha parāgi, ryuvusniṅ hasuci hadyus, riṅ saṅgar, ca, rvaṅ daṅdhanan deñ jaṅkǝp sahā catur, limas āguṅ, hiseni sәga kuniṅ, hivak hiṭik ginoreṅ, vinaṅgun hurip, gegembon, ṅa, hantiga pinlut, kampuhi cicirupan, tañcǝbi skār tlǝṅ, tumpāṅana riṅ limas āguṅ, tetebhogan hiseni sәga kuniṅ, masasahur, mevak hiṭi [15 v]k ginoreṅ, vinaṅun hurip, lalamaka daluvaṅ, tulisi śvara vyañjana, riṅ hibu dṅǝn, caru madaṇdhanan sovaṅ deñ jaṅkǝp, caru riṅ sumur, tumpə̄ṅ, 1, lalampadan, sasamuhan tadhah pavitra, caru riṅ sor kadi hisiniṅ pasilih, tan kari pupulā, skār sstaman , tlasniṅ caru trapakna sirәmiṅa skār, lumkas dhaṅ gurv amūjā sūryya śevana, kadi ṅrahina, taṅ abhakti sūryya, candrā, saṅgar, Ibu, dhṅǝn, kabasə̄ṅ sumur, tiṅkahiṅ haṅabhakti, dukiṅ sore, tәṅah vәṅi, meh rahinā, vusnīṅ aṅabakti, kinonta dyus āsucya taṅ abrata, tәhәr hiṅaskaran sinaṇdhiṅan pras, tinirtthañ jinaya jaya, tlas.halabuhana brata, padamə̄l, sәga livәt, tiṅkahiṅ āṅlivәt, dhaṅdhaṅ tulisana padmā, vusniṅ ānajeni, syoknīṅ antiga tambhar, tutupi, yan vus matәṅ hnahana muṅgviṅ tapi, jinaya jaya, muvah jaṅan raratusan, sabhageyan molih, 108, vārṇna, paruko tulis padmā, Ikaṅ nasi linivǝt ti [16 r] numpaṅan gaṅan, muvah tumpǝṅ, hisenāna jǝbug ārūm, kaṅ vutuh, sadǝk, duk āṅaroni tinitisan madhu, phān, Ivaknya cārmmaniṅ kәbo yos baraṇā, hiṅǝmbanā don, mvaṅ jǝbug ārūm, sami rincah, tlas, nhǝr tan kneṅ turu, riṅ rahinanya, samaṅkana juga sakottamanya, satutugiṅ reh.kunaṅ phalanya, Ilaṅhikaṅ sarva vyaddhi, sarva duṣṭā, sarva bhāya, sarva bhoga kapaṅguh, kakarṣaṇa rikeṅ rāt, lituhayu paripurṇna, svārgga kapaṅgguh, mvaṅ kaniśreyaśan, dulurāna Ulah rahayu, tan paṅambah laraṅān, matvaṅ riṅ vvaṅātuhā, priyǝmbadā, tan vāk paruṣya, haglə̄m ataṅi, mabrataṅkǝn vei hayu, mvaṅ katpǝtaniṅ kasamyajñanan.

§III.69 madhū parkka tuyat bhakṣaṃ, sarva deva samanvitah, na sthama canarajñatva, sarva deva samānvitaṃ. Ikaṅ devata hana sanidva, ri saṅ hyaṅ madhū parkka, sira juga hidhpan raṣananta, kadilihñca mahādeva, Artthanya, Ikaṅ madhū [16 v] viṣṇu devatanya, air tbhu brahmā devatanya, phan hiśvara devatanya, punti mahādeva devatānya. lavaṇo rudra mityuktaṃ, bhrәmgure sambhu mucyate, patraśvaṣā śivojñeyah, Ityetat devatāsthitah|| hyaṅniṅ Uyah rudra, hyaṅniṅ bhrәm guru, hyaṅniṅ layaṅ sambhu, hyaṅniṅ lvā śiva, nihan taṅ devatā sanidya, hana riṅ madhū parkka. vituh pāpa dahet sarpih, vituh pāpañca madhūkaṃ, svātipāpa dahet kṣiraṃ, gatraṃ pāpaṃ kadalisaṃ. Arthanya, Ilaṅ deniṅ air tbu pāpaniṅ bapa, kavisarjja denya, Ilaṅ deniṅ madhū parkka, pāpaniṅ babu, kavisarjja denya, Ilaṅ deniṅ phan, pāpaniṅ śarīranta, Ilaṅ deniṅ punti, pāpaniṅ vvaṅ sanakta kaḍaṅ varga, kavisarjja denya, mataṅyan kayatnakna deniṅ mantra madhū parkka, mā, Om̐ madhū pakaṃ Idhaṃ puṇyaṅ, pavitraṃ pāpanaśanaṃ, Iśvara nagisaṅśrәṣṭah, punanti sakalañjagat, mam̐, piṅ, 3, mamaṅan, piṅ, [17 r] 3, masucya. saha pūja parikrama karәhǝn, tәhәr haṅupavaśā, vusniṅ pinūja, haṅabhakti kadi haṅabhāktiniṅ habrattā. ṅhadva kadva kādevye namah , pūr, Om̐ kusuma yudā mamakā devye namah , da, Om̐ kadārppa daśa paddha devye namah svāhā, pa, Om̐ manobhava strī mandha devye namah , bā, Om̐ makara dvajamandoratha devye namah svāhā, U, Om̐ mantra tatu bhaṅgā devye namah , ai. Iti saṅ hyaṅ haṣṭa Devî.Om̐ hyaṅ hyaṅniṅ hyaṅ smara deva ya namah, Om̐ Indrā ya namah, Om̐ Om̐ svaṣṭi ya namah . pratyakṣatvamihaloka, mānuṣa tvañca visuka devatvaṃ, sūkṣmatvaṃ sakalatvañca, Atmatvañca śariratvaṅ. Eka rūpañca visuka sadanaṃ, candrā vatsa tetemekaṃ, trei lokya viyosa śakti. Iśvara vara devañca, brahmājāyañja vijayaṃ, mahādeva varatvañca, viṣṇu vijayare vañca. Indra rājaca jayatvaṃ, sarva deva ya ratvañca, sarva de [17v]va Devî tatvaṃ, trelokya sevitantah. citta mani mahendraśca, sarva kumarā rājatvaṅ, kumara rāja sajñaccā, Iṣṭā kamacayaṅ jakaṃ. Aṣṭātanvavi patiñca, Ugra devā ca sajñakaṃ, sarva pāpa haret siddhi, sarva rogha praharaṇaṅ.sarva śatru vinaśanaṃ. smarastavā. nihan kramaniṅ haśeva latri, hasūryya śevana kita rumuhun, kadi sadinā, huvusniṅ hasūryya śevana, mariṅ pamiyosan, haṅarәpakǝn pitā, yan tan hanāniṅ pitā, Ujuṅaniṅ pisaṅ glarәn, sucenā rumuhun, yan hananiṅ liṅga mās, salakā kuniṅ, pūjanǝn pratiṣṭa ri hujuṅaniṅ pisaṅ, makadi riṅ pitā, pūjanǝn riṅ kana, glarāna padmasana saprakāranya, təkaniṅ devā, pratiṣṭā, Utpǝtyakǝn bhaṭāra sakiṅ hrәddhaya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Am̐ Um̐ namah, Idhǝp saṅ hyaṅ muṅgviṅ liṅga, pūjāni vijā caṇdhana, sahā sminiṅ majā, skār kunǝṅ, muvah sthityakna bhaṭāra riṅ liṅgā, yan hananiṅ liṅga mās, salakā, yen ta[18 r]n hana salakā, sariniṅ vaduri piṅhe, gavenǝn liṅgākarā, mantra sthiti, Om̐ Am̐ Um̐ mam̐ namah, pūjani rvaniṅ maja, mvaṅ sarva skar, caṇdhana, vija, sabhagyan pujāniṅ dhupa, dipā, ghaṇṭa, mvaṅ japā ganitri, sahā praṇa yama, saha sǝmbah, liṅanta Om̐ Om̐ liṅgā liṅgā dipatayei namah, haturana gadhakṣata, puṣpa, dhūpā dhipa, mvaṅ caru, rakā vovohan, sәḍah voh, liṅanta haṅaturakǝn, Om̐ Om̐ śiva ni vedyañca rūm dadami, Amrәtta deva caruvedādami, sa ba ta A I, nama śiva ya, A U mā, Om̐.pūjā, piṅ, 3, dukiṅ sore pūrvaka, tәṅah vәṅi, mehniṅ rahina, deniṅ āmūjā, tan kantun mantra, Om̐ Om̐ liṅgā ye namah, Om̐ sadāśivāṅliṅgā ya namah. mehniṅ rahina, Ulihakna sira riṅ anta hrәddhaya, puṇdharikā muvah, liṅanta, Om̐ Atma liṅggā ya namah, Om̐ Om̐ Am̐ mam̐ namah, yekiṅ mantra pralīṇā. Om̐ śiva ya śiva liṅga ya,śiva sarvvo maheśvarah, nama śiva ya deva ya, saddha śi[18 v]va namostute.brahmā viṣṇviśvaro devah, sarvajñā parameśvara, Utpati sthiti linañcah, liṅgā deva namo namah. tuṅgal sthiti sarәpiṅ praliṇā. yen arәp śīva rātri cǝṇdhǝk, liṅanta, Om̐ Om̐ liṅgā liṅgādipataye namah, Om̐ Om̐ Ātma liṅgā ya namah, sǝmbah duk sore, Om̐ Om̐ parama śiva liṅgā ya namah, sǝmbah tәṅah vәṅi, Om̐ Om̐ śunya liṅgā ya namah, sǝmbah meh rahina, sminiṅ maja pinūjakǝn, sthuti tuṅgal, Om̐ nama śiva ya, namo rudra ya, nispadā parvvatā ya , sahā sǝmbah sminiṅ majā kunaṅ. lviriṅ bratayvakna riṅ tamah, tamah harane turū, yatika kavaśakna yva lupā, I kālanta mabrata, hayva juga kita haturu ri rahina, hila hilā, hilaṅ hulihta mabrata, Asiṅ brata hanisphala tan pantukā Asiṅ sinadya, mataṅyan kayatnakna, hayvā himan iman, Ikaṅ tapā brata hagə̄ṅ phalanya, vahya suka katәmu donya, Ikaṅ kayogiśvarān, [19 r] kamokṣan phalanya, mataṅnyan hayo cumacadiṅ sira saṅ lumkasakǝn brata tapā, Ayva memeṅeniṅ vvaṅ abrata, Ila hilā liṅ saṅ hyaṅ.

§III.70 nihan pabratan, haji sariniṅ galuṅān, krama bantǝn ri saṅgar, bantǝn suci hadaṇdhanan, riṅ ibu dhṅǝn, padha mabuṅkul, riṅ toya habuṅkul, mantra paṅatǝr ā-tǝr bakti maṅavaṅi, ma, Om̐ jaya pravira subiṅ rāt, sugih tan pamaṅun gave, muvah hakaravaṅan, habaṅ rūpanira, sārәṅit gə̄ṅira, ya hiku sariniṅ galuṅan, pinakāsamtoniṅ hulun, siṅ tan vruh sariniṅ galuṅan,pinakā kavulaniṅ hulun, sabhūvana, satuṅkǝbiṅ rāt, siṅ haṅavruhi sariniṅ galuṅān, ya pinaka sanakiṅ hulun, pinakā samtoniṅ hulun, sasaṅoniṅ hulun, haṅavruhākǝn sarīniṅ galuṅan, salave lākṣa, salave kṭi, salave hiṅǝl, pinakā pasasaṅoniṅ hulun, katәmu maṅko, katәmu tǝmbe, lǝvih kā [19 v] tmu tǝmbe, mtu salākṣa sadinā, Om̐ sa ba ta A I, nama śiva ya, A U ma Om̐.

§III.71 nihan bratahañarin galuṅān, krama, yan kalaniṅ galuṅān, habantǝn sarimpǝn, saviji sovaṅ, hnahakna ri harәpiṅ saṅgar, kaṅ riṅ saṅgar, kadi kramaniṅ bantǝn kaṅ lagi lagi, kaṅ riṅ ību, kaṅ ri tәṅah, vuhāna burat vaṅi, lṅa vaṅi, mvaṅ bras, 2, catu, harttha, 225, pinūjā saparikrama, taṅābhakti, vusiṅ haṅabhakti, amaṅan sarimpǝn, ryuvusiṅ amaṅan sarimpǝn, amaṅan sakavaśa, pūjaniṅ amaṅan sarimpǝn, Om̐ paduka bhaṭārī sāriniṅ galuṅan, mānuṣanira kinavruhakǝn sāriniṅ galuṅan, haṅisǝp sariniṅ rahina, haṅisǝp sariniṅ vәṅi, haṅisǝp sariniṅ śrī sadanā, haṅisǝp sarva sarī, haṅisǝp sariniṅ rāt bhūvana kabeh, hulun vruhsariniṅ galuṅan, handadi ya bhujaṅgga lәvih, hakaḍaṅā ratu, suka sugih śarīraniṅ hulun, hanakāna keḍәp, [20r] haputu habuyut, tumus tumǝrus, təkaniṅ hanak putu buyutiṅ hulun, katəkana sapinakṣāniṅhulun, saṅ hyaṅ triyodaśa sakṣi, Anakṣeniṅ hulun, phalanya, siṅ karyyānta hanmu hayu, kinasihan deniṅ bhūṭā dṅǝn, mvaṅ jnǝk sahisiniṅ pomahan.

§III.72 hana bratasusukan, ṅa, riṅ pūrṇamaniṅ kapitu, piṅ, 7, sarahina, piṅ 7, savәṅi, amaṅan āṅinūm, haṅigə̄l, bhaṭāra kapitu maveh brata, pha, suka sugih, hanak amitra, dirgghāyuṣā, keḍәp kapituhu.

§III.73 hana brata dinulaṅ riṅ lek pituṅ lek samayanya, pha, kinasihaniṅ rāt.

§III.74 hana brata malaṅlek denya maṅan, denya ṅǝpǝl, pituṅ lek samayanya, pha, subhaga kinasihaniṅ histrī.

§III.75 hana brata mahucandrā, ṅa, sabran masocca yen masi phat, ṅūniveh buda Irәṅ, mvaṅ dite manis, ṅūniveh sari sarikna, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik badhe hyaṅnya, satahun tigaṅ lek ṣa [20 v] mayanya, pha, masih saṅ hyaṅ candrāditya, tan lamūr kkatonā hayu, mvaṅ pinicadhaṅ.

§III.76 hana brata ṅlintaṅ, ṅa, tan pamaṅan, yan tan mtu lintaṅ pipitu sanak, lama tәṅah śaśih, pha, sugih dlāha, turūpānta tan ākusut.

§III.77 hana brata, sore amaṅan vus āpasaṅ sande juga, brata tan pasuluh, ṅa, ya pinaka rūpā, [pinakārūpā], pinaka vuvusīṅ padha vvaṅ, pha, sīm sadyanta katəkan.

§III.78 hana brata tan pamaṅan dhavuh tlu, tan paṅinaṅ tan paṅinūm vvai, lamun huvusiṅ dhavuh tiga, vәnaṅ haṅinaṅ amaṅan āṅinūm, satahun divasanya, pha, sugih bhuvana, tur apkik kaṅ rūpā.

§III.79 hana brata, amaṅan naṅkǝn dhavuh tlu, amaṅan, haṅinūm, kavaśa haṅinaṅ, pha, suka sugih, sdhǝṅ ānom, hanulus riṅ niskalā.

§III.80 hana brata, ṅayu , ṅa, tan pamaṅan tatəkalaniṅ saṅeṅe kulon, mvaṅ sakihupiṅ hyaṅ prabhaṅkara, satahun samayanya, hyaṅ prabhaṅkāra hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, hevanā mamūkti, siddha sā [21r] prayojñananta .

§III.81 hana brata, amaṅan riṅ paturon, sdhǝṅ kumarañcaṅ sǝṅeṅe, pha, drәman halāki.

§III.82 hana brata haṅǝṅbaṅ sabran manis, sarva kǝmbhaṅ kiṅumpulākǝn, lavan huyah harәṅ, suruh pupucuk, yen amaṅan riṅ paturon, marәpiṅ ulon, yan amaṅan dhavuh pisan, pha, pkik hakeh ūlaṅunakǝna yen istri haṅulahakǝn , drәman halaki, kinasihan riṅ paturon, marәpiṅ hulon hyen amaṅan.

§III.83 hana brata hantara bakta , ṅa, amaṅan kala tṅaṅe , yaniṅ vәṅi sdhǝṅ sirәpiṅ voṅ, limaṅ lek lavasanya , pha, tisan kuras, suka gə̄ṅ de saṅ paṇḍita.

§III.84 hana brata, hañjaya , ṅa, tan pamaṅan yan liṅsir, satahun pituṅ dinā lavasanya, saṅ hyaṅ krәtta bhuvana hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, krәtta kaṅ rāt, manuh kaṅ prәmana , siddhi kanisihan deniṅ hyaṅ, kineriṅan deniṅ sarva galak.

§III.85 hana brata nrus tuñjuṅ , ṅa, yanīm pūrṇamaniṅ ka pitu, hadyus, piṅ, 7, sarahina, piṅ, [21v] 7, savәṅi, yan paṅloṅ, piṅ, 14, haśeva latri, hacaru suci sadaṇdhanan, bhaṭāra guru hyaṅniṅ brattā, pha, savighnānta hilaṅ, tūr kinasihan deniṅ bhuṭā dhṅǝn, kinasihaniṅ tuhvan mvaṅ samanta janma.

§III.86 hana brata, nrus tuñjuṅ, ṅa, haturu haṅādǝg savәṅi, bhaṭāra śiva maveh brata, pha, śakti, sasarnya dadi rātū, sugih tan hilaṅ takonakna, magǝh deśa, nora voṅ siddhi gave.

§III.87 hana brata nrus tuñjuṅ, ṅa, ri taṅgal kapiṅ limaniṅ kapitu, hamati ghni, nhǝr tan kneṅ paṅan turu, sarahina, savәṅi, bhaṭāra hasih prāṇa hyaṅiṅ brata, pha, śakti, hamupu sariniṅ brata kabeh.

§III.88 hana brata nrus tuñjuṅ, ṅa, madyus piṅ tiga savәṅi, piṅ pitu sarahinā, yan aturu sumaṇḍah, pha, vruh saguṇaniṅ voṅ kabeh, hapkik tan āna madhani, turr prajurit pinaka huluniṅ sajagat.

§III.89 hana brata, nrus tuñjuṅ, ṅa, hadyus piṅ tiga savәṅi, piṅ tiga sarahina, tan paturu gumuliṅ, suma [22 r] ndah vәnaṅ, satahun divasanya, pha, vruh satata guṇaniṅ voṅ kabeh, prajurit hapkik tanāna madani, pinakā huluniṅ sañjatā, savārṇnaniṅ bhūvana norana madā, sanuṣantarā kabeh tumiṅhal iṅ sira.

§III.90 hana brata, nrus tuñjuṅ, ṅa, madyus piṅ pitu sarahinā, piṅ pitu savәṅi, pha, listuhayu paripurṇna, kaṅgapiṅ ratu, kinasihan deniṅ saṅ paṇḍita.

§III.91 hana brata, nrus tuñjuṅ, ṅa, hadus, piṅ, 7, sarahina, mvaṅ riṅ vәṅi, hasisirih kita, naṅkǝn vulan aguṅ, pha, vruh tan āga saparipolahta, bhūvana geger tumon hiri kita.

§III.92 hana brata trisandya, ṅa, amaṅan tigaṅ kpǝl, sarahinā, tigaṅ tahun samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ listvayu paripurṇna, suka magə̄ṅ.

§III.93 hana brata, trisaddhya, ṅa, madyus piṅ tiga sarahina, mvaṅ riṅ vәṅi, vusiṅ hadyus hasusurā, masiphatā, pituṅ lek samayanya, pha, mulih mari kendran, sasarnya mandā [22 v] di vvaṅ listvayu paripurṇna prajñan.

§III.94 hana brata, kraca dyus, ṅa, hadyusarahina vәṅi, lǝṅa siphatnya, pha, svarga mantuk riṅ kendrān, majanma vicakṣaṇa hanulus, tur anom apkik kalah āla.

§III.95 hana brata, amaṅan sarva mǝntah, bhaghavan haṅgaṣṭi hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, dadi deva, sasarnya dadi ratu, kinasihaniṅ hyaṅ, prajurit haṅalahakǝn [śatru] kabeh, norana madanāna , tan kna seha brata.

§III.96 hana brata hasuci lakṣaṇa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan hyan duruṅ ārarahup¸ halǝṅa, pha, hapkikerәṅan, saparipolihiṅ abrata, lәvǝsiṅ rambut, hasdhǝpiṅ paṅūcap, mvaṅ rūpā.

§III.97 hana brata, nuci lākṣaṇa, ṅa, amaṅan āhes karuhun, pha, kerәṅan saparipolahtā, halit arampiṅ, drәmman alaki.

§III.98 hana brata, mavastra śuddhamalā, mantranya, Om̐ śuddha pāpa, śuddha malā, 3, śuddha śuddha pinariśudā, śuddha śuddha pinarivastu. phalanya, hilaṅ malā patakā, [23r]pāpa kalesanta, samayanya kaṅ brata, tigaṅ daśa dinā, hanambut riṅ tīlǝm, hasalah riṅ tīlǝm, hasalah brata, sahā skar rvaniṅ śuddha malā, ptekakna rvanya, mañomponi petaṅan mantranyā.

§III.99 hana brata, yan taṅgal piṅ, 1, taṅgal piṅ, 2, taṅgal piṅ, 3, hakambǝn śudāmalā, havastra sacci, yan vus ālabahan, pha, rūpānta lañjar, hapkik paripurṇna, yan lanaṅ habrata, kalamar deniṅ histri, yan istri, kalamar deniṅ kakūṅ, handaka rūpā haraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.100 hana brata malahāra, ṅa, yan amaṅan maṅgis, dūryyan, sakalviriṅ vovohan, tigaṅ lek samayanya, pha, mantuk mariṅ svarga bhaṭāra guru, mvaṅ bhaṭāra saddhaśiva, sasarnya majanma riṅ vvaṅ sugih sujanā.

§III.101 hana brata ṅinaṅ suruh tmu ros, jambe taṅ vәnaṅ tampakiṅ ladiṅ, ginitik, suruh lǝmbaran, hapuh bubuk, pha, tguh tan pakmitan, tur kkeḍәp.

§III.102 hana brata, tan pamaṅan jambe tan sinigar deniṅ ladiṅ, phā, [23v] tan tǝtǝs deniṅ sarva laṇdhǝp, jaya ri yuddā tan kevǝhan.

§III.103 hana brata, maharen vatu, deniṅ ābrata , tlūṅ tahun, pha, tguh bujana kulit, tūr klar.

§III.104 hana brata, maṅan sakplǝl, lavasnya pituṅ vәṅi, pha, kinasihaniṅ rat kita.

§III.105 hana brata maṅan roṅ kpǝl, lamanyā pituṅ vәṅi, pha, guṇā tan kevǝhan.

§III.106 hana brata, maṅan tigaṅ kpǝl, tigaṅ vәṅi lavasnya, pha, kinasihan deniṅ rāt, himbuh himbuh tan paṅloṅ.

§III.107 hana brata tri samaya, ṅa, amaṅan sәga tigaṅ kpǝl, salek samayanya, saṅ hyaṅ tiga mavveh brata, pha, kinasihaniṅ paṇḍita, guṇa mantra siddhi.

§III.108 hana brata, tri samanā, ṅa, amaṅan tigaṅ kpǝl, sarahina, tigaṅ tahun samayanyā, pha, mantuk iṅ pada bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasarnya maṅjanma riṅ vvaṅ lituhayu paripurṇna, suka magə̄ṅ.

§III.109 hana brata, Eka bakta, ṅa, amaṅan sakpǝl, pituṅ vәṅi samayanya, pha, prih meṅgal katәmu, [24 r].

§III.110 hana brata, maṅan pituṅ kpǝl, pituṅ dinā lavasnya, ghaṇa katapākanya.

§III.111 hana brata, amaṅan ro vlas kǝpǝl, pha, siddha kārya, hamukti ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.112 hana brata, amaṅan kupat kǝpǝt, mevakā sarva suci, 3, vәṅi divasanya, haṅalakimadā , ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ Iśvara sira turun brata, ya minakārūpāsira, pinakāśvaraniṅ aṅiduṅ, manisiṅ panutukān, brahmāṇi hasuṅ rontal, pha, labdha vara riṅ rāt, makveh hasih iri kita.

§III.113 hana brata, amaṅan kupat kǝpǝl, tuṅgal hivaknya sarva succi, tigaṅ vәṅi divasanya, haṅali padā, ṅa, hyaṅ iśvara turun abrata, pha, ya pinaka rūpā, pinakāśvaraniṅ āṅiduṅ, manisiṅ paṅūcap.

§III.114 hana brata, amaṅan kupat kǝpǝl, pituṅ viji, amaṅan rahina, hesuk sore , tṅaṅ ṅve, titiga, sore, roro, Ivaknya hisiniṅ loh, salek lavasnya, pha, rinakṣa deniṅ ratu, kinasihan deniṅ [24v] voṅ suka tǝmbe.

§III.115 hana brata, amaṅan sakpǝl, tatəkalaniṅ tadhahan sapulukan, pituṅ vәṅi lavasan ika, pha, kinasihaniṅ rāt, mvaṅ jana nurāga, Ekaki ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.116 hana brata, haturū haṅadǝg, sabhāgya yen aṅeka paddha pisan, pituṅ vәṅi samayanyā, yen kita amaṅan sakpǝl sarahina, yan aṅinūm bañu sahlǝd , tluṅ dinā, tluṅ vәṅi samayanya, pha, sapocapan riṅ devā, byakta śakti tkeṅ kamokṣan.

§III.117 hana brata, maṅan rvaṅ kpǝl, pituṅ vәṅi lavasānya, guṇa mogha dhataṅ, tan kevuhan, phalanya, Anidra ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.118 hana brata maṅan ¬tigaṅ kpǝl, tri masā, tiga vәṅi lavasānya, pha, kinasihaniṅ rat, tri samaya ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkāna.

§III.119 hana brata, hamañca gǝmā, ṅa, amaṅan sәga limaṅ kpǝl sari sarī, limaṅ lek samayanya, pha, kinasihan deniṅ samanta janma, kaśruguṇa , kavīryavan, kā [25 r] subhagyān sugih siddhi mantra.

§III.120 hana brata, maṅan pituṅ kpǝl, saptā latri lavasanya, guṇamogha dhataṅ, sarva viṣā tan kataman kita, yeka phalanya, catūr mukā ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.121 hana brata, amaṅan pituṅ kpǝl, pataṅ lek samayanya, pha, hamūkti suka riṅ dlāha.

§III.122 hana brata, amaṅan saṅaṅ kpǝl, naṅkə̄n pūrṇama, mrәttiharā, ṅa, molihā tigaṅ kasaṅhā, pha, mantuk mariṅ svarga bhaṭāra Indrā, sasarnya mañjanma mariṅ vvaṅ listvayu paripurṇnā, sugih saṅkan rare.

§III.123 hana brata maṅan sadaśa kpǝl, tadhah pisan, sadaśa lek lavasanya, pha, salvirniṅ lara rogha tan tame kita, haṅadhavā ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.124 hana brata, haṅapitu, ṅa, amaṅan pituṅ kpǝl, moliha tigaṅ kapitu, pha, mantuk riṅ bhaṭāra brahmā, sasarnya majanma riṅ vvaṅ sugih saṅkan rare, listvayu paripurṇna.

§III.125 hana brata, naṅkǝn radite Umanis, amaṅan sǝga sa [25 v] kpǝl, [oliha] tluṅ radite Umanis, pha, tis manak ānak, trus tumus təkaniṅ ānak putu buyut, sukasugih tan kabañcana.

§III.126 hana bratañkul bañu, ṅa, kramanya, amaṅan sәga sakpǝl, sadina, beñjaṅanya rvaṅ kpǝl, puhanannya, 3, kpǝl, tlunanyā malabahan, ma, Om̐ niroghā, nirpāpa, nirmmāla, niṅ bape bu lukar mulih jati nityasā. amaṅan tan pahuyah, tan pahivak, kneṅ dyus kevalā, tan kneṅ lisah, tan kǝneṅ vdhak, tan paṅinūm tuvak, tan paṅinaṅ, tan paturu rahina, tan kabañcaran , pha, Ilaṅ salviriṅ larārogha.

§III.127 manih brata ñkul bañu, riṅ ckokiṅ taṅan paṅan sәga sakpǝl, toya sackokiṅ taṅan, tigaṅ dinā samayanya, sabagya, 5, dinā, ma, kbas valuya jati. pha, nirlāra vighna.

§III.128 hana bratañkul bañu, vadhah dadasar cmǝṅ, ma, Om̐ hana boloṅ tan pahudǝran, Ana boloṅ tan pamala, nirvighna nir ttaṅi [26 r]s, Ōm̐ śrī srī ya namah svāhā, Om̐ mam̐ ya namah svāhā.hamita ri saṅ āsәḍahan brata, ri saṅgar, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namah .

§III.129 hana bratañkul bañu, ṅa, amaṅan sacalovakaniṅ taṅan, pituṅ vәṅi samayanya, nasi kalavan bañu, ma, Om̐ nirroghā, nirpāpa nirbapebu, lukǝṅ mulih jatinyasah, lukar sapāpaniṅ śarīra, mvaṅ pāpaniṅ bapebu.

§III.130 hana brata ñkul bañu, mañjiṅ limā, ṅa, puluṅ kaṅ sәkul, 1, Inumi bañu, 1, malih hamuluṅ sәkul, 1, hinūmi bañu, piṅ tlu hiṅane, raris amaṅan, sakarәpiṅ amaṅan vәnaṅ, vusaniṅ amaṅan, ṅinūm bañu, raris ākmuh havajik, haṅinaṅ, mari vtǝṅi voṅ, samaṅkana huga kramanya, saglǝmiṅ abrata, Utama lavasnya satahun, ma, Om̐ hana boloṅ tan pamala, hana boloṅ tan paUndǝrān, nirvighna nirttaṅis nirrogā, nirUpādravā, niṅ mala malinā, pha, hilaṅ sarva malā [26v]niṅ śarīranta, kinasihan deniṅ saṅ prabhu, mvaṅ deva sih iri kita.

§III.131 hana brata ñkul bañu, ma, saṅ drәmba moha, maṅana riṅ pasar, saṅ kāla ṅadhaṅ, sira maṅana riṅ dalan guṅ, saṅ kāla katuṅ, sira maṅanā riṅ pajagalan, vusanirā amaṅan, muliha mariṅ rāga valunaniṅ hulun, rovaṅaniṅ hulun makaryyā hayu, Om̐ siddhi rastu.

§III.132 hana brata tan paṅinūm bañu, tatkalaniṅ amaṅān, yan kaśrәdhǝp , hatlasan pisan kita maṅan pituṅ lek ṣamayanyā, pha, tan āsǝrәt kaṅ sinadyanta, mogha mrih iri kita.

§III.133 hana brata tan paṅinūm bañu, satahun divasanyā, pha, śakti, hyaṅ pādma hyaṅniṅ brata.

§III.134 hana brata amaṅan havadhah godoṅ, sinaṅga riṅ taṅan kiva, tan pavuvuh, pha, kinasihan deniṅ rāt, vkasan tan paṅinūm bañu, saglǝmiṅ abrata, siddha sadyā phalanya.

§III.135 hana brata amaṅan tan pembuh, pituṅ tahun samayanyā, pha, bhoga gə̄ṅ təka.

§III.136 Ha[27 r]na brata, tan dadyā tambǝh, pituṅ vәṅi lavasānya, medā prājja siddha kārya phalanya, Aniraṅ ṅaraniṅbrata maṅkana.

§III.137 hana brata tan pavuvuh, tan paṅinūm bañu, lamun sāmpun āṅinaṅ, haṅinūm bañu vәnaṅ, saglǝmiṅ habrata, pha, prajurit kita.

§III.138 hana brata amaṅanā ron, sinaṅgā tan patdha tan pavuvuh, tigaṅ vәṅi lavasnya, pādma raṅkǝp, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ capuriṅ rāt sira turun ābrata, pinakāgulu jariji suku, tәhәr kinasihaniṅ rāt.

§III.139 hana brata amaṅan tan pavuvuh, pituṅ vәṅi lavasnya, siddha kārya, kinasihaniṅ rāt phalanya.

§III.140 hana brata amaṅan papā davun, sinaṅga riṅ taṅan kiva, tan patdha tan patambǝh, hyaṅ hekṣasaṇā turun abrata, pha, kinasihaniṅ rāt.

§III.141 hana brata tan dady atambǝh, pituṅ vәṅi lavasanyā, meda prajjā siddha kārya phalanyā, Anira ṅāraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.142 hana brata, yan amaṅan tan patdhā tan patambǝh, pha, tan paśatru [27 v] kita riṅ niṣkalā.

§III.143 hana brata mona, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan paṅūcap, tigaṅ tahūn samayānya, bhaṭāra rudra hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ rudra ya namah . pamit, pha, kinatvaṅan deniṅ jagat, siddha saprayojñānanta.

§III.144 hana brata, maṅan amona, tan paṅinum bañu, vusiṅ amaṅān haṅinūm bañu, haṅūcapaknā, pha, tan knā gǝgǝriṅə̄n, viśeṣā riṅ bhūmi, keḍәp kapintuhu, pituṅ śaśih divasanya.

§III.145 hana brata, munarakā, tan paṅūcap lamun amaṅan, tluṅ tahun samayanya, bhaṭāra rūdra hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, ginañjar deniṅ hyaṅ kabeh, guṇa təka.

§III.146 hana brata, muna maṅan. muna nap . muna muris . muna susur muna bhaṣmā. muna napuh. muna ṅisiṅ. kunaṅ mulihiṅ munā, [146.1] muna maṅan, pha, vicakṣaṇā dirgghā yuṣā kita. [146.2] munanap , pha, kinasihan deniṅ rāt, prabhu vikū. [146.3] muna bhasma, pha, mantuk iṅ bhaṭārī rātrī, sasarnya majanma riṅ vikū śakti. [146.4] muna napuh, [28r] pha, kinasihaniṅ paṇḍita, mvaṅ deva prabhu, rahayu riṅ pañjanmanta. [146.5] muna ṅisiṅ, pha, prih meṅgal katәmu, bahu siṣya kita. [146.6] muna sisig, pha, jaya kāryanta, prabha kiteṅ kamokṣan. [146.7] muna muris, pha, siddha kāryanta, pinrihta muna təka.

§III.147 hana brata, pañca mukā, ṅa, naṅkǝn kalivon hamona sasore, haṅraṅkus brata kabeh, pha, hamaṅgih suka magə̄ṅ, majanma riṅ sugih sәkul hamukti saṅkan rare, keḍәp deniṅ rāt kabeh.

§III.148 hana brata ṅunir, ṅa, yan amaṅan sәkul kinunirān, lavasnya saglǝmiṅ ābrata, bhaṭāra mahādeva hyaṅnya, pha, mulih mariṅ svarga bhaṭāra mahādeva, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ dam puvavaṅ, sugih dana hulun, labdha vara ri sa ṅ āhulun.

§III.149 hana brata amaṅan kuñit, makālalab, Amanah kañcana, ṅa, pha, sugih hmās.

§III.150 hana brata, haṅuniṅ, ṅa, sәkul kuniṅ juga pinaṅan, yan tan maṅkana, kunir juga makalalab, pituṅ ta [28 v] hun samayanya, bhaṭārī ratih hyaṅiṅ brata, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra mahādeva, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ dam puvavaṅ śakti.

§III.151 hana brata ṅuniṅ, ṅa, kunir paṅan rumuhun, salek lavasnya, ma, Om̐ niryyā ya namah svāhā.

§III.152 hana brata, hambhīma, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevakā Uyah, satahun tigaṅ lek divasanya, bhaṭāra Iśvara hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namah, pamit, pha, siṅ pinrih meṅgal katәmu, kinasihan de saṅ pāndhita, mvaṅ deva bhūtha sih īri kita.

§III.153 hana bratambhima, ṅa, yan taṅgal, piṅ 12, riṅ kapitu, hamatihāra, pha, suka vrәddhi, tūr sidi mantra, jayeṅ śatru, keḍәp kapintuhu deniṅ rat, hamupu saprajjāniṅ voṅ kabeh.

§III.154 hana brata hambhīma, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevakā Uyah, putihiṅ taluh, bhaṅ pṭak, pa, amaṅan ktan bāṅ, bavaṅ bāṅ, pva, amaṅan sәga kuniṅ, mevaka kuniṅiṅ taluh, va, amaṅan ktan hirṅ, mevakā bakulā, ka, amaṅanā sәga hamañca varṇnā, [29r] mevekā salvirnya, pha, sugih mās salakā, mvaṅ vsi.

§III.155 hana brata mona turu sumaṇḍah, tigaṅ lek samayanya, bhaṭāra viṣṇu hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ um̐ um̐ viṣṇu ve namah, pha, labdha vara kita, mandi sakcapta.

§III.156 hana brata turu sumandyah, ṅa, salek lavasnya, bhaṭāra sambhu maveh brata, pha, hapkikevanan tajā kulā.

§III.157 hana brata, humbhakarṇna, ṅa, yan aturu, miriṅ satahun, roṅ tahun samayanya, devantara hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ devantarā ya namah , pamit, pha, putra vrәddhi, pamtik vәnaṅ vәnaṅ madasih samā vrәddhi.

§III.158 hana brata, kumavaśa, ṅa, pituṅ kulǝm tan knā riṅ turu rahina vәṅi, pha, viryyavan siddha sakāryanta, tan pamaṅgih kevǝh.

§III.159 hana brata, niṅibu, ṅa, amaṅan sarva hibu, pataṅ lek divaśānya, pha, mulih riṅ [svarga] bhaṭāra rudra, sasarnya majanma riṅ kulā !saṅ kumbhakarṇnā, haturu tan paṅlihan, rahinā vәṅi tur a [29v] ṅūpavaśā, pha, keḍәp saparipolahta.!

§III.160 hana brata, tan pamaṅan tan paturū, saṅ hyaṅ tan kaviśeṣā hyaṅnya, pha, svarga titisnya.

§III.161 hana brata, lәvih turu, ṅa, tan trәṣṇeṅ paṅān, bhaṭārī keśavā hyaṅiṅ brata, pha, mantuk riṅ svarga bhaṭāraśiva, majanma ri kula putra, luputiṅ lara vighnā, subhaga hanulus.

§III.162 hana brata, mopavaśā pituṅ ratrī, hatәhәr tan kneṅ turu rahina vәṅi, bhaṭāra śīvā hyaṅiṅbrata, ma, Om̐ nāma śiva ya, pamit, pha, viyyavan , [pha,] sakāryanta siddā, tәhәr siddhi.

§III.163 hana brata hambhira, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevakā Uyah kevalā, satahun tigaṅ lek samayanya, pha, prih meṅgal katәmu, deva bhūtha sih iri kita.

§III.164 hana brata haṅlavar, ṅa, tan pamaṅaniṅ uyahan, satahun divasanya, bhaṭāra saṅkara hyaṅnya, pha, mulih riṅ kendran, sasarnya majanma riṅ listvayu prajña kita.

§III.165 [30r] hana brata, ṅlavar, ṅa, tan pamaṅan huyah, pat vulan ptaṅ vәṅi samayanya, bhaṭāra saṅkara hyaṅnya, pha, mantuk mariṅ kendran, sasarnya majanma listu hayu paripurṇnā.

§III.166 hana brata, aṅupavāsa, ṅa, lamunāmaṅān haṅgugut huyah ārәṅ rumuhun, 3, tavun divasanya, bhaṭārī gaṅgā hyaṅniṅ brata, ma, Om̐ gaṅgāya nama svāhā, pha, saparipolahta kinerәṅan deniṅ jagat.

§III.167 hana brata, maṅan tumpǝṅ hivak huyah harәṅ, bhaṭāra Iśvara hyaṅnya, ya pinakarūpā, pinakāśvaraniṅ kiduṅ caritta, pha, manisiṅ panutukan.

§III.168 hana brata, amaṅan kǝmbhaṅ, naṅkǝn, U, hivak huyah ārәṅ, vusiṅ amaṅan, haṅinaṅ suruh pupucuk, haṅliṅggā kǝmbaṅ, ṅa, pha, suka sugih, rūpā haheṅ.

§III.169 hana brata, amaṅan tan pahuyah, pituṅ vәṅi samayanya, pha, śaktinta dhataṅ, tәhәr kinatvaṅān deniṅ hyaṅ.

§III.170 hana brata, amaṅan arasotih, ṅa, hadahar hu [30v] yāh ārәṅ minakā vulam, lama pituṅ dinā, ranini padukā bhaṭārī śarasoti hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, prajñan.

§III.171 nihan krәtta maśa, ṅa, hayuni ṅhulun, sakārya hayu, makadi vatǝk habrata, nūt āvarah, śaśih ka, 1, taṅ, piṅ, 10, saṅ hyaṅ vira kusuma devatanya, bratanya, hayva maṅan sarva buṅkah, pha, sugih hanom bhrәman āvǝvka ta sira. śaśih, 2, taṅ, piṅ, 7, saṅ hyaṅ jaya kusuma devatanya, bratanya hayva maṅan sapi, pha, luputeṅ tuju tluh tarañjanā, drәman āhiven iven. śaśih, 3, taṅ, piṅ, 9, saṅ hyaṅnakā devatanya, bratanya, hayva maṅan bavi, pha, tan katampǝkan griṅ āguṅ. śaśih, 4, taṅ, piṅ, 15, saṅ hyaṅ āsmarā devatanya, bratanya, hayva maṅan sarva roṇḍon, pha, dadi siṅ tinandur. śaśih, 5, paṅloṅ, piṅ, 15, saṅ hyaṅ mahādeva devatanya, bratanya, hayva sǝhǝk yan aṅūcap, hayva nǝṅbaṅ boñcah, [31r] pha, drәman āvǝvkā. śaśih, 6, taṅ, piṅ, 8, saṅ hyaṅ atanu devatanya, bratanya, hayva haṅinǝp, riṅ paluluṅhan, pha, sugih tan kelaṅ elaṅān. śaśih, 7, taṅ, piṅ, 13, saṅ hyaṅ manasijā devatanya, bratanya, haṅrakā, pha, sugih keḍәp kapaṅgih siṅ giṇa harṣa. śaśih, 8, taṅ, piṅ, 2, saṅ hyaṅ hanaṅgarā devatanya, bratanya, hayva amaṅan paṭik vǝnaṅ suku phat, pha, sugih patik vǝnaṅ. śaśih, 9, taṅ, piṅ, 6, saṅ hyaṅ ravī devatanya, bratanya, hayva maṅan hasu, pha, hapkik raspati prajurit. śaśih, 10, taṅ, piṅ, 4, saṅ hyaṅ brahmā devatanya, bratanyā, hayva maṅanān dǝlәṅ riṅ luhur, pha, kinasihaniṅ hyaṅ, mvaṅ voṅ mule hakeh āsih iri kita. śaśih, jyeṣṭā, taṅ, piṅ, 5, saṅ hyaṅ leka jayā devatanya, bratanya, haṅlampar ānanapu, pha, keḍәp mandi sakcaptā. śaśih, saddhā, taṅ, piṅ, 1, saṅ hyaṅ pisodharī deva [31v] tanya, bratanya, hayva turu lavan istri, pha, keḍәpāhomah omah. Iyā ṅitaṅ kariṅ vulan, krәtta maśa haranya, den asthiti sira, keṅə̄takna yva lupa.

§III.172 hana brata, saninigrahā, ṅa, tan mamati haghni ri kālaniṅ tumpǝk kalivon[,] kramanyā ta mumujā, hananapuh eṅ saṅgar, tamvitā nǝmbahā ri bhaṭāra śīvaditya, lviriṅ caru riṅ saṅgar, Anapunar, Arih, rәmbaṅ, tambo lagu hakah haraka, phalā, kambaṅ vaṅi, burat vaṅi, lṅa vaṅī, sdhǝṅan Ikṣu, dhipā, dhūpa, den asaṅkǝp, devadarvi nasab, vijā, dhupa, Ika kahatur i bhaṭāra, ma, Om̐ namo bhagavatye vaśūdeva ya, sarva tuṣṭān, dadāsime, Om̐ śrī gurubhyo namah, devacarundādasimahātrәpti svāhā. tlas ta ṅavaṅiha ta kita, ma, Om̐ sūryya putra ya namah . samaṅkana taṅ brata lkasaknā, hayva ta pramadā riṅ brata, kunaṅ [32r] yan kalaṅan āgriṅ, sakalviraniṅ āṅalaṅana, pinakāvuruṅaniṅ brata, hayva pinakṣakǝn ikāṅ brata, kaliṅanya mvitana juga muvah, kunaṅ yan tan kalaṅanā, hanulus rahayu, pakṣakna hikā, pha, riṅ dlāhanta dadi ratu suka vaya katәmu, pinakāśraya deniṅ padhanta ratu, keḍәp kapintuhu deniṅ rat kabeh. Iti sanibrata, kayatnakna de saṅ met hayu, ndan ikā hayva malәtuh Ikaṅ āmbǝk, mataṅyan ikā hayvā miṣya buddhi, tātkalanta maṅanakǝn brata, Apan yan tan karakṣa Ikaṅ brata denta, maṅdadyakǝn vighnaniṅ śarirā, yan Enak denta rumakṣa sarīra, makājñana buddhi mahottamā, malilaṅāhniṅ niravarāṇa, tan paglǝglǝh , tan karaktan karṇna sulā, mvaṅ rajah tamah, Ika ta maṅdadyakǝn svarga magə̄ṅ, ṅūniveh jñāna viśeṣā, vruha ri kramanira sovaṅ sovaṅ.

§III.173 hana brata sabran manis, ṅa, tan pamaṅan tampakiṅ āpuy, rvaṅ vulan samaya [32v]nya, sabran pahiṅ tan pamaṅan tampakiṅ aghni, rvaṅ vulan samayanya, sabran pon tan padus tan palәṅhā, tan pararavup, tan pakәkmuh, rvaṅ vulan samayanya, sabran vage, tan paturu gumuliṅ, rvaṅ vulan samayānya, sabran kalivon, tan paṅūcap ūcap, rvaṅ vulan samayanya, pha, ginañjar deniṅ vatǝk devata kabeh, norana nūkrәttani, tan ilaṅ takonaknā, drәventa tǝmbe.

§III.174 nihan haji pabrata, yaniṅ taṅgal piṅ lima, hanuju kalivon, paṅūpāvaśa , Esuknya riṅ manis, amaṅan kupat pāṇdhava, 5, Ivaknya kacaṅ, pha, dukiṅ halit duruṅ ānmu, yan vus āgə̄ṅ hamaṅgih suka sugih haguṅ dunya. pa, amaṅan kupat syāṅ anti, 9, Ivaknya komak, pha, tinuṅgu deniṅ rāma reṇā, haṅantos haputu habuyut, kinadhama deniṅ bapebu, kapti ni hulun. pva, amaṅan kupat sidayu, 7, Ivaknya sudhaṅ, pha, haṅāpti listvayu, halit ārampiṅ [33r] haṅlәlǝnte, tan āmadhani, suka sugih drәmman baṅkit, pinarәkan pinakāpahulunaniṅ marū . va, amaṅan kupat sih tan pәgat, 4, Ivaknya taluh, pha, haṅapti suka sugih, drәmman sidi baṅkit, keḍәpiṅ alaki, tan kavaśa lakinta haṅluṅhani, pinūji deniṅ matva, tanāna ṅesǝmi. ka, handha kupat gnǝp, 8, Ivaknya raraśmen , pha, haṅapti suka sugih haguṅ viryya, hañjǝnǝṅ hardda nareśvarī, keḍәp āṅūcap. Esūk riṅ manis, handha kupat siddha luṅguh, 10, Ivaknya dagiṅ loh, sagarā dhanū, halas sāvah, dagiṅ pomahan, [phalanya], haṅāptisukā sugih haguṅ viryya, kinajrihan deniṅ śatru, kinadamā deniṅ balā mvaṅ varga, pinarәkan deniṅ bāla sabran, tan ivaṅ deniṅ bāla, sami vatra tan āna ṅsal, sidi mandi tan paṅūcap, rәmrәm Ikaṅ vvaṅ kabeh, riṅ panaṅkilan, tinaṅkiliṅ bāla sakiṅ doh, habahan təka sakiṅ tanāna, sabran sabran, yan vadon sinivi deniṅ ma [33v]ru, tan āna madhani, sadera ṅrehaknā, vrәddhi putra, kinajrihan deniṅ santanā, virryya bhukti, hembah mañabuh, himbuh himbuh tan paṅloṅ. sāmi dānūr dahā.

§III.175 hana brata nuṅku rāt, ṅa, kā, handumā . U, hamadhūharā, pva , hambayuhāra, pva, hatoyahara, va, haghnihāra, purṇnamā, tīlәm, hamatihāra, piṅ rvanakā, [ṅa], pha, hamupu si brata kabeh.

§III.176 hana brata, mañcadara, ṅa, manis amaṅan sәga putih, pahiṅ hamāṅan ktan bāṅ, pvan amaṅan sәga kuniṅ, vage amaṅan ktan īrәṅ, kalivon amaṅan ktan hamañca vārṇna. vetan amaṅan hantǝlu putihnya, kidul surā, kulon hantǝlu kuniṅ, lor bakakul, riṅ tәṅah śarasi bāṅ hāti, pha, suka sugih.

§III.177 hana brata, hanūt sāpta vara, ṅa, ra, hasisirih, 5, ra. ca, hasisirih, 4, ca. A, asisirih, 3, A. bu, hasisirih, 7, bu. vrә, hasisirih, 8, vrә. śu, hasisirih, 6, śu. [34 r] śa, hasisirih, 9, śa. pha, suka sugih, vәnaṅ sakama kama.

§III.178 hana brata, amaṅan sәkul āṅgi sarahup, sinaṅga ri taṅan kiva, tan patdha tan patambǝh, tigaṅ vәṅi samayanya, saṅ hyaṅ siddhi rākṣa sira turunābrata, huṅgvānira riṅ rāt, pha, tdhunaniṅ drәman hagave hayu, tan kapjahan vka kita, trus tumus tkeṅ vkā vet bet.

§III.179 hana brata, maṅan sәkul saravup, sinaṅga ri taṅan kiva, tan patәdha tan patambǝh, lalab kevala, 3, vәṅi lavasnya, kārya hana putra, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ sandi rāṣa sira turun abrata, huṅgvanira riṅ śarīra, riṅ rahasya, kәdhukaniṅ dūmānā gave hayu, kveh putra kveh vvaṅ vlas āsih iri kita.

§III.180 hana brata, amaṅan sinaṅga ri taṅan kiva, saivaknya, sagәlǝmiṅ abrata, pakṣa hidhǝp, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ kuverā hyaṅnya, ya pinaka rūpa, pinaka kulit, pinaka halis, [phalanya,] siddhiniṅ vvaṅ abәcik i pambǝkan.

§III.181 hana brata, amaṅan sәkul, pituṅ lek divasanyā, [34v] pha, akveh mahyun iri kita, hanvā ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.182 hana brata, maṅan sәga kevala, sagәlǝmiṅ abrata, hyaṅ puravāt sira turun abrata, pha, sucāra vruh ri kaliṅanya.

§III.183 hana brata, amaṅan sәga putih, riṅ taṅgal hapisan, saṅ hyaṅ prasiddha turunā brata, satahun samayanya, pha, kinasihaniṅ rāt, haṅliraṅ ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.184 hana brata, amaṅan sәga balaka , sagәlǝmiṅ abrata, saṅ hyaṅ paravan hyaṅnya, pha, vruhiṅ ācarā kaliṅanya.

§III.185 hana brata, maṅan sәga putih, 5, puluṅ, kәtan baṅ, 5, kәtan jnar, 5, tri dhatū brata, 5, mañcavara, saṅ hyaṅ padmā rāṣa tumurun ābrata, pinkā socca, bāyu śabda Idhǝp, sugih tan hina sāhambǝk phalanya.

§III.186 hana brata, añәkul haṅgi , ulam pahi, laṅa tәṅah lek, ranini paduka bhaṭārī Uma hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, vavanon vastu[,] kinarmakәniṅ akeh.

§III.187 hana brata, amaṅan sәkul āṅgi, anaṅgap, 7, pur, si[35r]ra saṅ hyaṅ viśeṣā tumuruna brata, pha, ginañjaran śakti lima, vadon viṣṇu anәmu, tan ahalavas tur prajñan, vicakṣaṇa, suka sugih riṅ dlāha.

§III.188 hana brata, amaṅan sәkul pañca varṇa, aren tiniṅkah cakra tinañcǝban vrәtti, denta maṅan maṅkana tatkāla kalivon, añakra bhuvana, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅśivatma sira turuna brata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakayuṣa, pinakalaku, dadi vvaṅ aṅuripi jagat, suka sugih vәnaṅ pinakasariniṅ jagat, riṅ niṣkāla.

§III.189 hana brata jaga varṇa, ṅa, amaṅan sәkul, balañan[,] pituṅ vәṅi samayanya, pha, keḍәp deniṅ rāt, prajñan vicakṣaṇa, bisāgamǝl aṅiduṅ, viryavan.

§III.190 hana brata, yan amaṅan hanǝmbah sәkul, pituṅ rātri divasanya, pha, kinasiha[35v]niṅ hyaṅ, śrī cittamaṇi ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.191 hana brata naṅga sәkul, tinumpaṅan vrәtti, yan pәjah ikaṅ vrәtti, pavusan kita pamaṅān, pituṅ vәṅi lavasanya, salviriṅ hagata tan tame kita, aṅañcaṅ ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.192 hana brata, yan amaṅan tinañcǝban vrәtti[,] vulan, saṅ hyaṅ anuṅkǝbi jagat hyaṅnya, ya minakārūpā hayu apәkik, [pha], riṅ dadi vvaṅ suka sugih, vәnaṅ amatūt jagat riṅ niṣkala.

§III.193 hana brata, amaṅan tinañcǝban tuṅgul, tiniṅkah bhīma, hyaṅ maṇik teja, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ paṅirut jagat turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakalaku, pinakateja, [pha,] aśrī iṅiriṅ sañjata, sakṣat kǝmbaṅ tinuṅgulan, śakti aṅrәbahakǝn jagat riṅ niṣkala.

§III.194 hana brata, avrәtti, ṅa, yan amaṅan tinañcǝban vrәtti, pәjah taṅ vrәtti, havusān amaṅan, sapta rātri divasanya, pha, sarva rogha tan tumameṅ śarīranta.

§III.195 hana brata, aṅǝmbaṅ, ṅa, lamun a [36r]maṅan kǝmbaṅ rumuhun, tigaṅ tahun tigaṅ lek divaṣanya, bhaṭāra Iśvara hyaṅnya, pha, deva sih iri kita.

§III.196 hana brata, ṅǝmbaṅ, ṅa, tan luṅha yan kaparan tamu, bhaṭāra viśeṣā maveh brata, pha, sugih tan ilaṅ takonakәna , amaṅgih deśa norana voṅ siddhi gave.

§III.197 hana brata hajātukar, ṅa, amaṅan asaṇdhiṅ pulava kǝmbaṅ, salek lavasnya, bhaṭāra guru maveh brata, pha, akarma alaki anom, tur kinasihaniṅ paṇḍita.

§III.198 hana brata, maṅan kǝmbaṅ naṅkǝṅ manis, hyaṅ maṇisumila haraniṅ brata, saṅ hyaṅ asmara hyaṅnya, ya pinakarūpa, aśrī sumilah, pasamuhaniṅ akeh riṅ niṣkala.

§III.199 hana brata, yan amaṅan, tinumpaṅan kǝmbaṅ campaka, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik pudhak haraniṅ brata, hyaṅ vidakā turunābrata, ya minakarūpa, apәkik anulus, [pha] tumitis iṅ menak, ring dadi vvaṅ, suka sugih, vicakṣaṇa riṅ niṣkala.

§III.200 hana brata, maṅan lalab luṅluṅan, mvaṅ kinǝmbaṅakǝn, [36 v] 2, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik arṣana hyaṅnya, bhaṭāra bāyu sira turunābrata, ya minakarūpa , pinakaurip[,] pinakarambut, pinakalǝye , pinakaidhǝp, pinakagulu, pinakasindhuvā, pinakalimbeyan, [pha] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, sukā sugih, ambǝk ahәniṅ, akǝmbaṅ avə̄h riṅ niṣkala.

§III.201 hana brata, amaṅan lalab balaka, sambǝl sinamohva , mantra patala, ṅa, hyaṅ baśūki turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakālit, pinakadalamakaniṅ suku, pinakatahulan, pinakakәliṅ, [pha,] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, suka sugih, lәmah sīma, kinapeṅin deniṅ voṅ riṅ niṣkala.

§III.202 hana brata, yan amaṅan tinumpaṅan vīja, saṅ hyaṅ vira kusuma, ṅa, hyaṅ jayaniṅ rāt turunābrata, ya minakarūpa, pinakajәnǝṅ, pinakapamulu, śakti aheṅ rūpanta, [pha,] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, suka sugih, rāja drәvve, mās pirak, putra putri riṅ niṣkala.

§III.203 hana brata, yan amaṅan tinumpaṅan sәkar vaṅi vaṅi, saṅ hyaṅ mūrvva gaṇḍa vaṅi haraniṅ brata, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik sumirit hyaṅniṅ [37r] brata, ya pinakarūpa , pinakakulit, pinakahambu, [pha] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, mrәbuk arūm, anǝrus tkeṅ kadaton riṅ niṣkala.

§III.204 hana brata, yan amaṅan sәkar śrigaḍiṅ, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik śrī danti hyaṅniṅ brata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakagugusi, pinakahuntu, [pha] aśri sakeṅ huntunta, suka sugih, !saṅ hyaṅ vidayaka sira turunābrata, pinakarūpa, apәkik anulus, tumitisiṅ menak, prakavi vicakṣaṇa riṅ niṣkala!.

§III.205 hana brata, yan amaṅan alamak sukǝt, puṣpani smrәti, ṅa, bhaṭāra smara hyaṅnya, ya pinakālas, [pha,] nәhәr kinasihaniṅ bapebu.

§III.206 hana brata, amaṅan alamak patra, amūrti prāṇa, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ pagər gunuṅ sira turunābrata, ya pinakahuntu, [pha,] dirgha yuṣa, pәjah tan pahavan kadga.

§III.207 hana brata, [amaṅan] aren roṇḍon, pituṅ vulan pituṅ vәṅi divasanya, bhaṭāra mahīśvara hyaṅnya, pha, mulih mariṅ bhaṭāra mahiśvara, sasvarga sira, sasarnya majanma riṅ juru [37v] baṣa, labdhavara ri san ahulun.

§III.208 hana brata, amaṅan aren upih, pinuluṅ kuyupakәna , pha, sugih dodot, mvaṅ siñjaṅ.

§III.209 hana brata, [amaṅan] haren pampat, kvehnya, 73, aṇḍaniṅ janur, iṅaṅge, pha, suka sugih, apәkik halus havakta, jarijinta lәmǝs.

§III.210 hana brata, sarvagata, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan pahupa, pataṅ lek pataṅ vәṅi samayanya, pha, prajñan vicakṣaṇa, bisa gamәl aṅiduṅ, vāk bhajra siddhi mantra, jayeṅ śatru kedhәp deniṅ rāt, suka sugih saṅkan rare.

§III.211 hana brata, asiṅ ṅaranya, !pisan amaṅan kinaṅ!, yan amaṅan sumәlapāṅinaṅ, nәhәr tan pahupa, salek lavasnya, bhaṭārī Uma hyaṅniṅ brata, ma, Om̐ yanā Devî nama svāhā, !ahes!, pha, suka sugih hamǝpǝki kadhaton.

§III.212 hana brata, saṅgga ṅinaṅ, ṅa, satahun salek lavasnya, pha, drәman malakya rabi, ratu asih, ahes, ma, Om̐ braśri vastu ya nama [38 r] svāhā.

§III.213 hana brata, asihaniṅ layon, ṅa, aṅinaṅ tan pambuñcal sәpah, tigaṅ tavun samayanya, sahiṅ sәpah kinampelakǝn, bhinaṣmi, Iki pitutūrnya, ma, Om̐ bhaṭāra mati, ahurip mani amoriṅ megha, tumitis dadi sarvvendah, pinakabuktini ṅhulun, sa ba ta A I namā śiva ya.

§III.214 hana brata, asihaniṅ layon, ṅa, aṅinaṅ tan pambuñcal sәpah, tigaṅ tavun samayanya, sahiṅ sәpah kinampelakǝn, bhinaṣmi, Iki pitutūrnya, ma, Om̐ bhaṭāra mati, ahurip mani amoriṅ megha, tumitis dadi sarvvendah, pinakabuktini ṅhulun, sa ba ta A I namā śiva ya.

§III.215 hana brata, yan amaṅan asaṇḍiṅ dhūpa dhamar, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik teja, ṅa, hyaṅ maṇik muntab sira turunā brata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakateja, śakti mahabhāra, [pha,] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, abhrā murub sumilah, aheṅ jәrih kaṅ rāt denta.

§III.216 hana brata, adahar pucaṅ tәṅah vәlah , vulamaniṅ pahi, ranini paduka bhaṭārī anuṅkurāt hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, abәcik kaṅ jariji.

§III.217 hana brata, damar aguṅ ṅaranya, tan [38v] pamaṅan kasurupan saṅ hyaṅ sūryya, savarṣa lamanya, kaṅ pinaṅan, yuyukan, bavaṅ huṅkul, tarasi, sasivi, rarakā malo , caṅkuk sarvan vinuṅkul, prutāmuradaṅan, pha, kacakṣu riṅ sarva rusit, luputiṅ sarva śāstra, tan maṅhel vinuruknya, tumusiṅ hajī, aṅlariṅ kevuh, bhaṭāra śiva hyaṅniṅ brata.

§III.218 hana brata, pasaṅ sande, ṅa, tan pamaṅan kasurupan saṅeṅe, pha, apaḍaṅ kaṅ hati, yan asisinahu eṅgal bisa.

§III.219 hana brata, tan pamaṅan riṅ pūrṇamaniṅ kadaśa, antuk tigaṅ pūrṅamaniṅ kadaśa, pha, svarga sakala katәmu, mañjanma riṅ ratu, paripūrṇānurāga riṅ rāt.

§III.220 hana brata, mūrṅama sadā, ṅa, pūrṇama tan pamaṅan tәkaniṅ paṅloṅ apisan tilǝm tәkaniṅ taṅgal apisan, pha, sugih manәrus, katәkan sapinakṣanira riṅ bhūmi, saṅ prajuritiṅ bhūmi hyaṅniṅ brata.

§III.221 hana brata akasukhan , ṅa, riṅ pūrṅamaniṅ kapitu, piṅ, 7, sarahina, piṅ, 7, sa[39r]vәṅi, amaṅan aṅinum, aṅigǝl, bhaṭāra kapitu maveh brata, pha, suka sugih, anak amitra, dīrgha yuṣa, keḍәp kapintuhu.

§III.222 hana brata, mәnǝr ri taṅgal, piṅ, 3, maṅan kuñit, mūrṇama sadā, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ trisandhi hyaṅniṅ brata, papalihan bhaṭāra mahādeva, ya pinakarūpa, pinakapamulu, mvaṅ kavicakṣaṇan, [pha,] tan kaluputan . taṅgal, piṅ, 4, amaṅan kәtan irәṅ, amukti labdha, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ cadu śakti hyaṅniṅ brata, papalihan bhaṭāra viṣṇu, ya pinakarupa, pinakarambut, [pha,] siddhaniṅ ṅvaṅ, anvargakǝn bapebu. taṅ, piṅ, 5, […] amañcavara śakti, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ pañcavara hyaṅniṅ brata, papalihan bhaṭāra śiva, ya pinakarūpa, pinaka Idhǝp, pinakatǝndhas [pha,] siddhaniṅ ṅvaṅ sugih tan kaharṣa .

§III.223 hana brata maṅan raka, pūrṇama limaṅ raka, sira saṅ hyaṅ patūt sih tumurunābrata, pha, ginañjaran śakti lima, pinakarāma, pinakalalako[39v]n suka sugih tan panambut kārya.

§III.224 hana brata, mūrṇama tilәm, ṅa, maṅupavaśa[,] aṅraka kunǝṅ, [pha] utaṅiṅ atvanta, kәna sinahur[,] polihnya sakarәpta.

§III.225 hana brata, ṅraka naṅkǝn kalivon, patra, ṅa, hyaṅ taruṇa turunābrata, [ya] pinakarūpa, [pha] siddhaniṅ vaṅ sugih lәmah śima.

§III.226 hana brata, maṅan sarva phala, talǝs huvi vahvahan pisaṅ kunaṅ, pituṅ vәṅi lavasnya, kasubhagan kinaharṣan deniṅ istri phalanya, Abhoh kayu ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.227 hana brata, maṅan phala gantuṅ, davun sinabraṅ, ṅa, pha, prajurit.

§III.228 hana brata, maṅan sarva buṅkah, sagәlǝmiṅ abrata, saṅ hyaṅ viśeṣa hyaṅniṅ brata, suka sugih, puṣṭaka lǝṅǝn phalanya.

§III.229 hana brata, amaṅan sarva phala, sapta rātri lavasnya, pha, kinasihaniṅ strī, yaniṅ strī kinasihaniṅ kakuṅ.

§III.230 hana brata, amaṅan tur ambaṅkit, bhaṭārī keḍәp hyaṅniṅ brata, ṅgonaniṅ amimiti, riṅ pavon, punaṅ kininaṅ sәḍah sapon de [40r] n tuvuh, lalamak lampuyaṅ, tan pamaṅan tan paṅinaṅ, yan tan panggugut lampuyaṅ, pha, vavadon tan pagigilutan, keḍәp malaki.

§III.231 hana brata, amaṅan katambat tigaṅ bulih, naṅkǝn kalivon, tan pamaṅan paran paran, pituṅ kalivon samayanya, pha, apәkik tur lǝmǝsiṅ rambut.

§III.232 hana brata, ambhūmi lәpa, ṅa, amaṅan jaṅaniṅ lǝlǝpa kabeh, salek lavasnya, bhaṭāra Iśvara maveh brata, pha, kinasihaniṅ svami, keḍәp alaki, kinasihaniṅ hyaṅ.

§III.233 hana brata, amaṅana mimba, salek lavasnya, pha, athāravit.

§III.234 hana brata, sarva tatā, ṅa, amaṅan luṅggahiṅ gaṇḍa rusa kәliṅ, mvaṅ campaka garus, bhaṭāra śambhu hyaṅnya, pha, mulih[,] riṅ svarga bhaṭāra guru, mvaṅ riṅ bhaṭāra śiva.

§III.235 hana brata, vījāharā, ṅa, amaṅan vīja rumuhun, saha pucukiṅ gaṇḍa rusa, pucukiṅ alaṅ-alaṅ, pha, prajñan kita, sihaniṅ istrī.

§III.236 hana brata, maṅan sarva luṅgah luṅgahan, pucukiṅ dukut [40v] lәpas, pucukiṅ alaṅ-alaṅ, tuñjuṅ, vija tәluṅ jumput, sapta rātri pituṅ dina lavasanya, siddha kārya saphalanya, Amūrva ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.237 hana brata ṅantavali, ṅa, amaṅan hantavali , pañjaṅnya salǝṅkat madhya, pituṅ tumpǝk kalivon patәlasanya, mirica pituṅ viji, ligundi pituṅ muñcuk, pha, salara vighna hilaṅ donya, sojarira keḍәp, !...! katәmu maṅke mvaṅ dlāha.

§III.238 hana brata nirambu , ṅa, tan pamaṅan sarva binumbon , satahun lavasnya, pha, mulih mariṅ svarga bhaṭāra rūdra, sasarnya majanma ri listvayu, apәkik prajurit.

§III.239 hana brata, amaṅan kәtan baṅ[,] pituṅ vәṅi, hirәṅ pituṅ vәṅi, ivaknya sarva śuci, arariṅ śakti, ṅa, bhagavān paraśara hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, akadaṅ voṅ pәkik.

§III.240 hana brata, maṅan kәtan[,] ya taṅkǝp , voṅ tuṅgal tuṅgal riṅ kalivon, 7, hǝmbanya phala, sahaṅ, mәñan, aṅgara kaśih amaṅan, 7, alaṇdhyan, sira saṅ hyaṅ asihiṅ prāṇa [41r] turunābrata, ginañjaran śakti lima, pha, suka sugih, sapatinya vәnaṅ.

§III.241 hana brata, anila, ṅa, amaṅan kәtan hirәṅ, satahun samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasarnya majanma riṅ mantrī.

§III.242 hana brata, murāṇa, ṅa, amaṅan ñahñah lan gula tәbu, lamanya tigaṅ dina, pha, tan kataman siṅ saparanta.

§III.243 Hana brata, maṅan tan dady akarvan, pituṅ lek lavasnya, suka magə̄ṅ phalanya, eka patra ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.244 hana brata, tan kapadan, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan pakǝmbulan, aduluran pañcamuna, sahuripnya riṅ amaṅan, alalab roṇḍon, mvaṅ kǝmbhaṅ, uttamaniṅ brata kabeh, pha, tan kapadan viśeṣa, maṅkana polahira saṅ viku tәmǝn tәmǝn.

§III.245 hana brata, amaṅan tan pakǝmbulan, pәtaṅ tahun samayanya, pha, mantuk riṅ svarga bhaṭāra rudra, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ kulaputra, kaḍaṅ haji subhaga.

§III.246 hana brata, aṅajum , ṅa, amaṅan riṅ va[41v]ton salek lavasnya, bhaṭāra mahādeva maveh brata, pha, tәka atuduhiṅ paliṅgihan, keḍәp tәka ruruṅeniṅ voṅ.

§III.247 hana brata, amutәriṅ paṅkon, ṅa, amaṅan pinaṅku, salek lavasnya, bhaṭāra mahādeva maveh brata, pha, kinasihan deniṅ bapa ibu, malakya rabi, sasarnya dadi bhujaṅga lәvih.

§III.248 hana brata, amaṅan [ri] ryaghūrṇita, pituṅ lek samayanya, pha, siddhi mantra, listvayu paripūrṇa.

§III.249 hana brata, naṅkə̄nāra, ṅa, yan amaṅan aṅagǝm jinah, 7, salek samayanya, saṅ hyaṅ rūdra hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, akәlar tan kәneṅ śrī kita.

§III.250 hana brata, asaṇḍiṅ jinah keteṅ, salek lavasnya, bhaṭāra Indra maveh brata, pha, prajña prakavi, Aṣṭa kośala, sasarnya dadi patih sugih.

§III.251 hana brata, maṅan aṅadut, satavun lavasnya, pha, sugih siddhi mandi, vāk bhajra subhaga.

§III.252 hana brata, amaṅan kupat pāṇḍava, 3, paṅanǝn esuk, [42r] 1, paṅanǝn tәṅah ṅve , 1, paṅanǝn sore, 1, pha, rinakṣa deniṅ rāt, kinasavitan deniṅ sama janma, hajana livavaktayanya, tan pamuruṅ polihnya.

§III.253 hana brata, maṅan kupat, mevaka sarva śukla, tәluṅ vәṅi divasanya, bhaṭāra Iśvara hyaṅniṅ brata, pha[,] biṣa ṅiduṅ, abәcikiṅ ulon, manisiṅ panutukan, mvaṅ kinasihaniṅ voṅ.

§III.254 hana brata, adahar lәpǝt, lama tәṅah vulan, ranini kundaṅ kasih hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, arampiṅ.

§III.255 hana brata, naḍah tumpəṅ, sahasta pañjaṅnya, śūnya ivaknya uyah arәṅ kevala, anarasvatī, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ pitu tan palavan hyaṅniṅ brata, ya pinakaprajña, sih malakya rabi, siddhaniṅ vaṅ sugih tan surud, mvaṅ pradaṇānuṅku rāt.

§III.256 hana brata, maṅan tumpəṅ, lavasnya tәṅah śaśih, lamun tan kavaśa, pituṅ dina, ranini paduka bhaṭārī hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, abәcik kaṅ gulu.

§III.257 hana brata, adva savәguṅ, bhaṭāra rūdra maveh brata, pha, sugih rumbe.

§III.258 hana brata, asi[42v]dakǝp sarahina, bhaṭāra saṅkara maveh brata, pha kinasihaniṅ voṅ.

§III.259 hana brata, lumaku savәṅi sarahina, pha, dadi deva guru, sasarnya dadi viku bahu siṣya, apәkik rūpa, teja tiniṅhalan, sugih saṅkan rare, sugih tus tumus.

§III.260 hana brata, amәlәṅ tutuk sarahina vәṅi, pur, saṅ hyaṅ anәmu jagat sira turunābrata, pha, ginañjaran śakti lima, pinakarāma, pinakalalakon vadon, listvayu, prajñan, lanaṅ vicakṣaṇa, sukha sugih, maṅke kalavan tǝmbe.

§III.261 hana brata ṅālamuñə̄ṅ, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ lәbur jagat sira turunābrata, ginañjaran śakti lima, voṅ tuṅgal sakvehiṅ sira abrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakalakon, vastu rahayu, lanaṅ vadon suka sugih drәman keḍәp.

§III.262 hana brata, ṅalacakra, ṅa, sira saṅ hyaṅ viśeṣa riṅ bhuvana, sira turunābrata, ginañjarān śakti tigaṅ rakṣa , sakvehaniṅ abrata, pha, suka sugih, prajñan vicakṣaṇa, lanaṅ vadon.

§III.263 hana brata, mañca vaśa gina, [43r] ṅa, tan paṅlavaniṅ vadon aṅucap, naṅkǝn manis, yan vadon tan paṅucapiṅ kakuṅ, tan paṅinaṅ suruhiṅ apvan, lǝlǝmbaran vәnaṅ, pituṅ lek samayanya, pha, tinūtiṅ mās, salviriṅ drәventa tǝmbe.

§III.264 hana brata, kukusaniṅ śarīra, ṅa, tan pamaṅan suku pat, lavasnya sakavaśahaniṅ abrata, saṅ hyaṅ cadu śakti sira turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakavaṅkoṅ, siddhaniṅ vvaṅ muṣṭika, keh avәlas, rovaṅ asih iri kita, aṅraṅkus brata.

§III.265 hana brata, tan pamaṅan bavi, hyaṅ manasija hyaṅnya, pituṅ tavun samayanya, pha, luputiṅ gәriṅ aguṅ, tur kinasihan deniṅ jagat.

§III.266 hana brata, tan pamaṅan śrәgāla, pha, rūpanta tan akusut.

§III.267 hana brata, tan pamaṅan ayam, pituṅ lek samayanya, pha, tan pamaṅgih marū.

§III.268 hana brata, tan pamaṅan ayam, satahun samayanya, pha, tan panәmu marū, tur drәman.

§III.269 hana brata, akәrisa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan yan tan pasisig rumuhun, sari sarī, bhaṭārī śvari hyaṅniṅ brata, [43v] satahun sayamanya, pha, prajña, tavitan labdha mās kita.

§III.270 hana brata ñandiṅ dhadhap, lama tigaṅ dina, tan pamaṅan, bhaṭāra śiva hyaṅnya, pha, svarga lәvih dinuṅkapnya, subhaga kita, kula putra atәhǝr viśeṣa, bahudhǝṇdha ñakra vrәtti.

§III.271 hana brata, ṅapitu, ṅa, naṅkǝn dvadaśi śukla pakṣaniṅ kapitu, aṅupavaśa, bhaṭāra bhīma hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ bam̐ bhīmā ya namah, pamit, pha, viryavan kapintuhu deniṅ rāt, sugih mās pirak, hulun putra vrәddhi, siddha sakāryanta.

§III.272 hana brata, ṅrәspati, ṅa, kramanyānaṅkǝn vrәspati ṅupavaśa, pha, listuhayu kita, siṅ kāryanta hayu.

§III.273 hana brata, tan pamaṅan pituṅ rātri, pha, viryavan siddha sakāryanta.

§III.274 hana brata, ṅupavaśa, sacandra samayanya, riṅ ka sapuluh, pha, kapituhu deniṅ rāt, mās pirak tәka vrәddhi, kinasihan deniṅ paṇḍita.

§III.275 hana brata, yan tәkaniṅ vәton, tan pamaṅan sarvvāmbǝkan, pha, antuka omah omah, tan surud dharmmanya, bhaṭā[44r]ra rudra hyaṅnya.

§III.276 hana brata tan pamaṅan sarvvāmbǝkan, pva, ka, pha, keḍәp deniṅ rāt.

§III.277 hana brata, amiraṅ, ṅa, tan pamaṅan sarva prāṇa prāṇi, satahun tigaṅ lek samayanya, bhaṭārī pabyavara hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, siṅ prih meṅgal katәmu, deva sih iri kita.

§III.278 hana brata, yan amaṅan asaṇḍiṅ puṣpa liṅga, aṅliga prāṇa, ṅa, hyaṅ aṅgaṣṭi sira turunābrata, pha, keḍәpiṅ rāt, tur rūpanta muntab, śakti prajurit mahābhara, yan dadi vvaṅ abhra murub, tan kasoran rūpanta, dirggha yuṣa paripūrṇna, puruṣa viśeṣa.

§III.279 hana brata, aṅliṅga pәraṅ, ṅa, yan amaṅan asaṇḍiṅ duhuṅ, bhaṭāra rūdra hyaṅiṅ brata, pha, Akveh vvaṅ tumaṅgalaṅ asih iri kita.

§III.280 hana brata, aṅubi, ṅa, amaṅan aṅinum bañu rumuhun, huvusiṅ amaṅan, tan vәnaṅ aṅucap lavan voṅ, pha, akәlar, suka sugih, tan kǝna gәriṅ, tan sasar kapintuhu deniṅ rāt.

§III.281 hana brata, maṅan tan pembuh, tan paṅinum bañu, pha, śakti kiteṅ ri niṣkala , [44v] lavasnya sagәlǝmiṅ abrata, saṅ hyaṅ dura dasih hyaṅnya, tatkālaniṅ abrata, tan paturviṅ rahina , [pha,] apaḍaṅ riṅ rūpa, apaḍaṅ kaṅ ati, kinasihaniṅ rat.

§III.282 hana brata, ñәkul bañu, [ṅa,] tan pamaṅan sәga sadina, tan paturviṅ rahina vәṅi, aṅayapakǝn tәkeṅ polihnya, añjanma hayu, ma, rāga śūnya mahiśi taya, amaṅan sәga satatak, siniratiṅ toya añar, pamit, vus mapamit, madahar, sakantunanya, hayva mañapuhaṅ.

§III.283 hana brata ñәkul bañu, mañjiṅ lima ṅaranya, kavaśa amaṅan suruh, maṅan sәkul inumi toya, sәga sakәpǝl tinatak ri lәpa lәpaniṅ taṅan, vәnaṅ inumi bañu sabran sore, lavasiṅ abrata, satavun, yan kavaśa, mokṣa salviriṅ lara, vighnaniṅ śarīra Ilaṅ donya.

§III.284 hana brata, tan paṅinum vvai, tatkāla savuku galuṅan, Aṅhiṅ tāmaṅan antiga binǝṅdhǝm, harәpiṅ dhәṅǝn, sambi aṅadǝg tәṅaṅ ṅve tatkāla guṅe, Arddhaṇa bhaṭāra mrәtyu, phalanya kәdhuk timbul, tutug tumu[45r]vuh, puruṣa viśeṣa, śakti vani, kineriṅan deniṅ jagat, labdha vara gragaluṅān.

§III.285 hana brata, aṅambaṅ, ṅa, yan amaṅan kinambaṅakәn riṅ bañu, satavun samayanya, bhaṭāra viṣṇu maveh brata, pha, mañjanma riṅ kaḍaṅ ajī, sugih vәsi, tūr keḍәp kavi prajurit.

§III.286 nyan ta saṅ citta varaṇā, umarah [ri] saṅ vala kula, mūla tattvaniṅ dadi kabeh, pahenak paṅrәṅə̄nta, mūlabhoktaniṅ kanirāśrayan, mvaṅ kābhyudayan, bhāvanya mvaṅ lakṣaṇanya, pūrvanya mvaṅ vәkasnya, maṅkana liṅ saṅ vala kula, nǝmbah hulun, Om̐ viku satakvan[,] tānaku, kita pva siksa ṅaran ika, duga-duga tumakvan, vuvus maṅkana, rәṅə̄n siptan i ṅhulun. pūrvaṃ śrī puruṣānte, varānugraha makanya, saṅ rojyam, narāsakane, Ayavaṃ vidyaṃ prajayaṃ. maṅkana pariñciniṅ cipta, kaliṅanya, pūrva haraniṅ mimitan, tripuruṣa haraniṅ brahmā viṣṇu Iśvara, vara ṅaraniṅ amiddhi , anugraha haraniṅ panuṅsuṅ , manoka ṅaraniṅ devata, saroja [45v] ṅaraniṅ manūtra, nara ṅaraniṅ mānuṣa, sakāla ṅaraniṅ samaṅke, yaśa ṅaraniṅ kirti, vidyā ṅaraniṅ hajī, aprayadha ṅaraniṅ pūjā, kaliṅanya, bhaṭāra sira magave pratapa riṅ vana giri, maṅaṣkāra bhaṭāra, bhaṭārī, Atitah kasukan amragat trәṣṇā, anusupi vanavāsa, maṅǝnakǝn tapa, manaṅsāra rāga, tinūt deniṅ manūṣa maṅke, atapa abrata, ayoga asamadhī, ayajña dāna kīrti, maṅhanakǝn brata apayapanya , Ulandriya, rumәgǝp pañcendriya, tuṅgalakәna riṅ tri sandhyā, piṇdhakǝn riṅ kaparāmarthan, vaḍahana yoga, sahabana samadhi, tindihana brata, tuṅgunǝniṅ dāna kīrti, laṅlaṅana riṅ āgama, pagǝrana pupūjān sasapon, lavaṅana saṅgarma, ugǝr ugǝrana sadā, inǝbana tuhu, tindihana kañciṅanā parāmartha, yeka ulahaniṅ saṅ tumaki-taki kābhyudayan, kābhyudayan ṅaranya, kavibhavan, kavibhavan ṅaranya, bandha savita, bandha savita ṅaranya, kasugihan kula [46 r] rūpa, śakti vani, nirogha nirvighna , cakṣyah lavajjanā, subrata dīrgha yuṣa yovaṇa aveta urip, maṅkana phalaniṅ brata yan inabhyāsa, ya kābhyudayan de saṅ surupa, maṅkana liṅ saṅ citta varaṇa, riṅ saṅ vala kula. nambah hulun, mapa riṅ kanirāśrayan, mәne pukulun, mәne kami varah iri kita, lakoni siptaṅku riṅ lagi rumuhun, sājña pukulun, vurukәniṅ brata pukulun, pariñcinya, mvaṅ phalanya, A U ma. [286] hana brata, tan pamaṅan tan paturu, bratanira saṅ hyaṅ vәkasniṅ kavi viśeṣa. pha, svarga lәvih, titisnya añakravartti, subhaga anulus, anurāga riṅ rāt, katәkan sapinakṣanira riṅ bhūmi, dinuluriṅ āyu, śakti vani mahābhāra.

§III.287 hana brata, ambhairava pakṣa, siṅ pinaṅan, tuhun tan trәṣṇeṅ turu, bhaṭāra pavakānugrahani, mvaṅ devata, [pha,] bhūta gandharva masih, janmanya puruṣa viśeṣa, subhaga hanulus, ajrih kaṅ sarva galak.

§III.288 hana brata, tan paṅgilani sarva ti[46 v]naḍah, sambarana , ṅa, pha, viryavan siddha sugih saṅkan rare.

§III.289 hana brata, ṅarәṅ, ṅa, amaṅan harәṅ rumuhun[,] bhaṭārī gaṅga hyaṅniṅ brata, ma, Om̐ gaṅgā ya namah, salek samayanya, pha, apәkik kerәṅan deniṅ jagat.

§III.290 hana brata, yan amaṅan maivak harәṅ tumpə̄r, pәtaṅ tavun samayanya, pha, keḍәp riṅ samanta janma, kinasihaniṅ rāt, keḍәpiṅ arabi anak anak.

§III.291 hana brata, maṅan apisan, pituṅ lek pituṅ vәṅi samayanya, pha, kinasihaniṅ rāt.

§III.292 hana brata nitīkrama, ṅa, amaṅan sadina sapisan, saṅ hyaṅ smara hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, siṅ prih meṅgal katәmu, dirghyuṣa.

§III.293 nahan brata, maṅan piṅ saptami, pituṅ lek samayanya, kinasihaniṅ rāt phalanya.

§III.294 hana brata, ambhūmi amasar bhuvana, ṅa, pha, sugih lәmah sīma.

§III.295 hana brata, maṅaniṅ lәmah, pituṅ śaśih lavasnya, kinasihaniṅ rāt phalanya, bhūmi ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.296 hana brata, mañcavara, ṅa, U, marәp maṅe[47r]tan amaṅan, pa, marәp kidul amaṅan. pva, marәp aṅulon. va, marәp aṅalor amaṅan. ka, siṅ harәpira maṅan, duluranya lalab kabeh, mvaṅ kǝmbaṅ hanūt kadi varṇaniṅ sәga, pañcavarṇa, putih kuniṅ abaṅ Irәṅ, riṅ teṅah pañcavarṇa, deva rata hyaṅnya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga pada bhaṭāra śiva, !pamit!, ma, Om̐ Om̐ śrī jagat guru paduke bhyo namah ||0| sasarnya mañjanma rata añakravr̥tti, tan kapadhān.

§III.297 hana brata, mañca vara dalәm, ṅa, kramanya, amaṅan uyah kevala, amaṅan sәkul kevala, salek tәluṅ dina samayanya, vus maṅkana, ulam kevala, vus maṅkana, toya kevala, vus maṅkana, aṅinaṅ kevala, vus maṅkana lavasnya, kәneṅ paṅan, tan kәneṅ turu, samaṅkana lavasnya, saṅ hyaṅ vәkasiṅ anuṅku rāt hyaṅnya ikaṅ brata, tan upir upir sukanta, mantuk riṅ svargan bhaṭāra dharma, janmanya suka maṅan aṅaṅgur, tan aṅhel panambut gave, suka sugih tan pasaṅkan, kaṅ vvaṅ masih deva bikṣuka, muleh iri [47v] kita.|

§III.298 hana brata, luhuriṅ kayu, ṅa, tigaṅ lek samayanya, pha, vrәddhi putra, tur keḍәp siṅ paṅucap.

§III.299 hana brata, aturu luhuriṅ kayu, salek divasanya, pha, śakti kasiddhyan kapaṅguh.

§III.300 hana brata, aṅalasa , ṅa, asaṅidaniṅ alas savәguṅ, tan papasa deniṅ voṅ, ṅuniveh sarva sato, asǝp, pha, prajurit riṅ paravu, aṅuṅgahana bahanya, va, harәṅ prajurit riṅ darāt luṅguhana vatu, [devatanya] saṅ buddha subrata, sasarnya dam puvavaṅ riṅ paravu, sugih savah, tur sugih paravu.

§III.301 hana brata, ṅraka sabran tilәm mvaṅ pūrṇama, sarva putus, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ silih asih maveh brata, pha, tinuṅgviṅ rāma reṇa, suka sugih prih avak, tur tan paṅubiṅ voṅ atuha.

§III.302 hana brata, maṅan gǝḍaṅ tan kinulitan, tәluṅ vәṅi samayanya, saṅ hyaṅ murṣita hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, apәkik, yen istri mǝṅgǝpiṅ pahyunan, abәcikiṅ buddhi, vruhiṅ kaliṅanya, pituturiṅ bapebu.

§III.303 hana brata, maṅan tuhuṅ pitpit rumuhun, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik [48r]muñcar, ṅaraniṅ brata, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik aṅuñci pǝpǝt sira turunābrata, pinakabaghā, pinakarūpa, paṅadǝganiṅ vavadon, pinakalistvayu, [pha] drәman manis ta kita, lindihǝn voṅ apәkik, drәman anak anak, aputu riṅ niṣkala.

§III.304 hana brata, ṅgilir kacaṅ, ṅa, kramanya, aṅuvāsa savәguṅ, amaṅan savәguṅ, hyaṅ prajā sadā hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, mantuk riṅ svargan bhaṭāra Iśvara, sasarnya mañjanma suka sugih, lәvih anulus, yan lanaṅ puruṣa kula pratyakṣa anurāga kita, sugih pisis riṅ dlāha, yan istri samaṅkana.

§III.305 hana brata, yan amaṅan sinaren kasumba, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik pari rāja, ṅa, hyaṅ maṇik teja bhūmi turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakarah-dagiṅ, pinakahati, [pha,] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, suka sugih, listvayu, sәkar analum, akǝmbaṅ avoh riṅ niṣkala.

§III.306 hana brata, maṅan sәkul sapuluṅ, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik tampa, ṅaraniṅ brata, saṅ hyaṅ maṇḍala hyaṅniṅ brata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakakukusaniṅ śarīra, [pha,] asǝsǝkan kanakāguṅ, kalavan alit, aśrī a[48v]sambaṅ jarijya, siddhaniṅ vvaṅ suka sugih, tan pәgat sādhana, mvaṅ mās maṇik, kinanti jagat kinanti japa kita riṅ dlāha.

§III.307 hana brata, maṅān sәkul putih kuniṅ, aṅkǝn kalivon, humārәp purvva, mevaka bhīra, paṅan pisan saṅaṅ kalivon divasanya, Uttamā saṅaṅ vulan, bhaṭāra śiva hyaṅniṅ brata, papalihan hyaṅ antadeva, ya pinakarūpa , pinakasamūha , pinakadirgha yuṣa, yan lanaṅ pinakapәkikan, pinakapolah , pinakararas , yan vadon pinakakahayon pinakapolah , pinakahibon , pha, mulihiṅ svarga bhaṭāra śiva, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ prabhu añakravarti, viku, bhujaṅga, śeva sogata, sugih malǝṅkә riṅ mās pirak, sarva sosoca , rare, hulun, kәbo sapi, mrәgādi, vrәddhi putra, tinuṅgviṅ bapebu, kaki nini, ma, Om̐ hram̐ hrim̐ sah parāmaśivāditya ya namah, ahyas.

§III.308 hana brata, amiśe[49r]ṣa, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan pahupa, anlasana sәkul, yan vus kinurәn kurәn, ma, Atma tuturakәna mariṅ bhaṭāra viśeṣa, umuṅguh riṅ vindu nadha, sakāla niṣkāla, viśeṣa bhaṭāra baja, maty aturu, maty aluṅguh, maty aṅadǝg, lәsālәyǝp, pavak tan paśarīra sakāla niṣkāla.

§III.309 hana brata, nūtakǝn saśila bhaṭāra gaṇa, amuṣpa gaṇa, ṅa, yan amaṅan sәga nǝm kǝpǝl, sarahina, tiṅkahiṅ amaṅan, śīla gaṇā, nǝm vulan samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ bhaṭāra guru, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ viku Ijo, śakti dūra darśana, sojar ira keḍǝp.

§III.310 hana brata, maṅan sәga sinaṅga ri taṅan kiva, tan patәdha tan patambǝh, tan apilih ivaknya, Apan mayoni, ṅa, hyaṅ siddhi narasiṅha turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa , pinakalaku , [pha,] siddhaniṅ vaṅ anambadani śabda, sihniṅ rāt, ma, Om̐ Om̐ siddhi kāraṇa ya namah svāhā, yan ahyas.

§III.311 hana brata, jaṅga varṇa, ṅa, amaṅan [49v] sәga balaka, pituṅ dina lavasnya mābhyāsa, pha, keḍәp savuvusta deniṅ rāt, prajñan vicakṣaṇa, biṣa gamǝl aṅiduṅ.

§III.312 hana brata, jaga śatru, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ saptanala hyaṅniṅ brata, kramanya, taṅgal pisan piṅ ro tәmu taṅgal piṅ pitu, lamun huvus sumurup vulan juga kita vәnaṅ aturu, livat saṅkeṅ taṅgal piṅ pitu, sakarәptāturu, maṅkāneṅ krәṣṇa pakṣa, lamun mәtu vulan juga kita turu, livat saṅke rika, sakarәpta turu, pha, riṅ dadi vvaṅ sugih, tan hana nuskr̥ta , riṅ niṣkāla.

§III.313 hana brata, mūrāba, ṅa, maṅlәkasa taṅgaliṅ kapat mabrata, maṅana purāṇa, kǝmbaṅ nāgasāri, kulalaṭa, malabahaniṅ pūrṇama , polihnyāpәkik hayu tan pasiriṅ, ma, Om̐ smara ya namah, yan ahyas.

§III.314 hana brata, taṅgal piṅ savlas, Atikukus, ṅa, phalanya virya, drәman anulus.

§III.315 hana brata, maṅan aronāron, ulam kalapa binakar, lima vәlas dina divasanya, saṅ hyaṅ viśeṣa hyaṅ[50r]niṅ brata, pha, abәcik kaṅ hulon.

§III.316 hana brata, amaṅan tan paron, pituṅ lek divasanya, pha, siddhakārya, jaya patra ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.317 hana brata, ṅavaśakәn sakvehiṅ brata, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra Umapati, [pha,] janmanya prabhu añakravartti, viku śakti bahu sikṣa, labdha vara subhaga.

§III.318 hana brata, kadi rare, tan kinatәṅǝtakәn , pha, tan pavali valyañjanma kita, sasarnya dadi ratu.

§III.319 nihan brata, amati agni , asisirih, 3, dina, tan pamaṅan sakalvirnya, tutug 3, dina, alabahan, tur tīrthanana, pha, hilaṅ pāpa kleṣaniṅ śarīra.

§III.320 hana brata, amaṅan sǝsǝdhǝp rumuhun, pituṅ tavun divasanya, bhaṭārī vastu hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, keḍәpiṅ rāt.

§III.321 hana brata, maṅan mevak uyah harәṅ, pha, keḍәp riṅ rāt, kineriṅan deniṅ bhuvana, kinajrihaniṅ śatru.

§III.322 Ana brata, mamaṅan catur varṇa, limaṅ vәṅi lavasanya, prajña śakti phalanika, tәhǝr kinasihaniṅ rāt, Apurvva kita, sakabdhu [50v] ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.323 hana brata maṅan riyana, 5, tәluṅ lek lavasnya, pha, halus jarijinta, niromanira.

§III.324 hana brata, ṅantara, ṅa, maṅan tṅaṅ ve , tәṅah vәṅi, tigaṅ lek lavasnya mabhyāsa, pha, śakti saturasta, suka magə̄ṅ.

§III.325 hana brata, maṅan pituṅ kәpǝl, sadina, pituṅ rahina samayanya, mabrata, catur ṅaraniṅ brata, [pha] riṅ dadi vvaṅ sarva vәsi tan tumamāhi śariranta, riṅ niṣkāla.

§III.326 hana brata, yan amaṅan tan paluṅguh, saṅ hyaṅ hayu maveh brata, saṅ hyaṅ laku laku haraniṅ brata, ya pinakarūpa hayu raspati, [pha] suka riṅ lakunta, lәbur tampakta aśri iṅiriṅan, deniṅ pavoṅan, siddhaniṅ vvaṅ suka sugih, amūkti sāriniṅ kaḍaton, kita riṅ dlāha.

§III.327 hana brata, amadhapa, ṅa, amaṅan riṅ paṅkon, malamak patra, saṅ hyaṅ sūkṣma maveh brata, phalanya sapolahta pantǝs, tan pәgat sihniṅ malakya rabi, salek samayanya, ma, Om̐ sūkṣma ya namah, pamit.

§III.328 hana brata, tan pa[51 r]maṅan sarvāmbǝkan, naṅkǝn pon, mvaṅ kalivon, pha, keḍәpiṅ rāt.

§III.329 hana brata, yan amaṅan aṅilo riṅ pahesan, naṅkǝn pūrṇama, satavun divasanya, pha, mañjanma riṅ kabayan buyut sugih.

§III.330 nihan aji rambut, amaṅan sәga hirәṅ, naṅkǝn caturthi, śukla pakṣa, ma, hulun aṅaji rambut, tan abaṅ, tan ana raṅraṅ, tan ana putih, sәlǝm abuluniṅ gagak, adava, alambas, atәtәl, ṅkon rambutin hulun, katәmu maṅko, lәvih kaṅ tǝmbe hulun aṅaji rambut, vastu hulun aṅaji rambut, Om̐ sa ba ta A I namā śiva ya.

§III.331 hana brata, mona mūjā, pha, deva masih iri kita.

§III.332 hana brata, mona, ṅa, yan aṅisiṅ, yan ahuyuh, yan adyus, yan alәlәṅa, yan abasahan, yan lumaku, pituṅ lek samayanya, bhaṭāra śiva maveh brata, sasarnya sugih duve, sugih vәka, tur keḍәp, mañjanma riṅ mantrī.

I śaka, 1722. Vei, ka, vrә, vara mrakih, praṭipadā [51 v] riṅ śukla pakṣa, Asuji maśa, rah, 2, tǝṅgǝk, 2. I rika divasanya, pūrṇna linikhita.

^323. ] G M N P U • hana brata yan amaṅan anūtakǝn vulan ... śiṣya təka] In P the title of the brata, mantra, and result is same with other witnesses, but tend to different in the technique to perform the observance. This is the complete passage of the ms P. "hana bratā hañutakәn hulan·, yan hamaṅan taṅgal hapisan·, sakәpәl·, taṁ, 2, rvaṁ kәpәl·, muṅga- -ḥ sakәpәl· sadinā, tәkāniṁ taṅgal·, piṁ, 14, pūṛnama hamr̥ti, yan paṅloṁ hapisan·, piṁ, 14, sinuddhana sakәpәl·, tәkaniṁ til̥- -m hamr̥ti, tigaṁ lek· ṣamayanya, bhaṭārendra hyaṁnya, ma, Ōm̐ surendra ya namaḥ, pamit·. phalanya mantukiṁ bhaṭāra śivā, sasaṛnya mañjanmā riṁ ratu, mvaṁ riṁ vikva bhavu siṣyā kitā." G U in III.26 M N P in III.29

. <objectDesc>
. <!-- Here you can give a physical description of the manuscript in prose-->
100 <p>Palm-leaf manuscript. 14 leaves in Balinese script. Containing 70 vratas.</p>
. </objectDesc>
. <handDesc><p/></handDesc>
. </physDesc>

. </history>-->
. </msDesc>

.<div n="III" type="chapter">

. <p n="III.2">
.hana brata

. kita.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note>hana maṅan sәga ṅgih...i kita] <note> </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.2 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.20 </note>
. </app>

.<p n="III.3">
.hana brata
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">bhūmipātra</lem>
540 <rdg wit="#G">mbumipatrā</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#P">abhumipatra</rdg></app>,
.ṅa, yan amaṅan <app>
. <lem wit="#P">tan paharyan</lem>
. <rdg wit="#G">tan payyan</rdg><rdg wit="#M #N #U">
545 <gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>,
.<app><lem wit="#P">aṅlak i</lem>
. <rdg wit="#G">aṅlaṅki</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#M #U">riṅ</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#P">ri</rdg></app>
550lәmah, hyaṅ <app>
. <lem wit="#N">vaiśravaṇa</lem>
. <rdg wit="#G #M #P">veśrāvaṇa</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#U">śraivaṇa</rdg></app>
.hyaṅnya, satahun <app>
555 <lem wit="#G #M #N #U">pituṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted">
. </gap></rdg></app>
.lek samayanya, ma, Om̐
.<app><lem wit="#N">sam̐ vaiśravaṇāya</lem>
560 <rdg wit="#G">śram̐ vaiśravāṇaya</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#M">śam̐ veśravaṇāya</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#P">śrī veśravanāya</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#U">śive śravaṇaya</rdg></app>
. namah, <app>
565 <lem wit="#G #M #N #U">pamit</lem>
. <rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>,
.pha, sugih lәmah, śīma jana anurāga kita
.<app>
. <lem wit="#G #M #N #U">ri saṅ prabhu</lem>
570 <rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">bhūmi</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="additive">mvaṅ ri saṅ</rdg></app>
.viku.

. <note>hana brata bhūmipātra...bhūmi viku] <note> </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.3 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.2 </note>

. </p>

.<p n="III.4">
.hana brata
580 <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">nulamidam</lem><rdg wit="#G">anulamidhan</rdg><rdg wit="#P">nulambinan</rdg></app>,
.ṅa, aṅupavāsa savәguṅ,

.</app>
.</p>

595 <p n="III.5">
.hana brata amaṅan tan kasurupan saṅ hyaṅ śiva raditya, tigaṅ tahun samayanya, bhaṭāra śiva <app><lem wit="#M">hyaṅniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#N">hyaṅiṅ</rdg></app> brata, pha, apaḍaṅ kaṅ ati, praṇa aṅən aṅənta, ekasadya, ma, om̐ mam̐ śivāya namah, yan ahyas.

. </app>

600

.hana brata

. pamit, pha,

. <p n="III.9">
. hana brata narasvatī, ṅa, tan pamaṅan sәkul iṅiliran kevala tumpəṅ juga, tan paivak, kevala uyah, satahun
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">pituṅ</lem><rdg wit="#G">tigaṅ</rdg></app>

. mvaṅ siddha

.

705<p n="III.11">
.hana brata ṅlepana, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevak alalab rumuhun tigaṅ tahun
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">samayanya</lem><rdg wit="#U">slamanya</rdg></app>, bhaṭārī śrī hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">śrī</lem><rdg wit="#G">srīh</rdg></app>
. śrī

. pha, rūpanta śrī
. <app><lem wit="#G #N #U">amenak</lem><rdg wit="#M">menak</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #N">sugih</lem><rdg wit="#G">mvaṅ sugih</rdg></app>
715 pari,
. <app><lem wit="#N #U">akveh</lem><rdg wit="#G" cause="additive"> mvaṅ akeh</rdg></app> asih avlas iri kita.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"></lem>

. <!-- G hana brāta [4v] tan paṅinaṁ, satahun samalek samayanya, saṁ hyaṁ Aśvino deva hyaṁniṁ brata, ma, Om̐ Asvino deva ya namaḥ, pamit·, phalanya, meṅәt· rūpanta manis·, Akveḥ bhranta hyun iri kita-->
725
. <!-- M hanā bratā tan paṅinaṁ, satavun salek samayanya, saṁ hyaṁ ma$no deva hyaṁ niṁ bratā, ma, Om̐ Asvino deva ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, meṅәt· rūpanta manis·, mvaṁ ha$- -kveḥ bhranta hyun hiri kitā-->
.
. <!-- N hana brata: tan paṅinaṁ, satahun salek ṣamayanya:, saṁ hyaṁ manodeva: hyaṁniṁ brata:, [SH] ma, Om̐ Asvino deva: ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, meṅət· tur rupa:nta manis·, mvaṅ a:kveḥ bhranta hyun iri kita-->
.
730 <!-- P hana brata tan paṅinaṁ- -sәdaḥ, ṅa, satahun· salek ṣamayanya, hyaṁ haśvido devatanya, ma, Om̐ hasvino deva ya namaḥ, pamit·. phalanya, meṅә- -ttu rupānta manis·, hakveḥ branta mahyun i sirā-->
.
. <!-- U hana bratā l̥ga tan paṅinaṁ, satahun salek samayanya, sāṁ hyāṁ maṣno deva hyaṁ niṁ brata, ma, Om̐ Asvino deva ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, meṅәt· mvaṁ rūpāntā manis·, Akveḥ brantā hyun iri kita
.-->
.
735
. <p n="III.12">
. hana
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P">brata</lem><rdg wit="#U">brata lәga</rdg></app>
. tan
740 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">paṅinaṅ,</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="additive">paṅinaṅ sәdah, ṅa</rdg></app>

. samayanya, saṅ hyaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#G">aśvino</lem><rdg wit="#M #N">manodeva</rdg><rdg wit="#P">asvido</rdg><rdg wit="#U">maṣnodeva</rdg></app>
. hyaṅniṅ brata, ma, Om̐ aśvino deva ya namah, pamit, pha,
745 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">meṅət</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="additive">mәṅәt tur</rdg><rdg wit="#U" cause="additive">meṅәt mvaṅ</rdg></app>
. rūpanta manis,<app><lem wit="#M #N">mvaṅ akveh</lem><rdg wit="#G #P #U">akveh</rdg></app> bhrānta

755
. <p n="III.13"> hana brata
. <app><lem wit="#P #U">lәga</lem><rdg wit="#G">alәga</rdg><rdg wit="#M #N">ṅlәga</rdg></app>
. prāṇa, ṅa, yan amaṅan amaṅku
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P">duhuṅ</lem><rdg wit="#U" cause="lexical">kәris</rdg></app>,

. satavun lavasnya mvaṅ</rdg></app>
. pituṅ lek samayanya, ma, Om̐ namo <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">rudra</lem><rdg wit="#P">ludra</rdg></app>
. ya <app><lem wit="#G #P">svāha</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U">namah</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">pamit</lem><rdg wit="#G"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>,

. <app><lem wit="#G">vvaṅ tumualaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#M">vaṅ tumulu</rdg><rdg wit="#N #U">vvaṅ tumuluṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#P" cause="additive">jaya riṅ praṅ mvaṅ</rdg></app>
. riṅ jīvanta, mvaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">akeh</lem><rdg wit="#N">akeh</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G">avәlas asih</lem> <rdg wit="#M #N #U">asih</rdg><rdg wit="#P">vaṅ kavәlas asih</rdg></app>

. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">kita</lem><rdg wit="#G"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"></lem>
. <note>hana brata lәga prāṇa ... iri kita] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.12

.</app>

. <!-- G hana brāta abhira, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevaka vuyaḥ, satahun tigāṅ lek· samaya nikaṁ brāta, bhaṭāreśvara hyaṁ[5r]nya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvarā ya namaḥ, pamit·, phalanya, priḥ meṅgal katmu, kinasihaniṁ rat kita, mvaṁ deva bhūta siḥ ri kita-->
780
. <!-- M hana bratāmbirā, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevaka huyaḥ, satavun tigāṁ lek ṣamayanya, bhaṭāra Iśvara hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, priḥ meṅgal katmu, kinasihaniṁ rāt kittha, mvaṁ de$- -va bhūṭā siḥ ri kittha-->
.
. <!-- N hana brata:mbira, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevaka huyaḥ, satahun tigaṅ lek ṣamayanya, bhaṭa:ra Iśvara: hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara: ya namaḥ, pamit, pha:, [SH] priḥ meṅgal katmu, kinasihaniṁ ra:t kittha, mvaṁ deva bhūṭa: siḥ ri kittha-->
.
785 <!-- P hana brata mbira, ṅa, yan hamaṅan· mevak huyaḥ kevala, satavun lavasnyā mvaṁ tigaṁ lek ṣamayanya, bhaṭāra Iśvara hyaṁnya. ma, Ōm̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namaḥ. phalanya siṁ priḥ Eṅgāl katәmu tuṛ kinasihan deniṁ deva- -bhuṭa, kinasihan deniṁ rāt·-->
.
. <!-- U hana bratāmbira, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevaka huyaḥ, satahun tigaṁṅ lek samayanya, bhaṭāreśvara hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, siṁ pinriḥ heṅgal katmu, kinasihiṁ rāt kita, mvaṁ deva bhutāsih iri kita-->
.
.<p n="III.14">hana brata
790 <app><lem type="emn">birā</lem><rdg wit="#G">abhira</rdg><rdg wit="#M #N #P #U">mbira</rdg></app>,
. ṅa, yan amaṅan
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">mevaka</lem><rdg wit="#P">mevak</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">uyah</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="additive">uyah kevala</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">satahun tigaṅ lek</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="additive">satavun lavasnyā mvaṅ tigaṅ lek</rdg></app>
795 <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">samayanya</lem><rdg wit="#G" cause="additive">samaya nikaṅ brata</rdg></app>,
. bhaṭāra Iśvara hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ īśvara ya namah,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">pamit</lem><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>, pha,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">prih</lem><rdg wit="#P #U">siṅ pinrih</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">meṅgal</lem><rdg wit="#P #U">eṅgal</rdg></app> katәmu, <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">kinasihaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="additive">tur kinasihan</rdg><rdg wit="#U">kinashiṅ</rdg></app>
800 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"> rāt </lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="transposition"> deniṅ rāt </rdg></app><app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"> kita </lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="transposition"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>, <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">mvaṅ deva bhūṭa</lem><rdg wit="#U" cause="transposition">deniṅ deva bhuṭa</rdg></app>
. sih
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">ri</lem><rdg wit="#U">iri</rdg><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">kita</lem><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="lost"></gap></rdg></app>.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"></lem>
805 <note>hana brata birā ... ri kita] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.13
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.14 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.28</note>
.</app>
.</p>
810
.<!-- G hana brāta tan paṅinaṁ sәr̥h iṅapvan·, satahun divasanya, bhaṭāri bhagavati hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ namo bhagāvatye namaḥ, pamit·, phalanya, lupu$tiṁ sarvva viṣā , nirvighna kita-->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā tan pamaṅan sәr̥h iṅapvan·, satavun samayanya, bhaṭāri bhagāvati hyaṁnya$, ma, Om̐ namo bhagāvatye namaḥ, pamit·, pha, luputiṁ sarvva viṣā, nirvighnā kittha-->
.

.
.<!-- P hana bratā maṅan· sәdaḥ hiṅapuhan· satavun· samayanya, bhaṭāra bhagavati hyaṁnya, ma, Ōm̐ namo bhagavati ya namaḥ, pami- -t·. phalanya luputiṁ viṣayā kitā, nirvvighna kitā
