.<p n="III.15">
. hana brata <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">tan pamaṅan</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="eye-skip">maṅan</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">sərәh</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="lexical">sәḍah</rdg></app>
825 <app><lem wit="G #M #N #U">iṅapvan</lem><rdg wit="#P">iṅapuhan</rdg></app>,
. satahun
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">samayanya</lem><rdg wit="#G" cause="lexical">divasanya</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"> bhaṭārī </lem><rdg wit="#P">bhaṭāra</rdg></app> bhagāvati
. hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ namo
830 <app><lem wit="#N">bhagavatyai</lem><rdg wit="#G #M #U">bhagāvatye</rdg><rdg wit="#P"> bhagavati</rdg></app> namah, pamit, pha, luputiṅ
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">sarvaviṣa</lem><rdg wit="#P">viṣaya kitā</rdg></app>, nirvighna kita.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"></lem>
. <note>hana brata tan pamaṅan ... nirvighna kita] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.14
835 <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.15 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.9</note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta hamaṅan naryyan roṇḍon· pituṁ tahun samayanya, bhaṭāreśvara hyaṁnya, mantra kadi ṅuni, pamit, phalanya, mantukiṁ padhuka bhaṭāreśvara, sasvaṛggā kita lavan sira, maṁjanma riṁ juru bhāṣaṇa, sugih hulun·, lābdha riṁ prabhū$ [5v], mvaṁ mantri, tan padha lāvan rovaṁta-->
840
.<!-- M hana bratāhāmaṅan āṅaryya rondon· pituṁ tavun samayanya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, mantukiṁ padā bhaṭāra Iśvarā, sasāṛnya maṁjanmā riṁ juru baṣā, sugiḥ hulun·, lābda ri saṁ prabhū, mvaṁ mantri, tan padha lavan rovaṁta kabeḥ-->
.
.<!-- N hana brata amaṅan aṅarya roṇḍon, pituṅ tahun samayanya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Īśvara ya namah, pamit, pha, mantuk iṅ pada bhaṭāra Īśvara, sasarnya maṅjanma ri juru bhāṣa, sugih hulun, labdha riṅ saṅ prabhu mvaṅ mantrī, tan pada lavan rovaṅta kabeh.-->
.
845<!-- P -->
.
.<!-- U hana brata hamaṅanāṅāṛyya rondon·, pituṁ tahun samayanya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, mantuk iṁ pāda bhāṭāra Iśvara, sasaṛnya maṁjanma riṁ juru bhāṣa, sugiḥ hulun·, labda riṁ saṁ prabhu, mvaṁ mantri, tan padha lāvan rovangta kabeh-->
.
.<p n="III.16">hana brata amaṅan
850 <app><lem wit="#G">ṅaryan</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U"></rdg></app>
. roṇḍon, pituṅ tahun samayanya,
. <app><lem wit="#G">bhaṭāreśvara hyaṅnya</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U" cause="eye-skip"></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">ma</lem><rdg wit="#G">mantra kadi ṅuni</rdg></app>,

855 <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">bhaṭāra Īśvara</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="orthographical">bhaṭāreśvara</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">sasarnya</lem><rdg wit="#G">sasvarggā kita lavan sira,</rdg></app> maṅjanma ri juru
. <app><lem wit="#G">bhāṣaṇa</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U"></rdg></app>,
. sugih hulun, labdha <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">riṅ saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#P">ri</rdg></app> prabhu mvaṅ mantrī, tan pada lavan rovaṅta <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">kabeh</lem><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>.

.
.

. <app><lem wit="#M #N">pada</lem><rdg wit="#G" cause="lexical">śvarggā</rdg><rdg wit="#U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app> bhaṭāra śiva, sasarnya maṅjanma riṅ viku guṇavān, sugih pirak, labdha riṅ saṅ prabhu mvaṅ mantrī.

895<!-- G hana brata haṅumbakaṛṇnā, ṅa, yan aturu miriṁ satahun·, lumaḥ satahun·, tigaṁ tahun samayanya, bhaṭāra rudrā hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ namo rudrā ya svaha, phalanya, kinasihaniṁ paṇḍita, kinatvaṅan deniṁ padhanta janma, siddha sapra[6r]yanta-->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā ṅumbhakarṇna, ṅa, yan aturu miriṁ satahun· lumaḥ satavun· kumur̥b satavun·, tigaṁ tavun samayanya, bhaṭāra rudrā hyaṁ niṁ bratā, ma, Om̐ namo rūdrā ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, kinasiha niṁ pāṇdhita kittha, samānta janma ṣamātvaṁ, siddha saprayojñananta||0||

.<p n="III.18">hana brata <app><lem wit="#M #N #P">ṅumbhakarṇa</lem><rdg wit="#G">aṅumbakarṇnā</rdg><rdg wit="#U">mbhaṅumbakārṇna</rdg></app>,

. pha, kinasihaniṅ

995<!-- G Kunaṅ ikaṁ amunā(ba)sma , phalanya, mantukiṁ svaṛggā bhaṭāri ratri, sasaṛnya majanma ri saṁ paṇḍita-->

.<p n="III.22"> <app><lem wit="G">kunaṅ ikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U">ikaṅ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">mona</lem><rdg wit="#G">amuna</rdg><rdg wit="#M #N #U">muna</rdg></app>
. bhasma, pha, mantuk <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">iṅ</lem><rdg wit="#G">iṅ svarggā</rdg></app>
. bhaṭarī rātri, sasarnya
1005 <app><lem wit="#G">majanma</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U">mañjanma</rdg></app> ri saṅ paṇḍita.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"></lem>
. <note>ikaṅ kunaṅ mona bhasma ... saṅ paṇḍita] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.21
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.22 </note>
1010</app>

.<!-- G hana brāta tan pakalasa yan aturu, satahun tigaṅ lek samayanya, hyaṁ nāga raja hyaṁniṁ brāta, ma, Om̐ namo nāga raja ya namaḥ, pāmit·, phalanya, deva bhūta siḥ ri kita, mvaṁ saṛva guṇa tkā ya|| -->
.
1015<!-- M hana bratā yan aturu tan pakalaśa, satavun tigāṅ lek ṣamayanya, hyaṁ nagha raja hyaṁ niṁ bratā, ma, Om̐ namo nagha ra$- -ja ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, deva bhuṭā sih iri kittha, mvaṁ sarvva guṇa tkā-->
.
.<!-- N hana bratta yan aturu tan pakalaśa, satahun tiga:ṅ lek ṣamayanya, hyaṁ nagha: ra:ja hyaṅniṁ brata:,$ [SH] ma, Om̐ nagha: ra:ja ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, deva bhūṭa: sih iri kittha, mvaṁ sa:ṛvva guṇa tka||0||-->
.
.<!-- P hana bratā tan pakalaṣā yan aturu, satavun tigaṁ lek· samayanya, hyaṁ nāga rāja hyaṁniṁ brata, ma, Ōm̐ nama naga- -rāja ya namaḥ, pamit·. phalanya deva bhūṭā siṁ hiri kitā, mvaṁ saṛvva guṇanta tәka-->
1020
.<!-- U hana brata yan aturu tan pakalasa, satahun tigāṁṅ lek ṣamayanya, hyaṁ nāgā rahajā hyaṁ niṁ brāta, ma, Om̐ namo nāma nāgārāja ya nāmaḥ, pamit·, pha, deva bhūta siḥ iri kita, muvaṁ sārvva guṇantā.-->
.
.<p n="III.23">hana brata <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">yan aturu</lem><rdg wit="#G #P" cause="transposition">tan pakalasa</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">tan pakalasa</lem><rdg wit="#G #P">yan aturu</rdg></app>,
1025 satahun tigaṅ lek samayanya, hyaṅ nāga rāja hyaṅniṅ brata, ma, Om̐ nāga rāja ya namah, pamit, pha, deva bhūṭa
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">sih</lem><rdg wit="#P">siṅ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">iri</lem><rdg wit="#G">ri</rdg></app>
. kita, mvaṅ <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">sarvaguṇa</lem><rdg wit="#P #U">sārvvaguṇanta</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P">təka.</lem><rdg wit="#G" cause="additive">tәka yā</rdg><rdg wit="#U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
1030<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"></lem>
. <note>hana brata yan aturu tan pakalasa ... sarvaguṇa təka] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.22
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.23 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.12</note>
.</app>
1035</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta turu sumaṇḍā, tigaṅ lek samayanya, bhaṭāra viṣṇu hyaṁnya, mantra, Om̐ Um̐ viṣṇave namaḥ, pam(i)t· , phalanya, maṇḍiśvara kita riṁ saṛvva janma-->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā turu sumandaḥ, tigaṅ lek ṣamayanya, bhaṭāra viṣṇu hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ Om̐ veṣṇave namaḥ, pamit·, pha, mandiśvara kitā riṁ samā janmā, lābda- -vara
1040-->
.<!-- N hana brata: turu sumandaḥ, tigaṅ lek ṣamayanya:, bhaṭa:ra viṣṇu hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ Om̐ veṣṇave namaḥ, pamit·, pha, mandi śvara: kita: [SH] riṁ sama: janma:, labda vara-->
.
.<!-- P hana brata haturu sugәda, ṅa, tigaṁ lek·, sama- -yanya, bhaṭāra viṣṇu hyaṁnya, phalanya labda vara madiśvara, jananura
. ga kitā, kedhәp-->
1045
.<!-- U hana bratā turū sumandhaḥ, tigaṅ lek samayanya, bhaṭārā viṣṇu hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ vaiṣnave namaḥ, pamit·, pha, mandhi svara kita riṁ sama janma, mvah labdha varaḥ. -->
.
.<p n="III.24">hana brata
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">turu</lem><rdg wit="#P">aturu</rdg></app>

. tigaṅ lek samayanyā, bhaṭāra viṣṇu hyaṅnya, ma,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">Om̐</lem><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>

. pha,

. riṅ

. <app><lem wit="#M #N">labdha vara</lem><rdg wit="#G"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg><rdg wit="#U">mvah labdha varah</rdg></app>.

.<!-- G hana brata praṇa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan saṛvvambәkan·, tan pamaṅan asiṁ praṇi, pituṁ tahun samayanya, hyaṁ devatara hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ devatara ya namaḥ svaha, pamit·, phalanya, putra vr̥ddhi, mvaṁ vnaṁ vnaṁ kbo sapi, saṛvva tinanәmta vr̥ddhi, ya kabeḥ -->
1070
.<!-- M hana bratā praṇā, ṅa, tan pamaṅan sarvvambәkan·, tan pamaṅana praṇi, pituṁ tavun samayanya, hyaṁ devā hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ devatāra ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, putra vr̥ddhi, mvaṁ vnaṁ vnaṁ, kbo sapi, sarvva tinanәmta vr̥ddhi kabe- -ḥ -->
.
.<!-- N hana brata: praṇa:, ṅa, tan pamaṅa:n saṛvva:mbǝkan·, tan pamaṅana praṇi, pituṁ tahun samaya$nya, hyaṁ deva hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ deva:tara ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, putra vr̥dḍi, mvaṁ vnaṁ vnaṁ, kbo sapi, sa:ṛ [SH] vva tinanǝmta vr̥dḍi kabeḥ-->
.

.
.<!-- U hana bratā praṇa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan· sarvvāmbәkan·, tan pamaṅan· praṇi, pituṁ tahun samayanya, hyaṁ deva hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ devatāra ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, putra vr̥ddhi, mvaṁ vәnaṁ vәnaṁ, kbo sapi, saṛvva tinanәmta vr̥ddhi kabeh.-->
.
. <p n="III.25">hana brata prāṇa, ṅa,
1080 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">tan pamaṅan</lem><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>

.pituṅ tahun samayanya, hyaṅ

1095

.

.

.<p n="III.26">hana brata amaṅan
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">pisan</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="transposition">sadinā</rdg></app>

. namah, pamit, pha,

.<!-- M hana bratā maṅan pisan sadinā, sakavaśa niṁ habratā, saṁ hyaṁ sambhu hyaṁnya, pha, mañjanma riṁ kula putra, siddha saprayojñananta-->
.
1145<!-- N hana brata:maṅan pisan sadina:, sakavaśaniṅ a:brata:, saṁ hyaṁ sa:ṁbhu hyaṁnya:, pha, mañjanma: riṁ kula pu$ [SH] tra, sidḍa saprayojñananta-->
.
.<p n="III.28">hana brata maṅan pisan sadina, sakavaśaniṅ abrata, saṅ hyaṅ śambhu hyaṅnya, pha, majanma riṅ kula putra, siddha <app><lem type="norm">saprayojananta</lem><rdg wit="#M #N">saprayojñananta</rdg></app>.
. <app><lem wit="#M #N"></lem>

1150 </note>

.</app>
.</p>
.
1155<!-- G hana brāta nutakәn vulan·, ṅa (KURANG), yan amaṅaniṁ taṅgal·, 1, sakpәl·(BEDA), yaniṁ taṅgal, 2, rva kpәl _ _ _ _
.
.makahiṅana lima vlās· kpәl·,
.yaniṁ pūṛṇnama,
.Apan atambәḥ sakpәl
1160 _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _
. kunәṁ irikaṁ paṅlvaṁ,
. lvaṅāna ta ya sakpәl·,
. naṅkәn· rahina,
. havkāsan aṅupavāśā,
1165 yan tilәm·,
. tigaṁ hulan divāśanya,
. bhaṭārendra hyaṁnya,
. ma, Om̐ surendhra ya namaḥ, pamit·,
. phalanya, mantukiṁ padha bhaṭāra śivā,
1170 sasaṛnya mañjanma riṁ [7v] ratu (KURANG),
. mvaṁ viku bahu sisya kita-->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā yan āmaṅan hanūtakәn vulan·, lviṛnya, taṅgal pisan·, sakpәl·, yan avuvuḥ taṅgal·, havuvuḥ sakpәl·,
.
1175makahiṅana lima vlas· kpәl·,
.yaniṁ pūṛṇnamā,
.Apan ātambәḥ sakpәl hirikaṁ sarahina,
.kunaṁ riṁ paṅlvaṅā,
.lvaṅana$- - ta ya sakpәl·,
1180naṅkәn rahinā,
.havkasan aṅupavaśa yaniṁ tilәm·,
.tluṁṅ lek ṣamayanya,
.bhaṭāra Indrā hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ surendrā ya namaḥ, pamit·,
.pha, mantukiṁ padā bhaṭāra śiva,
1185sasarnya mañjanma riṁ ratu prajñān·,
.mvaṁ viku bahu siṣya$- -kittha-->
.
.<!-- N hana brata: yan a:maṅan hanūta:kǝn ulan·, lviṛnya:, taṅgal pisan·, sakplǝl·, yan avu
.$vuḥ taṅgal·, havuvuḥ sakpǝl·,
1190maka:hiṅana: lima vlas· kpǝl·,
.yaniṁ puṛṇnama,
.Apana:tambǝḥ sakǝ [SH] pǝl
.hirikaṁ sarahina:,
.kunaṁ ri paṅlva:ṁ,
1195lva:ṅa:na sakpǝl·,
.naṅkǝn rahina,
.havkasana:ṅupavaśa yaniṁ tīlǝm·,
.tluṅ lek ṣamayanya,
.bhaṭa:ra Indra: hyaṁnya,
1200ma, Om̐ surendra: ya namaḥ, pamit,
.pha, mantukiṁ pada: bhaṭa:ra: śiva:,
.sa$ [SH] saṛnya mañjanma: riṁ ratū prajña:n·, mvaṁ viku bahu siṣya: kittha:-->
.
.<!-- P hana bratā hañutakәn hulan·, yan hamaṅan taṅgal hapisan·, sakәpәl·, taṁ, 2, rvaṁ kәpәl·, muṅga- -ḥ sakәpәl· sadinā, tәkāniṁ taṅgal·, piṁ, 14,
1205
.pūṛnama hamr̥ti, yan paṅloṁ hapisan·, piṁ, 14, sinuddhana sakәpәl·, tәkaniṁ til̥- -m hamr̥ti, tigaṁ lek· ṣamayanya, bhaṭārendra hyaṁnya, ma, Ōm̐ surendra ya namaḥ, pamit·. phalanya mantukiṁ bhaṭāra śivā, sasaṛnya mañjanmā riṁ ratu, mvaṁ riṁ vikva bhavu siṣyā kitā.
.-->
.
.<!-- U hana brata yan hamaṅan hanūtakәn ulan·, ṅa, taṅgal pisan· sakpәl·, yan avuvuḥ taṅgalnya, avuvu sakәpə̄l,
1210makahina lima vlas kpәl·,
.riṁ pūrṇnama,
.Apan atambәḥ sakpәl·,
.riṁ rahina,
.kunaṁ riṁ paṅlvaṁ,
1215loṅana saka sakpәl·,
.avkasan haṅupavaśa yaniṁ til̥m·,
.tluṁ lek samayanya,
.hida bhaṭāra Indra hyaṁnya,
.ma, Om̐ surendra ya namaḥ, pamit·,
1220phalanya, mantuk iṁ bhaṭāra śiva,
.sasaṛnya maṁjānma riṁ ratu,
.mvaṁ viku bahu śiṣya kita.-->
.
.
1225<p n="III.29">hana brata
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">yan amaṅan</lem><rdg wit="#G"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">anūtakǝn</lem><rdg wit="#G">nutakәn</rdg></app>
. vulan,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">lvirnya</lem><rdg wit="#G #U">ṅa</rdg><rdg wit="P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>,
1230 taṅgal
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">pisan</lem><rdg wit="#G">1</rdg></app>,
. sakәpǝl,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">yaniṅ avuvuh taṅgal, avuvuh sakәpǝl</lem><rdg wit="#G"> yan taṅgal, 2, rva kpәl _ _ _ _ </rdg><rdg wit="#U">yan avuvuh taṅgalnya, avuvu sakәpə̄l,</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">makahiṅan</lem><rdg wit="#U">makahina</rdg></app>
1235 lima vәlas kәpǝl,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">yaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#U">riṅ</rdg></app>
. pūrṇama, apan atambǝh sakǝpǝl
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">irikaṅ sarahina</lem><rdg wit="#G"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg><rdg wit="#U">riṅ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">kunaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#G">kunәṅ</rdg></app>
1240 <app><lem wit="#M #U">ri</lem><rdg wit="#G">irikaṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#N">ri</rdg></app> <app><lem wit="#G #N #U">paṅlvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#M">paṅlvaṅā</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">lvaṅana ta ya sakәpǝl</lem><rdg wit="#U">loṅana saka sakpәl</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">naṅkǝn rahina</lem><rdg wit="#U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>,
. avәkasan aṅupavaśa
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #N">yaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#G">yan</rdg></app>
1245 tilǝm,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">tәluṅ lek samayanya</lem><rdg wit="#U" cause="lexical">tigaṁ ulan divāśanya</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">bhaṭāra indra</lem><rdg wit="#G">bhaṭārendra</rdg><rdg wit="#U" cause="additive">ida bhaṭāra Indra</rdg></app>
. hyaṅnya,
. ma, Om̐ surendra ya namah, pamit, pha, mantuk iṅ
1250 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">pada</lem><rdg wit="#U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app> bhaṭāra śiva,
. sasarnya majanma riṅ
. ratu <app><lem wit="#M #N">prajñan</lem><rdg wit="#G #U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>,
. mvaṅ viku bahu śiṣya kita.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
1255 <note>hana brata yan amaṅan anūtakǝn vulan ... śiṣya təka] <note> In P the title of the brata, mantra, and result is same with other witnesses, but tend to different in the technique to perform the observance. This is the complete passage of the ms P.
. "hana bratā hañutakәn hulan·, yan hamaṅan taṅgal hapisan·, sakәpәl·, taṁ, 2, rvaṁ kәpәl·, muṅga- -ḥ sakәpәl· sadinā, tәkāniṁ taṅgal·, piṁ, 14, pūṛnama hamr̥ti, yan paṅloṁ hapisan·, piṁ, 14, sinuddhana sakәpәl·, tәkaniṁ til̥- -m hamr̥ti, tigaṁ lek· ṣamayanya, bhaṭārendra hyaṁnya, ma, Ōm̐ surendra ya namaḥ, pamit·. phalanya mantukiṁ bhaṭāra śivā, sasaṛnya mañjanmā riṁ ratu, mvaṁ riṁ vikva bhavu siṣyā kitā."
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.26
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> <ptr target="#P"/> in III.29 </note>
.</app>
1260</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta patrahāra, ṅa, hamaṅan saṛvva roṇḍon·, sari sari, bhaṭāra mahesvara hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ Om̐ maheśvara ya namaḥ, pāmit·, phalanya, (ma)ntukiṁ svaṛggā bhaṭāra guru, sasāṛnya maṁjanma riṁ svaṛgā bhaṭāra brahmā, mva viṣṇu kiteṁ dlāhanya-->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā patrahara, ṅa, hamaṅan sarvva rondon·, sari sari, bhaṭāra maheśvara hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ Om̐ maheśvara ya nāmaḥ, pamit·, pha, mantukiṁ svargga bhaṭāra guru, sasārnya mañjanmā riṁ svargga bhaṭāra brahma, - - mvaṁ bhaṭāra viṣṇu, yaniṁ dlāha-->
1265
.<!-- N hana brata patraha:ra, ṅa, hamaṅa:n saṛvva roṇḍon·, sari sari, bhaṭa:ra maheśvara: hyaṁnya:, ma, Om̐ Om̐ maheśvara: ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, mantukiṁ svaṛ [SH] gga: bhaṭa:ra: guru, sasaṛnya: mañjanma: riṁ svaṛgga bhaṭa:ra brahma:, mvaṁ bhaṭa:ra viṣṇu, yaniṁ dla:ha
.-->
.
.<p n="III.30">
1270 hana brata pattrāhāra, ṅa, amaṅan sarva roṇḍon, sari sari, bhaṭāra maheśvara hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ Om̐ maheśvarā ya namah, pamit, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra guru, sasarnya
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">mañjanma</lem><rdg wit="#G">maṅjanma</rdg></app>
. riṅ svarga bhaṭāra brahmā,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">mvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#G">mva</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">bhaṭāra</lem><rdg wit="#G"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
1275 viṣṇu,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">yaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#G">kiteṅ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">dlāha</lem><rdg wit="#G">dlāhanya</rdg></app>.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note>hana brata pattrāhāra ... yaniṅ dlāha] <note>
1280 </note> <ptr target="#G"/> in III.27
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.30 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
1285<!-- G hana brāta, phalahara, ṅa, hamaṅān saṛvva phala, sāri sāri, bhaṭāra brahmā hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ Am̐ brahmāne namaḥ, pamit·, phalanya, muliḥ mareṅ svaṛggā bhaṭāra guru, mvaṁṅ amaṅguḥ śivāpādha, (kurang: sasarnya) maṁjanmeṅ kula putra kita dlāha-->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā, palahara, ṅa, maṅan saṛvva phala, sari sari, bhaṭāra brahmā hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ brahmāne namaḥ, pha, muliḥ mareṅ svarggā bhaṭāra guru, mvaṁ humaṅguḥ śiva padā, sasārnya mañjanma ri kulā go- -tra kiteṁ dlāha
.-->
.
1290<!-- N hana brata: phala ha:ra, ṅa,$ maṅan saṛvva phala, sari-sari, bhaṭa:ra brahma: hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ brahma:ne namaḥ, pha, muliḥ mareṁ svaṛgga bha [SH] ṭa:ra guru, mvaṁ humaṅgguḥ śiva pada:, sasaṛnya: mañjanma: riṁ kula gotra kiteṁ dlaha:
.-->
.
.<!-- P hana brata phalahara, ṅa, hamaṅan saṛvva phala sari sari, bhaṭāra- -brahmā hyaṁnya, ma, Ōm̐ Am̐ brahmāne namaḥ, pamit·. phalanya mūliṁ riṁ svaṛggan bhaṭāra guru, mvaṁ humuṅguḥ śivapadhā, sasaṛnya mañjanma riṁ kula- -putra kiteṁ dlahā
.-->
1295
.<!-- U hana brata phalahara, ṅa, hamaṅan saṛvva phala sāri sāri, bhaṭāra brāhma hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ brahmaṇe namaḥ, pamit·, phalanya muliḥ mareṁ svaṛgga bhaṭāra guru, mvaṁ humaṅguḥ śiva pada, sasaṛnya mañjadma riṁ kula gotra kiteng dlāhan.
.-->
.
.<p n="III.31">hana brata phalāhāra, ṅa,
1300 <app><lem wit="#M #N">maṅan</lem><rdg wit="#G #P #U">amaṅan</rdg></app>
. sarvaphala, sari-sari, bhaṭāra brahmā hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐
. <app><lem wit="#G #P">Am̐</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
. brahmāne namah,
. <app><lem wit="#G #P #U">pamit</lem><rdg wit="#M #N"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
1305 pha, mulih mariṅ
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">svarga</lem><rdg wit="#P">svargan</rdg></app>
. bhaṭāra guru, mvaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">umaṅgguh</lem><rdg wit="#P">maṅguh</rdg><rdg wit="#P">umuṅguh</rdg></app>
. śiva pada,
1310 <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">sasarnya</lem><rdg wit="#G"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P">mañjanma riṅ</lem><rdg wit="#G">maṅjanmeṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#U">mañjadma riṅ</rdg></app>
. kula
. <app><lem wit="#G #P">putra</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U">gotra</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">kiteṅ</lem><rdg wit="#G">kita</rdg></app>
1315 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P">dlāha</lem><rdg wit="#U">dlāhan</rdg></app>.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note>hana brata phalāhāra ... kiteṅ dlāha] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> in III.28
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.31 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.14 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.27 </note>
1320</app>
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.32">hana brata anirambə̄, ṅa, tan pamaṅan sarva ambә-ambә, bhaṭāra rudra hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ namo rudra ya namah, pamit, pha, mantuk iṅ pada bhaṭāra rudra, sasarnya majanma riṅ lituhayu prajña kita.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
1325 <note>hana...kita] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> in III.29
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.32 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.28 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
1330
.<p n="III.33">hana brata ṅasaṅa, ṅa, abrata aṅkǝn kasaṅa, saṅ hyaṅ bāyu hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ tam̐ bāyu ve namah, pamit, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra prajāpati, rare mukti suka tәkeṅ atuha.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note>hana...atuha] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> in III.27
1335 <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.30 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.34">hana brata mopavāsa, naṅkǝn dva daśi śukla pakṣa, kālaniṅ kapitu juga, brata bhaṭāra bhīma, [ṅa], ma, Om̐ bam̐ bhīma ye namah, pamit, pha, vīryavan kapintuhu deniṅ ratu, sugih mās pirak, mvaṅ rare hulun, putra vrәddhi, siddha kāryanta.

. <note>hana...kāryanta] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> in III.27

.</app>
1345</p>
.
.<p n="III.35">hana brata ṅasta, ṅa, amaṅan i haryan, lәpa lәpaniṅ taṅan kiva, mevaka uyah, tumpaṅakәn iṅ taṅan, sabhāgya yan tan pauyah, pha, hagə̄ṅ kasiddhyanta, apagǝh kaprajñanta tan medan.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>

.</app>
.</p>
.
1355<p n="III.36">hana brata pratipāda supta, ṅā, yan aturu pisan, tan paturu muvah, pha, ikaṅ abhicāra vәdi iri kita.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note>hana...kita] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> in III.27

1360</app>
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.37">hana brata trisādhya, ṅa, madyus piṅ tiga sarahina, mvaṅ vәṅi, pha, lituhayu, sugih lәvih sakiṅ tapa vijilnya.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
1365 <note>hana...təka] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> in III.27
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.30 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
1370
.<p n="III.38">hana brata amr̥ta māsa, ṅa, maharyan rvaniṅ vuṅlon, makādi añcaṅkokiṅ vvahnya, pha, siddha siṅ sakāryanta, lituhayu, sugih subhaga kita.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>

. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> in III.27
1375 <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.30 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.39">hana brata narahan, ṅa, tan pamaṅan savrәddhiniṅ srī, vәnaṅ sarva maṅśa paṅanǝnta, pha, siddha siṅ pinalakunta, kinahyunaniṅ strī kita.
1380<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note>hana...təka] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> in III.27
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.30 </note>
.</app>
1385</p>
.
.<p n="III.40">hana brata nirāmiṣa , ṅa, tan pamaṅan sarva maṅśa, lvire, kәbo, sapi, celeṅ, makādinya tan paṅanǝnta, kevalya siṅ tan kәneṅ olah, ivak kaṅ kәna paṅanǝnta, isiniṅ lvah, mvaṅ tambak, isiniṅ sāgara, kakaraṅan, iku vәnaṅ bhuktinta, pituṅ lek samayanya, pha, lәvih sakiṅ sama samanta janma, tan hana niriṅane kita, tur mantuk iṅ svargan bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasarnya majanma riṅ viku bahu śiṣya, hayu tәmǝn.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note>hana...təmәn] <note>
1390 </note> <ptr target="#G"/> in III.27
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.30 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
1395
.<p n="III.38">hana brata nirāmiṣa , yan amaṅan mevaka uyah, satahun tigaṅ lek samayanya, hyaṅ īśvara hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ īśvara ya namah, pamit, pha, siṅ pinrih meṅgal katәmu, tur kinasihan deniṅ rāt kita, mvaṅ deva bhūṭāsih iri kita.</p>
.
.<p n="III.39">hana brata candra vr̥tti , ṅa, ginave candra rūpa, panunu sәkul saśirahiṅ vānara gə̄ṅnya, yan kālanta maṅan, pasaṅ taṅ vr̥tti, tumpaṅakәn iṅ sәkul, saśirahiṅ vānara, umarәp vetan kita pamaṅan, yan mati agni ika riṅ vrәtti, avusana denta amaṅan, pha, siṅ kāryanta meṅgal katәmu siddha siṅ pinakṣa , subhaga kita, kinasihaniṅ saṅ paṇḍita, mvaṅ saṅ prabhu, rәsǝp asih kabeh.</p>
.
1400
.<p n="III.40">hana brata ṅrakta, ṅa, amaṅan kәtan baṅ, satahun divasanya, pha, siṅ kāryanta siddha, mvaṅ mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra brahmā, sasarnya majanma riṅ baṇyaga sugih.</p>
.
.<p n="III.41">hana brata ndurgga, ṅa, amaṅan sәkul jali, limaṅ lek samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ svārgga bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasarnya majanma riṅ viku bahu śiṣya.</p>
.
1405<p n="III.42">hana brata kanaka drava, ṅa, amaṅan sәkul kuniṅ, tigaṅ tahun samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga saṅ hyaṅ mahādeva, sasarnya majanma riṅ da mpu havaṅ sugih.</p>
.
.<p n="III.43">hana brata phala āhāra, ṅa, amaṅan sarva phala, tigaṅ lek samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra sadāaśiva, sasarnya majanma riṅ vvaṅ sugih, bahu śiṣya, bahu vadvā.</p>
.
.<p n="III.44">hana brata ndhūma, ṅa, tan pamaṅan tampakiṅ apuy, tigaṅ tahun samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra brahmā, sasarnya majanma riṅ vvaṅ sugih saṅkan rare, lituhayu paripūrṅa.</p>
1410
.<p n="III.45">hana brata ṅalivon, ṅa, moliha pituṅ tumpǝk kalivon, pha, prih meṅgal katәmu.</p>
.
.<p n="III.46">hana brata maṅan sarva vīja, mvaṅ pucukiṅ halalaṅ, pha, vāk bajra, siddhi mantra, jaya kita.</p>
.
1415<p n="III.47">hana brata bhūmi patra, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan paharyan , saṅaṅ tahun samayanya, pha, kasambega de saṅ paṇḍita, sugih lәmah sīma, vrәddhi kaṅ varga kadaṅta, pinituhu deniṅ rāt, bahu śiṣya, vidyā āgama, kinatvaṅan de saṅ prabhu, yoganya śila gaṇa juga, maṅkana phalanya. </p>
.
.<p n="III.48">hana brata nūtakǝn puṣpa bhaṭāra gaṇa, amaṅan moliha nǝm kәpǝl pisan aṅkǝn dina, pha, mantuk iṅ pada bhaṭāra guru, sasarnya majanma riṅ viku ijo, śakti dūradarśaṇa, sojar ira keḍәp.</p>
.
.<p n="III.49">hana brata tan paṅinum bañu, ri huvusniṅ amaṅan, pituṅ tahun samayanya, pha, tan kacalan phalanta.</p>
1420
.<p n="III.50">hana brata tan paṅinum bañu, aṅinaṅ sәrәh tan vinalik, satahun samayanya, pha, cinavǝtan deniṅ strī , yaniṅ strī tinapihan deniṅ kakuṅ, tәhәr tan mandi ikaṅ viṣya iri kita.</p>
.
.
.<p n="III.51">hana brata ṅekadaśi, ṅa, yan taṅgal piṅ savәlas iṅ kasapuluh, kita matiāhāra , moliha tigaṅ kasapuluh, pha, mantuk iṅ pada bhaṭāra īśvara, sasarnya majanma riṅ ratu śakti.</p>
1425
.<p n="III.52">hana brata lәvih sakiṅ brata kabeh, pañca mona , ṅa, ikaṅ amona sadā kāla, aṅraṅkus brata kabeh, pha, kapaṅgih suka magə̄ṅ, majanma riṅ sugih saṅkan rare, sugih sәkul, atәhәr saśabdanta keḍәp deniṅ rāt kabeh. </p>
.
.
.<p n="III.53">hana brata maḍaṅ , ṅa, tan pamaṅan sәkul madaṅ , pituṅ lek samayanya, pha, akveh vvaṅ harṣe kita.</p>
1430
.<p n="III.54">hana brata tan kәneṅ dyus, tan kәneṅ lǝṅa, tigaṅ lek samayanya, pha, lituhayu paripūrṇa, wicakṣaṇa, kinasihan deniṅ samanta janma.</p>
.
.<p n="III.55">hana brata maṅan tan pinakevuhan, tan karәṇan, tan vәnaṅ akarvan, satahun samayanya, pha, keḍәp deniṅ rāt, lituhayu paripūrṅa, prih meṅgal katәmu.</p>
.
1435<p n="III.56">hana brata maṅan tan paimbuh, pituṅ tahun samayanya, pha, prih meṅgal katәmu. </p>
.
.<p n="III.57">hana brata aṅradite, ṅa, aṅkǝn radite amatiāhāra , satahun samayanya, pha, vāk bajra, siddhi mantra, jayeṅ śatru kita.</p>
.
.<p n="III.58">hana brata maṇḍāva, ṅa, amaṅan limaṅ kәpǝl sari sari, limaṅ lek samayanya, pha, aṣṭa guṇa, subhaga paripūrṇa.</p>
1440
.<p n="III.59">hana brata saṅ bhīmā, ṅa, yen taṅgal piṅ pat bǝlas iṅ kapitu, amatiāhāra , pha, suka vrәddhi, siddhi mantra, jayeṅ śatru, keḍәp deniṅ rāt, prajña bisa agamǝl, aṅiduṅ , sugih mās pirak, mvaṅ rare hulun, vәnaṅ vәnaṅ, kәbo sapi, akeh punpunanya, kramanya, yaniṅ tәṅah vәṅi aṅadǝg aṅeka pāda, tan kәna turu, mvaṅ asaṅguni, siddhi kita. </p>
.
.<p n="III.60">hana brata tan pamaṅan ivak bavi, pha, tan kataman deniṅ sarva viṣya, mvaṅ ila vuḍug, sakvehnya paḍa doh, siddhi mantra kita, deva bhūṭa paṇḍita mānuṣa paḍa sih.</p>
.
1445<p n="III.61">hana brata mәgat rasa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan ivak celeṅ, tan pamaṅan asiyuṅ , tan pamaṅan ivak taṅiri, tan pamaṅan kәtan gajih, tan pamaṅan duryan, mvaṅ naṅka, mvaṅ gәḍaṅ varaṅan, tan pamaṅan kacaṅ hijo, kunaṅ phala buṅkah, phala gantuṅ, pha, śakti lәvih, sakārәpta katəkan tǝmbe.</p>
.
.<p n="III.62">hana brata ṅasapuluh , ṅa, bratanira saṅ sinuhun iṅ panatharan , kramanya nәkul bañu , tan paṅinaṅ, amvitana riṅ taṅgal pisaniṅ kadaśa, avusana ri tilǝmi kasapuluh, salek samayanya, rehiṅ caru amvit , yan alәkasa brata, anǝmbah iṅ saṅgar, ca, tumpәṅ gurih, ivak lambaraṅ itik, dulurana gәraṅ grih, kapitiṅ, antiga , kacambah, pelas lalab, uraṅ iṅasinan, pisaṅ kǝmbaṅ, raka vovohan, duvәgan, tәbu, bañu kuvuṅ, sәkar maṅle, gambir iṅaṅgit, maṅle tuñjuṅ , campaka, salviraniṅ kǝmbaṅ vaṅi, aturakәn iṅ deva, lәṅa vaṅi burat vaṅi, hurap urap jajā, sakalvirāmikāmikan, vastra piṅe saparadǝg, sasari gnǝp, hartha, 225, dhūpa dhipā mñan caṅdhanā, mvaṅ caṇdhanenasab, vija kǝmbhaṅ skār urā, nihan deniṅ amantrā, mvītā sǝsǝdhǝp rumuhun, kavrәttā rok lavan madhu, sǝsǝdhǝpaknā, dukāmvitī taya, hanǝmbahakna kavaṅī, riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ śrī mahā deva ya [9 v] namah, tlas, ṅaturi carū, ma, Om̐ devadaru vedhadhāmi, sa ba ta A I, nama śiva ya, A U mā, Ah, Om̐deva sukam bavantu, tlasta ṅǝmbaṅurā, hanambuta brata, savulan hankul bañu, Amkasāneṅ tīlәm, sǝsǝdhǝpi samaṅkana, Uyah harәṅ, ma, Om̐ namo mahā deva ya namah, nāma śiva ya, Avighnamāstu|| caruniṅ labahanābrata, sapuluṅ sapuluṅ mevakǝmbaṅ, kadi ṅūnī mantra. yan āṅarddhānakǝñ caru, kadi duk amvitṭa juga, huvusan, ma, Om̐.
.</p>
.
1450<p n="III.63">hana brata kodara, ṅa, savulan lavasnya, hamvitāne taṅgal pisaniṅ karo, tan pamaṅana sarva praṇī, mvaṅ sa—lviriṅ vijiliṅ śagāra, śantāveṣā ta kita, mavastra piṅe, hagәglaṅā lave kinuniran, taṅan tṅǝn, hayva mamati mati sarva mbə̄kan, makācarunya mvitā brata, sәkuliṅ tamās, hulamāna sarva gaṅān, vadhah limās, tuhuṅ salvirnya, papare, baligo, sambǝl, salviranya tan pataraṣi, gogoreṅan koleṇṭaṅ, cacaṅanon gino[10 r]reṅ, mvaṅ papare ginoreṅ, padha hǝmbanāna sasavi, hǝmba sakalor, huvus ratǝṅ tumpaṅakniṅ sәkul iṅtamas, makadi yanānaphān, miñak, mavadhah limās, den aśrī deniṅkah caru, sәḍah voh, raka vovohan, pisaṅ kǝmbaṅ den āsaṅkǝp, duvgan, Upacara dhūpā dhipā, vija caṅdhanenasab, sājekna paraniṅcaru, riṅ bhaṭāra gaṅāpati, saṅ bhrәṅgiritī, saṅ hyaṅ Iśvarā, bhaṭārī Umā, sira padha aturana caru, lumkas kita hanambuta brata, masucya radinā śarīra, Aṅabakti riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ nāndiśvara mahākāla ya namah, Om̐bhrәṅgiritī ye namah, Om̐ sam̐ sāpta rәṣi bhyo namah, Om̐ maheśvara ya namah, Om̐ śrī Umā ye namah, tlas haturākǝñ carunta riṅ deva, ma, Om̐ Im̐ namah, Om̐ deva carave namah, Amrәttātmaka ya svāhā|| yan halabvana brata kadi ṅūni, duk vahu lumkasā brata, luvarana glaṅ lave kuniṅ, mahuvusana ri tīlǝmiṅ bhadravadā juga.
.</p>
.<p n="III.64">nihan tiṅkahiṅ abrata riṅ mrәtta maśā, ṅa, halǝkasa kita hamati ghni, samaptā rahinā, mvaṅ caru sarva pavitra, tumpə̄ṅputih, papaṅgaṅ Iṭik, graṅ gri hāntiga, sәḍah voh, rakā vovohan, pisaṅ kǝmbaṅ, dhūpā den asaṅkǝp.nihan paṅvijinyā,
.
.<lb n="1"/>riṅ vulan, ka, 4, purṇnamā, stuti nira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ ṣṭacedevamrәttatvaṃ, purṅnamā sinamostute, mamocyā sarva papebhyoh, ta candrā leki gaccata. Haturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, candrā deva ya.
1455
.<lb n="2"/>yaniṅ vulan, kalīma, tīlǝm, paṅastunira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ mitri deva mrәttatvaṃ, Avamasya namostute, mamocya sarva papebhyoh, Aghnalokaṃ sagaccate. Hatūrakna carunta kadi kadi ṅūnī, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, Aghni deva ya .
.
.<lb n="3"/>yaniṅ vulan ka nǝm, taṅgal piṅ, 8, stuti nira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ krәṣṇā ravā deva mrәtṭvam, Aṣṭāmyantu namostute, mamocya sarva [11 r] papebhyoh, viṣṇu lokaṃ sagāccati|| haturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, viṣṇu devā ya svāhā.
.
1460<lb n="4"/>yaniṅ vulan kapitu, taṅ piṅ, 13, stutinira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ baruṇā deva mrәtvam, trayodāmna namostute, mamocya sarva papebhyoh, ṅudra lokaṃ sagaccāte. haturakna carunta kādī ṅūnī, ma, Om̐ deva cārave namah, rudra deva ya svāhā.
.
.<lb n="5"/>yaniṅ vulan kavolu, taṅ, piṅ, 2, stutinira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ vivasvā deva mrәttatvam, dvātiyeva namostute, mamocya sarva papebhyo, sūryyalokaṃ sagaccate|| haturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carāve namah, suryyā devata ya namah svāhā.
.
.<lb n="6"/>yaniṅ vulan kasaṅā, taṅ, piṅ, 6, stutīnira ri saṅgār, ma, Om̐ Astu nā teva mrәtṭatvaṃ, pāṣṭyente vānamostute, mamocya sarva papebhyo, Athalokaṃ sagaccati. haturakna carunta kadi ṅūnī, Om̐ deva caravei [11 v] ya namah, Arkkā deva ya .
1465
.<lb n="6"/>yaniṅ vulan kadaśa, tāṅ, piṅ, 4, stutinira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ yāgave deva mrәttatavam, catur ddhyantu namostute, mamocya sarva papebbhyoh, brahma lokaṃ sagacāti|| haturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, dhatrә deva ya .
.
.<lb n="7"/>yaniṅ vulan jyeṣṭa, taṅgal piṅ, 5, stutinira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ Indrāve deva mrәtṭatvaṃ, mañcamyāntu namostute, mamocya sarva papebhyo, I ndralokaṃ sagaccati|| haturakna carunta kadi ṅūnī, ma, Om̐ deva cārave namah, Indra deva ya||0/
.
1470<lb n="8"/>yaniṅ vulan saddhā, taṅ, piṅ, 1, stutinirā riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ Aryya madeva mrәtṭatvaṃ, praṭipadī namostute, mamocya sarva papebhyo, Aṣṭalokaṃ sagaccati. haturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, Arkkā deva ya svāhā. yaniṅ vulan kaṣā, taṅ, piṅ, 10, stutinira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ bhaghā na devā [12 r] mrәtṭattvaṃ, bhaṣāmyantu namostute, mamocya sarva papebhyo, sūryya lokaṃ sagaccati|| haturākna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, bhaghana deva ya .
.
.<lb n="9"/>yaniṅ vulan karo, taṅ, piṅ, 7, stutinira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ puṣya dvei deva mrәtṭatvaṃ, sapta myantu nāmostute, mamocya sarva papebhyo, sūryyālokaṃ sagaccāti|| haturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, puṣya deva ya .
.
.<lb n="10"/>yaniṅ vulan ka tiga, taṅgal piṅ, 9, stutinira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ ṣajjā dyah deva mrәṭṭatvaṃ, navaṣyantu namostute, māmoccya sarva papebhyo, Indrā lokaṃ sagaccati|| haturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, Indrā devā ya .
1475
.gnǝp tiṅkahiṅ brata samaṅkana, rva vlas vulan, kalaniṅ hamrәtta maśa, Amati ghni,kapaṅgih de saṅ haṅanakǝn brata, dīrgghā yuṣa paripurṇna, riṅ dlāha, mandadi ratu viśeṣā, hayva cavuh yan kalaniṅ ābrattta, tlas, smā, tabrataṅkǝna mravani siṅ pravani, Uttamā dahat, tuhvā gana ta ya bharaṭā, byakta tuṣṭātmakāsaṅ pitārannirā, təka rīṅ kaki buyutira suka, nītya sukātmaka vaneh, Ika ta den agatiniṅ amaṅun ayuniṅ śarīrātma.
.</p>
.<p n="III.65">hana brata hadyus hanuṅku rāt, ṅa, yan riṅ śravaṇā maṣā, hadyusā davuh, 7, pisan riṅ sore, pha, hulun masihi ri kita.
.yan riṅ bhadravadā, hadyusā davuh, 4, pha, kasubhaganuṅku rāt.
1480yaniṅ hasuji, hadyusā dhavuh, 5, pha, sarva salaka tkā||
.yaniṅ karttikā, hadyusā dhavuh, 8, riṅ rātri, pha, bahuputra.
.yan riṅ margghā sira, hadyusā davuh, 4, riṅ rātri, pha, prabhu masih.
.yaniṅ poṣya maśa, hadyusa davuh, 6, sore, pha, viryyavan||
.yaniṅ maghā maṣā, hadyusa davuh, 8, vaṅun rahina juga, pha, sugih pari.
1485yaniṅ phalguṇa maṣā, hadyusā davuh, 2, rahina, pha, bhoga gə̄ṅ katәmu.
.yaniṅ cetra maśa, madyusa davuh, 3, rahina, pha, devā [13 r] masih sarva kāryanta siddha.
.yaniṅ veśaka maṣā, madyusa dhavuh, 4, pha, laraniṅāti hilaṅ.
.yaniṅ jyeṣṭā, hadyusā dhavuh, 4, pha, siṅ kāryanta katəkan.
.yaniṅ hasaddha maśa, madyusā davuh, 7, pha, hañjrahakǝn mās pirak, maṅkāna kramanya.
1490Itī śarīra śuddha, bhūmi socca, ṅa.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.66">hana brata ṅulante, ṅa, hamilan vulan,
.kaṣa, tan pamaṅan sarva buṅkah, pha, dadi sarva tinandur.
1495vulan, 2, tan pamaṅan sapi, pha, sugih sapi, tan kagǝriṅǝn,.
.vulan, 3, tan pamaṅañ celeṅ, pha, sugih vvit, tan gǝriṅ āguṅ, halaṅ halaṅ.
.vulan, 4, tan pamaṅam sarva roṇḍon, pha, dadi sarva rumambat, sarva gumantuṅ.
.vulan, 5, tan patukar, tan panǝmbuṅ rare cili, pha, keḍәp havkasa paṅūcapta.
.vulan, 6, tan paluluṅha, tulak vali, yen luṅha, pha, sugih kavulā,vrәddhi kabeh tur ākeh.
1500vulan, 7, tan pamaṅan sәga, pha, sugih pari, tan kakuraṅan tajak.
.vulan, 8, haja maṅan [13 v] suku phat, pha, sugih drәvve sarvǝ vdha.
.vulan, 9, haja maṅan āñjiṅ, pha, hapkik tan pahes.
.vulan, 10, tan tumṅeṅ tavaṅ, pha, prajñan kita.
.vulan, jyeṣṭa, tan pamaṅan garәm, pha, sugih bhūmi, tan ilaṅ takonakna, tur keḍәp kapintuhu.
1505vulan, saddhā, tan paturū lavan strī, histri tan paturu lavan lanaṅ, pha, drәmmam halaki, kinasihaniṅ lanaṅ, lanaṅ kinasihaniṅ vadon, tur keḍәp sapaṅucapta.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.67">nihan hajī tutug kavruhakna, pūrṇamaniṅ kaṣa, saṅ hyaṅ hamurvva bhuvaṅna, pinaka bala, hasih ri pinakeṅ huluṅ||
.purṅnamaniṅ karo, saṅ hyaṅ madhuśuddhaṇā, pinaka babu, hasih ri pinakeṅ hulun.
1510pūrṇamaniṅ katiga, saṅ hyaṅ madhu kusuma, pinakavakiṅ hulun listvayuparipurṇna, drәmman keḍәp puruṣā viśeṣa, prajñan vicakṣaṇā, suka sugih.
.pūrṇamaniṅ kapat, saṅ hyaṅ āsmara pinaka lakiniṅ hulun, hapkik prajurit vicakṣaṇā, puruṣā viśeṣa, prajñan suka sugih jayeṅ śatru, hasih [14 r] pinakeṅ hulun||
.pūrṇamaniṅ kalimā, saṅ hyaṅ manobhava, pinakā hanakiṅ hulun, panǝṅgǝk lanaṅ, hapkikprajurit hasih pinakeṅ hulun.
.purṇnamāniṅ kanǝm, saṅ hyaṅ hantanū, pinaka sanakiṅ hulun lanaṅ, paṅgulu, suka sugih, hasih pinakeṅ hulun.
.purṇmaniṅ kapitu, saṅ hyaṅ kama jaya, pinakā sanakiṅ hulun lanaṅ panṅah, hasih pinakeṅ hulun.
1515pūrṇamaniṅ kavolu, saṅ hyaṅ kamā ratih pinaka sanakiṅ hulun lanaṅ vuruju, suka sugih hasih ri pinakeṅ hulun||
.pūrṇamaniṅ kasaṅha, saṅ hyaṅ kumarā, pinakā kṣanā , dukiṅ hulun hāpapaṅanten pinaslaṅ.
.pūrṇamaniṅ kaśapuluh, saṅ hyaṅ hamadhapā, samanā dukiṅ hulun ābobot.
.pūrṇamaniṅ jyeṣṭā, saṅ hyaṅ kumara, pinakā hanak lanaṅ pambayun, hapkik prajurit, hasihiṅ pinakeṅ hulun, puruṣā viśeṣā, prajñan vicakṣaṇā, jayeṅ śatru, hahidhǝpinakeṅ hulun.
.pūrṇamaniṅ hasaddhā, saṅ hyaṅ komari, pinakā hanak vadon paṅgu [14 v] ṅgulu, listvasyu paripurṇnā, dhrәman keḍәp, puruṣa viśeṣā, prajñan vicakṣaṇā, hahidhǝpinakeṅ hulun.
1520
.phalaniṅ hulun āṅajī tutug, haṅavruhākǝn hanutuga bapa, hababu, tutugā malakya rabi, hanak ānak tutugā sanak, tutugākaki hanini, tutugāputu habuyut, tumus riṅ tǝmbe, habagus kalavanāyu, paripurṅnā, drәman keḍәp, suka sugih, śrī sadanā, mās maṇik, dodot lәmǝs, hakveh daśih , vәnaṅ vәnaṅ hasuku pat, hasuku ro, sugih tanyakna hiren, siddha saprayojñaṇā, siddha salampah salaku, lǝvih kapaṅgih riṅ tǝmbe pañjanman, lәvih kapaṅgih maṅke, bhagavan pañarikan hanulisākǝn, saṅ hyaṅ triyodaśa sākṣi
.hanakṣeni, bhaṭāra hyaṅ kabayan hañjǝnǝṅi.
.
.</p>
1525
.<p n="III.68">nihan kramaniṅ habrata riṅ śaśih, ka, 4, riṅpraṭipadā śukla, caru suci riṅ saṅgar, sadaṇdhanan sovaṅ, riṅ sor pupulāskar sataman, hnahakna riṅ harәpiṅ saṅ amujā, vu [15 r] sniṅ ābhakti, tinirtthan, tәhәr haṅupavaśā, sadinā sarātri, Ikaṅ pupulā mvaṅ skar sataman, tәhәr vvināveṅ paturvan pinajaṅ pajaṅan, mne riṅ dhavuh, 2, təkaniṅ dhavuh, 7, haṅarәpakna labahan sәga pitā, Ivak hitik ginoreṅ sahā sasahur, yan tan ānaniṅ Iṭik, hantiga kunaṅ, garәm, hantajinya, catūr daśa dinā, tan dadi hanapak rigǝd, hasidhǝmpati, ṅa .
.mne ri pūrṇamaniṅ kapat, yan āhyun āmūjā smarā, hinyasan tikaṅ yaśa riṅ pamarantyan pinajaṅ pajaṅān, huṅgvaniṅ ābrata, yan vala pitambharā, yan vrәddha śvetāmbharā, hamarәm pva saha parāgi, ryuvusniṅ hasuci hadyus, riṅ saṅgar, ca, rvaṅ daṅdhanan deñ jaṅkǝp sahā catur, limas āguṅ, hiseni sәga kuniṅ, hivak hiṭik ginoreṅ, vinaṅgun hurip, gegembon, ṅa, hantiga pinlut, kampuhi cicirupan, tañcǝbi skār tlǝṅ, tumpāṅana riṅ limas āguṅ, tetebhogan hiseni sәga kuniṅ, masasahur, mevak hiṭi [15 v]k ginoreṅ, vinaṅun hurip, lalamaka daluvaṅ, tulisi śvara vyañjana, riṅ hibu dṅǝn, caru madaṇdhanan sovaṅ deñ jaṅkǝp, caru riṅ sumur, tumpə̄ṅ, 1, lalampadan, sasamuhan tadhah pavitra, caru riṅ sor kadi hisiniṅ pasilih, tan kari pupulā, skār sstaman , tlasniṅ caru trapakna sirәmiṅa skār, lumkas dhaṅ gurv amūjā sūryya śevana, kadi ṅrahina, taṅ abhakti sūryya, candrā, saṅgar, Ibu, dhṅǝn, kabasə̄ṅ sumur, tiṅkahiṅ haṅabhakti, dukiṅ sore, tәṅah vәṅi, meh rahinā, vusnīṅ aṅabakti, kinonta dyus āsucya taṅ abrata, tәhәr hiṅaskaran sinaṇdhiṅan pras, tinirtthañ jinaya jaya, tlas.halabuhana brata, padamə̄l, sәga livәt, tiṅkahiṅ āṅlivәt, dhaṅdhaṅ tulisana padmā, vusniṅ ānajeni, syoknīṅ antiga tambhar, tutupi, yan vus matәṅ hnahana muṅgviṅ tapi, jinaya jaya, muvah jaṅan raratusan, sabhageyan molih, 108, vārṇna, paruko tulis padmā, Ikaṅ nasi linivǝt ti [16 r] numpaṅan gaṅan, muvah tumpǝṅ, hisenāna jǝbug ārūm, kaṅ vutuh, sadǝk, duk āṅaroni tinitisan madhu, phān, Ivaknya cārmmaniṅ kәbo yos baraṇā, hiṅǝmbanā don, mvaṅ jǝbug ārūm, sami rincah, tlas, nhǝr tan kneṅ turu, riṅ rahinanya, samaṅkana juga sakottamanya, satutugiṅ reh.kunaṅ phalanya, Ilaṅhikaṅ sarva vyaddhi, sarva duṣṭā, sarva bhāya, sarva bhoga kapaṅguh, kakarṣaṇa rikeṅ rāt, lituhayu paripurṇna, svārgga kapaṅgguh, mvaṅ kaniśreyaśan, dulurāna Ulah rahayu, tan paṅambah laraṅān, matvaṅ riṅ vvaṅātuhā, priyǝmbadā, tan vāk paruṣya, haglə̄m ataṅi, mabrataṅkǝn vei hayu, mvaṅ katpǝtaniṅ kasamyajñanan.
.
.</p>
1530
.<p n="III.69">madhū parkka tuyat bhakṣaṃ, sarva deva samanvitah, na sthama canarajñatva, sarva deva samānvitaṃ.
.
.Ikaṅ devata hana sanidva, ri saṅ hyaṅ madhū parkka, sira juga hidhpan raṣananta,
.
1535kadilihñca mahādeva, Artthanya, Ikaṅ madhū [16 v] viṣṇu devatanya, air tbhu brahmā devatanya, phan hiśvara devatanya, punti mahādeva devatānya.
.
.lavaṇo rudra mityuktaṃ, bhrәmgure sambhu mucyate, patraśvaṣā śivojñeyah, Ityetat devatāsthitah||
.
.hyaṅniṅ Uyah rudra, hyaṅniṅ bhrәm guru, hyaṅniṅ layaṅ sambhu, hyaṅniṅ lvā śiva, nihan taṅ devatā sanidya, hana riṅ madhū parkka.
1540
.vituh pāpa dahet sarpih, vituh pāpañca madhūkaṃ, svātipāpa dahet kṣiraṃ, gatraṃ pāpaṃ kadalisaṃ.
.
.Arthanya, Ilaṅ deniṅ air tbu pāpaniṅ bapa, kavisarjja denya, Ilaṅ deniṅ madhū parkka, pāpaniṅ babu, kavisarjja denya, Ilaṅ deniṅ phan, pāpaniṅ śarīranta, Ilaṅ deniṅ punti, pāpaniṅ vvaṅ sanakta kaḍaṅ varga, kavisarjja denya, mataṅyan kayatnakna deniṅ mantra madhū parkka, mā,
.Om̐ madhū pakaṃ Idhaṃ puṇyaṅ, pavitraṃ pāpanaśanaṃ, Iśvara nagisaṅśrәṣṭah, punanti sakalañjagat, mam̐, piṅ, 3, mamaṅan, piṅ, [17 r] 3, masucya.
1545
.saha pūja parikrama karәhǝn, tәhәr haṅupavaśā, vusniṅ pinūja, haṅabhakti kadi haṅabhāktiniṅ habrattā.
.
.ṅhadva kadva kādevye namah , pūr, Om̐ kusuma yudā mamakā devye namah , da, Om̐ kadārppa daśa paddha devye namah svāhā, pa, Om̐ manobhava strī mandha devye namah , bā, Om̐ makara dvajamandoratha devye namah svāhā, U, Om̐ mantra tatu bhaṅgā devye namah , ai.
.
1550Iti saṅ hyaṅ haṣṭa Devî.Om̐ hyaṅ hyaṅniṅ hyaṅ smara deva ya namah, Om̐ Indrā ya namah, Om̐ Om̐ svaṣṭi ya namah .
.
.pratyakṣatvamihaloka, mānuṣa tvañca visuka devatvaṃ, sūkṣmatvaṃ sakalatvañca, Atmatvañca śariratvaṅ.
.Eka rūpañca visuka sadanaṃ, candrā vatsa tetemekaṃ, trei lokya viyosa śakti.
.Iśvara vara devañca, brahmājāyañja vijayaṃ, mahādeva varatvañca, viṣṇu vijayare vañca.
1555Indra rājaca jayatvaṃ, sarva deva ya ratvañca, sarva de [17v]va Devî tatvaṃ, trelokya sevitantah.
.citta mani mahendraśca, sarva kumarā rājatvaṅ, kumara rāja sajñaccā, Iṣṭā kamacayaṅ jakaṃ.
.Aṣṭātanvavi patiñca, Ugra devā ca sajñakaṃ, sarva pāpa haret siddhi, sarva rogha praharaṇaṅ.sarva śatru vinaśanaṃ.
.
.smarastavā.
1560
.nihan kramaniṅ haśeva latri, hasūryya śevana kita rumuhun, kadi sadinā, huvusniṅ hasūryya śevana, mariṅ pamiyosan, haṅarәpakǝn pitā, yan tan hanāniṅ pitā, Ujuṅaniṅ pisaṅ glarәn, sucenā rumuhun, yan hananiṅ liṅga mās, salakā kuniṅ, pūjanǝn pratiṣṭa ri hujuṅaniṅ pisaṅ, makadi riṅ pitā, pūjanǝn riṅ kana, glarāna padmasana saprakāranya, təkaniṅ devā, pratiṣṭā, Utpǝtyakǝn bhaṭāra sakiṅ hrәddhaya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Am̐ Um̐ namah, Idhǝp saṅ hyaṅ muṅgviṅ liṅga, pūjāni vijā caṇdhana, sahā sminiṅ majā, skār kunǝṅ, muvah sthityakna bhaṭāra riṅ liṅgā, yan hananiṅ liṅga mās, salakā, yen ta[18 r]n hana salakā, sariniṅ vaduri piṅhe, gavenǝn liṅgākarā, mantra sthiti, Om̐ Am̐ Um̐ mam̐ namah, pūjani rvaniṅ maja, mvaṅ sarva skar, caṇdhana, vija, sabhagyan pujāniṅ dhupa, dipā, ghaṇṭa, mvaṅ japā ganitri, sahā praṇa yama, saha sǝmbah, liṅanta Om̐ Om̐ liṅgā liṅgā dipatayei namah, haturana gadhakṣata, puṣpa, dhūpā dhipa, mvaṅ caru, rakā vovohan, sәḍah voh, liṅanta haṅaturakǝn, Om̐ Om̐ śiva ni vedyañca rūm dadami, Amrәtta deva caruvedādami, sa ba ta A I, nama śiva ya, A U mā, Om̐.pūjā, piṅ, 3, dukiṅ sore pūrvaka, tәṅah vәṅi, mehniṅ rahina, deniṅ āmūjā, tan kantun mantra, Om̐ Om̐ liṅgā ye namah, Om̐ sadāśivāṅliṅgā ya namah. mehniṅ rahina, Ulihakna sira riṅ anta hrәddhaya, puṇdharikā muvah, liṅanta, Om̐ Atma liṅggā ya namah, Om̐ Om̐ Am̐ mam̐ namah,
.
.
.
1565
.yekiṅ mantra pralīṇā.
.Om̐ śiva ya śiva liṅga ya,śiva sarvvo maheśvarah, nama śiva ya deva ya, saddha śi[18 v]va namostute.brahmā viṣṇviśvaro devah, sarvajñā parameśvara, Utpati sthiti linañcah, liṅgā deva namo namah. tuṅgal sthiti sarәpiṅ praliṇā.
.
.
1570yen arәp śīva rātri cǝṇdhǝk, liṅanta,
.Om̐ Om̐ liṅgā liṅgādipataye namah, Om̐ Om̐ Ātma liṅgā ya namah, sǝmbah duk sore,
.Om̐ Om̐ parama śiva liṅgā ya namah, sǝmbah tәṅah vәṅi,
.Om̐ Om̐ śunya liṅgā ya namah, sǝmbah meh rahina,
.sminiṅ maja pinūjakǝn, sthuti tuṅgal, Om̐ nama śiva ya, namo rudra ya, nispadā parvvatā ya , sahā sǝmbah sminiṅ majā kunaṅ.
1575
.lviriṅ bratayvakna riṅ tamah, tamah harane turū, yatika kavaśakna yva lupā, I kālanta mabrata, hayva juga kita haturu ri rahina, hila hilā, hilaṅ hulihta mabrata, Asiṅ brata hanisphala tan pantukā Asiṅ sinadya, mataṅyan kayatnakna, hayvā himan iman, Ikaṅ tapā brata hagə̄ṅ phalanya, vahya suka katәmu donya, Ikaṅ kayogiśvarān, [19 r] kamokṣan phalanya, mataṅnyan hayo cumacadiṅ sira saṅ lumkasakǝn brata tapā, Ayva memeṅeniṅ vvaṅ abrata, Ila hilā liṅ saṅ hyaṅ.
.
.</p>
.
1580<p n="III.70">nihan pabratan, haji sariniṅ galuṅān, krama bantǝn ri saṅgar, bantǝn suci hadaṇdhanan, riṅ ibu dhṅǝn, padha mabuṅkul, riṅ toya habuṅkul, mantra paṅatǝr ā-tǝr bakti maṅavaṅi, ma, Om̐ jaya pravira subiṅ rāt, sugih tan pamaṅun gave, muvah hakaravaṅan, habaṅ rūpanira, sārәṅit gə̄ṅira, ya hiku sariniṅ galuṅan, pinakāsamtoniṅ hulun, siṅ tan vruh sariniṅ galuṅan,pinakā kavulaniṅ hulun, sabhūvana, satuṅkǝbiṅ rāt, siṅ haṅavruhi sariniṅ galuṅān, ya pinaka sanakiṅ hulun, pinakā samtoniṅ hulun, sasaṅoniṅ hulun, haṅavruhākǝn sarīniṅ galuṅan, salave lākṣa, salave kṭi, salave hiṅǝl, pinakā pasasaṅoniṅ hulun, katәmu maṅko, katәmu tǝmbe, lǝvih kā [19 v] tmu tǝmbe, mtu salākṣa sadinā, Om̐ sa ba ta A I, nama śiva ya, A U ma Om̐.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.71">nihan bratahañarin galuṅān, krama, yan kalaniṅ galuṅān, habantǝn sarimpǝn, saviji sovaṅ, hnahakna ri harәpiṅ saṅgar, kaṅ riṅ saṅgar, kadi kramaniṅ bantǝn kaṅ lagi lagi, kaṅ riṅ ību, kaṅ ri tәṅah, vuhāna burat vaṅi, lṅa vaṅi, mvaṅ bras, 2, catu, harttha, 225, pinūjā saparikrama, taṅābhakti, vusiṅ haṅabhakti, amaṅan sarimpǝn, ryuvusiṅ amaṅan sarimpǝn, amaṅan sakavaśa, pūjaniṅ amaṅan sarimpǝn, Om̐ paduka bhaṭārī sāriniṅ galuṅan, mānuṣanira kinavruhakǝn sāriniṅ galuṅan, haṅisǝp sariniṅ rahina, haṅisǝp sariniṅ vәṅi, haṅisǝp sariniṅ śrī sadanā, haṅisǝp sarva sarī, haṅisǝp sariniṅ rāt bhūvana kabeh, hulun vruhsariniṅ galuṅan, handadi ya bhujaṅgga lәvih, hakaḍaṅā ratu, suka sugih śarīraniṅ hulun, hanakāna keḍәp, [20r] haputu habuyut, tumus tumǝrus, təkaniṅ hanak putu buyutiṅ hulun, katəkana sapinakṣāniṅhulun, saṅ hyaṅ triyodaśa sakṣi, Anakṣeniṅ hulun, phalanya, siṅ karyyānta hanmu hayu, kinasihan deniṅ bhūṭā dṅǝn, mvaṅ jnǝk sahisiniṅ pomahan.
.

.

.</p>

1735

1740<p n="III.120">hana brata, maṅan pituṅ kpǝl, saptā latri lavasanya, guṇamogha dhataṅ, sarva viṣā tan kataman kita, yeka phalanya, catūr mukā ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

1745
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.122">hana brata, amaṅan saṅaṅ kpǝl, naṅkə̄n pūrṇama, mrәttiharā, ṅa, molihā tigaṅ kasaṅhā, pha, mantuk mariṅ svarga bhaṭāra Indrā, sasarnya mañjanma mariṅ vvaṅ
.listvayu paripurṇnā, sugih saṅkan rare.
1750
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.123">hana brata maṅan sadaśa kpǝl, tadhah pisan, sadaśa lek lavasanya, pha, salvirniṅ lara rogha tan tame kita, haṅadhavā ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.
.
1755</p>
.
.<p n="III.124">hana brata, haṅapitu, ṅa, amaṅan pituṅ kpǝl, moliha tigaṅ kapitu, pha, mantuk riṅ bhaṭāra brahmā, sasarnya majanma riṅ vvaṅ sugih saṅkan rare, listvayu paripurṇna.
.
.</p>
1760
.<p n="III.125">hana brata, naṅkǝn radite Umanis, amaṅan sǝga sa [25 v] kpǝl, [oliha] tluṅ radite Umanis, pha, tis manak ānak, trus tumus təkaniṅ ānak putu buyut, sukasugih tan kabañcana.
.
.</p>
.
1765<p n="III.126">hana bratañkul bañu, ṅa, kramanya, amaṅan sәga sakpǝl, sadina, beñjaṅanya rvaṅ kpǝl, puhanannya, 3, kpǝl, tlunanyā malabahan, ma, Om̐ niroghā, nirpāpa, nirmmāla, niṅ bape bu lukar mulih jati nityasā. amaṅan tan pahuyah, tan pahivak, kneṅ dyus kevalā, tan kneṅ lisah, tan kǝneṅ vdhak, tan paṅinūm tuvak, tan paṅinaṅ, tan paturu rahina, tan kabañcaran , pha, Ilaṅ salviriṅ larārogha.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.127">manih brata ñkul bañu, riṅ ckokiṅ taṅan paṅan sәga sakpǝl, toya sackokiṅ taṅan, tigaṅ dinā samayanya, sabagya, 5, dinā, ma, kbas valuya jati. pha, nirlāra vighna.
1770
.</p>

.<p n="III.128">hana bratañkul bañu, vadhah dadasar cmǝṅ, ma, Om̐ hana boloṅ tan pahudǝran, Ana boloṅ tan pamala, nirvighna nir ttaṅi [26 r]s, Ōm̐ śrī srī ya namah svāhā, Om̐ mam̐ ya namah svāhā.hamita ri saṅ āsәḍahan brata, ri saṅgar, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namah .
.
1775</p>
.
.<p n="III.129">hana bratañkul bañu, ṅa, amaṅan sacalovakaniṅ taṅan, pituṅ vәṅi samayanya, nasi kalavan bañu, ma, Om̐ nirroghā, nirpāpa nirbapebu, lukǝṅ mulih jatinyasah, lukar sapāpaniṅ śarīra, mvaṅ pāpaniṅ bapebu.

1780
.<p n="III.130">hana brata ñkul bañu, mañjiṅ limā, ṅa, puluṅ kaṅ sәkul, 1,
.Inumi bañu, 1, malih hamuluṅ sәkul, 1, hinūmi bañu, piṅ tlu hiṅane, raris amaṅan, sakarәpiṅ amaṅan vәnaṅ, vusaniṅ amaṅan, ṅinūm bañu, raris ākmuh havajik, haṅinaṅ, mari vtǝṅi voṅ, samaṅkana huga kramanya, saglǝmiṅ abrata, Utama lavasnya satahun, ma, Om̐ hana boloṅ tan pamala, hana boloṅ tan paUndǝrān, nirvighna nirttaṅis nirrogā, nirUpādravā, niṅ mala malinā, pha, hilaṅ sarva malā [26v]niṅ śarīranta, kinasihan deniṅ saṅ prabhu, mvaṅ deva sih iri kita.

1785<p n="III.131">hana brata ñkul bañu, ma, saṅ drәmba moha, maṅana riṅ pasar, saṅ kāla ṅadhaṅ, sira maṅana riṅ dalan guṅ, saṅ kāla katuṅ, sira maṅanā riṅ pajagalan, vusanirā amaṅan, muliha mariṅ rāga valunaniṅ hulun, rovaṅaniṅ hulun makaryyā hayu, Om̐ siddhi rastu.

1985<p n="III.172">hana brata, saninigrahā, ṅa, tan mamati haghni ri kālaniṅ tumpǝk kalivon[,] kramanyā ta mumujā, hananapuh eṅ saṅgar, tamvitā nǝmbahā ri bhaṭāra śīvaditya, lviriṅ caru riṅ saṅgar, Anapunar, Arih, rәmbaṅ, tambo lagu hakah haraka, phalā, kambaṅ vaṅi, burat vaṅi, lṅa vaṅī, sdhǝṅan Ikṣu, dhipā, dhūpa, den asaṅkǝp, devadarvi nasab, vijā, dhupa, Ika kahatur i bhaṭāra, ma, Om̐ namo bhagavatye vaśūdeva ya, sarva tuṣṭān, dadāsime, Om̐ śrī gurubhyo namah, devacarundādasimahātrәpti svāhā.
.
.
.tlas ta ṅavaṅiha ta kita, ma, Om̐ sūryya putra ya namah . samaṅkana taṅ brata lkasaknā, hayva ta pramadā riṅ brata, kunaṅ [32r] yan kalaṅan āgriṅ, sakalviraniṅ āṅalaṅana, pinakāvuruṅaniṅ brata, hayva pinakṣakǝn ikāṅ brata, kaliṅanya mvitana juga muvah, kunaṅ yan tan kalaṅanā, hanulus rahayu, pakṣakna hikā, pha, riṅ dlāhanta dadi ratu suka vaya katәmu, pinakāśraya deniṅ padhanta ratu, keḍәp kapintuhu deniṅ rat kabeh.
.
1990
.
.Iti sanibrata, kayatnakna de saṅ met hayu, ndan ikā hayva malәtuh Ikaṅ āmbǝk, mataṅyan ikā hayvā miṣya buddhi, tātkalanta maṅanakǝn brata, Apan yan tan karakṣa Ikaṅ brata denta, maṅdadyakǝn vighnaniṅ śarirā, yan Enak denta rumakṣa sarīra, makājñana buddhi mahottamā, malilaṅāhniṅ niravarāṇa, tan paglǝglǝh , tan karaktan karṇna sulā, mvaṅ rajah tamah, Ika ta maṅdadyakǝn svarga magə̄ṅ, ṅūniveh jñāna viśeṣā, vruha ri kramanira sovaṅ sovaṅ.
.
.</p>
1995
.<p n="III.173">hana brata sabran manis, ṅa, tan pamaṅan tampakiṅ āpuy, rvaṅ vulan samaya [32v]nya,
.sabran pahiṅ tan pamaṅan tampakiṅ aghni, rvaṅ vulan samayanya,
.sabran pon tan padus tan palәṅhā, tan pararavup, tan pakәkmuh, rvaṅ vulan samayanya,
.sabran vage, tan paturu gumuliṅ, rvaṅ vulan samayānya,
2000sabran kalivon, tan paṅūcap ūcap, rvaṅ vulan samayanya,
.
.pha, ginañjar deniṅ vatǝk devata kabeh, norana nūkrәttani, tan ilaṅ takonaknā, drәventa tǝmbe.
.
.</p>
2005
.<p n="III.174">nihan haji pabrata, yaniṅ taṅgal piṅ lima, hanuju kalivon, paṅūpāvaśa ,
.Esuknya riṅ manis, amaṅan kupat pāṇdhava, 5, Ivaknya kacaṅ, pha, dukiṅ halit duruṅ ānmu, yan vus āgə̄ṅ hamaṅgih suka sugih haguṅ dunya.
.
.
2010pa, amaṅan kupat syāṅ anti, 9, Ivaknya komak, pha, tinuṅgu deniṅ rāma reṇā, haṅantos haputu habuyut, kinadhama deniṅ bapebu, kapti ni hulun.
.
.
.pva, amaṅan kupat sidayu, 7, Ivaknya sudhaṅ, pha, haṅāpti listvayu, halit ārampiṅ [33r] haṅlәlǝnte, tan āmadhani, suka sugih drәmman baṅkit, pinarәkan pinakāpahulunaniṅ marū .
.
2015va, amaṅan kupat sih tan pәgat, 4, Ivaknya taluh, pha, haṅapti suka sugih, drәmman sidi baṅkit, keḍәpiṅ alaki, tan kavaśa lakinta haṅluṅhani, pinūji deniṅ matva, tanāna ṅesǝmi.
.
.
.
.ka, handha kupat gnǝp, 8, Ivaknya raraśmen , pha, haṅapti suka sugih haguṅ viryya, hañjǝnǝṅ hardda nareśvarī, keḍәp āṅūcap. .</p>
2230
.<p n="III.230">hana brata, amaṅan tur ambaṅkit, bhaṭārī keḍәp hyaṅniṅ brata, ṅgonaniṅ amimiti, riṅ pavon, punaṅ kininaṅ sәḍah sapon de [40r] n tuvuh, lalamak lampuyaṅ, tan pamaṅan tan paṅinaṅ, yan tan panggugut lampuyaṅ, pha, vavadon tan pagigilutan, keḍәp malaki.
.
.</p>
.
2235<p n="III.231">hana brata, amaṅan katambat tigaṅ bulih, naṅkǝn kalivon, tan pamaṅan paran paran, pituṅ kalivon samayanya, pha, apәkik tur lǝmǝsiṅ rambut.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.232">hana brata, ambhūmi lәpa, ṅa, amaṅan jaṅaniṅ lǝlǝpa kabeh, salek lavasnya, bhaṭāra Iśvara maveh brata, pha, kinasihaniṅ svami, keḍәp alaki, kinasihaniṅ
2240hyaṅ.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.233">hana brata, amaṅana mimba, salek lavasnya, pha, athāravit.</p>
2245
.<p n="III.234">hana brata, sarva tatā, ṅa, amaṅan luṅggahiṅ gaṇḍa rusa kәliṅ, mvaṅ campaka garus, bhaṭāra śambhu hyaṅnya, pha, mulih[,] riṅ svarga bhaṭāra guru, mvaṅ riṅ bhaṭāra śiva.
.
.</p>
.
2250<p n="III.235">hana brata, vījāharā, ṅa, amaṅan vīja rumuhun, saha pucukiṅ gaṇḍa rusa, pucukiṅ alaṅ-alaṅ, pha, prajñan kita, sihaniṅ istrī.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.236">hana brata, maṅan sarva luṅgah luṅgahan, pucukiṅ dukut
2255[40v] lәpas, pucukiṅ alaṅ-alaṅ, tuñjuṅ, vija tәluṅ jumput, sapta rātri pituṅ dina lavasanya, siddha kārya saphalanya, Amūrva ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.237">hana brata ṅantavali, ṅa, amaṅan hantavali , pañjaṅnya salǝṅkat madhya, pituṅ tumpǝk kalivon patәlasanya, mirica pituṅ viji, ligundi pituṅ muñcuk, pha, salara vighna hilaṅ donya, sojarira keḍәp, !...! katәmu maṅke mvaṅ dlāha.
2260
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.238">hana brata nirambu , ṅa, tan pamaṅan sarva binumbon , satahun lavasnya, pha, mulih mariṅ svarga bhaṭāra rūdra, sasarnya majanma ri listvayu, apәkik prajurit.
.
2265</p>
.
.<p n="III.239">hana brata, amaṅan kәtan baṅ[,] pituṅ vәṅi, hirәṅ pituṅ vәṅi, ivaknya sarva śuci, arariṅ śakti, ṅa, bhagavān paraśara hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, akadaṅ voṅ pәkik.
.
.</p>
2270
.<p n="III.240">hana brata, maṅan kәtan[,] ya taṅkǝp , voṅ tuṅgal tuṅgal riṅ kalivon, 7, hǝmbanya phala, sahaṅ, mәñan, aṅgara kaśih amaṅan, 7, alaṇdhyan, sira saṅ hyaṅ asihiṅ prāṇa [41r] turunābrata, ginañjaran śakti lima, pha, suka sugih, sapatinya vәnaṅ.

.</p>
.
2275<p n="III.241">hana brata, anila, ṅa, amaṅan kәtan hirәṅ, satahun samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasarnya majanma riṅ mantrī.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.242">hana brata, murāṇa, ṅa, amaṅan ñahñah lan gula tәbu, lamanya tigaṅ dina, pha, tan kataman siṅ saparanta.</p>
2280
.<p n="III.243">Hana brata, maṅan tan dady akarvan, pituṅ lek lavasnya, suka magə̄ṅ phalanya, eka patra ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.</p>
.
.<p n="III.244">hana brata, tan kapadan, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan pakǝmbulan, aduluran pañcamuna, sahuripnya riṅ amaṅan, alalab roṇḍon, mvaṅ kǝmbhaṅ, uttamaniṅ brata kabeh, pha, tan kapadan viśeṣa, maṅkana polahira saṅ viku
.tәmǝn tәmǝn.
2285</p>
.

.
.<p n="III.246">hana brata, aṅajum , ṅa, amaṅan riṅ va[41v]ton salek lavasnya, bhaṭāra mahādeva maveh brata, pha, tәka atuduhiṅ paliṅgihan, keḍәp tәka ruruṅeniṅ voṅ. </p>
2290

2295<p n="III.249">hana brata, naṅkə̄nāra, ṅa, yan amaṅan aṅagǝm jinah, 7, salek samayanya, saṅ hyaṅ rūdra hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, akәlar tan kәneṅ śrī kita.

2305<p n="III.252">hana brata, amaṅan kupat pāṇḍava, 3, paṅanǝn esuk, [42r] 1, paṅanǝn tәṅah ṅve , 1, paṅanǝn sore, 1, pha, rinakṣa deniṅ rāt, kinasavitan deniṅ sama janma, hajana livavaktayanya, tan pamuruṅ polihnya.

2330

2335<p n="III.261">hana brata ṅālamuñə̄ṅ, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ lәbur jagat sira turunābrata, ginañjaran śakti lima, voṅ tuṅgal sakvehiṅ sira abrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakalakon, vastu rahayu, lanaṅ vadon suka sugih drәman keḍәp.</p>
.

2340

.

2345</p>

2360
.<p n="III.271">hana brata, ṅapitu, ṅa, naṅkǝn dvadaśi śukla pakṣaniṅ kapitu, aṅupavaśa, bhaṭāra bhīma hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ bam̐ bhīmā ya namah, pamit, pha, viryavan kapintuhu deniṅ rāt, sugih mās pirak, hulun putra vrәddhi, siddha sakāryanta.</p>

2380

2385<p n="III.279">hana brata, aṅliṅga pәraṅ, ṅa, yan amaṅan asaṇḍiṅ duhuṅ, bhaṭāra rūdra hyaṅiṅ brata, pha, Akveh vvaṅ tumaṅgalaṅ asih iri kita.

.<p n="III.280">hana brata, aṅubi, ṅa, amaṅan aṅinum bañu rumuhun, huvusiṅ amaṅan, tan vәnaṅ aṅucap lavan voṅ, pha, akәlar, suka sugih, tan kǝna gәriṅ, tan sasar kapintuhu deniṅ rāt.</p>
2390
.<p n="III.281">hana brata, maṅan tan pembuh, tan paṅinum bañu, pha, śakti kiteṅ ri niṣkala , [44v] lavasnya sagәlǝmiṅ abrata, saṅ hyaṅ dura dasih hyaṅnya, tatkālaniṅ abrata, tan paturviṅ rahina , [pha,] apaḍaṅ riṅ rūpa, apaḍaṅ kaṅ ati, kinasihaniṅ rat.</p>
.
.<p n="III.282">hana brata, ñәkul bañu, [ṅa,] tan pamaṅan sәga sadina, tan paturviṅ rahina vәṅi, aṅayapakǝn tәkeṅ polihnya, añjanma hayu, ma, rāga śūnya mahiśi taya, amaṅan sәga satatak, siniratiṅ toya añar, pamit, vus mapamit, madahar, sakantunanya, hayva mañapuhaṅ.</p>
.
2395<p n="III.283">hana brata ñәkul bañu, mañjiṅ lima ṅaranya, kavaśa amaṅan suruh, maṅan sәkul inumi toya, sәga sakәpǝl tinatak ri lәpa lәpaniṅ taṅan, vәnaṅ inumi bañu sabran sore, lavasiṅ abrata, satavun, yan kavaśa, mokṣa salviriṅ lara, vighnaniṅ śarīra Ilaṅ donya.</p>
.
.<p n="III.284">hana brata, tan paṅinum vvai, tatkāla savuku galuṅan, Aṅhiṅ tāmaṅan antiga binǝṅdhǝm, harәpiṅ dhәṅǝn, sambi aṅadǝg tәṅaṅ ṅve tatkāla guṅe, Arddhaṇa bhaṭāra mrәtyu, phalanya kәdhuk timbul, tutug tumu[45r]vuh, puruṣa viśeṣa, śakti vani, kineriṅan deniṅ jagat, labdha vara gragaluṅān.</p>
.
.<p n="III.285">hana brata, aṅambaṅ, ṅa, yan amaṅan kinambaṅakәn riṅ bañu, satavun samayanya, bhaṭāra viṣṇu maveh brata, pha, mañjanma riṅ kaḍaṅ ajī, sugih vәsi, tūr keḍәp kavi prajurit.</p>
2400
.<p n="III.286">nyan ta saṅ citta varaṇā, umarah [ri] saṅ vala kula, mūla tattvaniṅ dadi kabeh, pahenak paṅrәṅə̄nta, mūlabhoktaniṅ kanirāśrayan, mvaṅ kābhyudayan, bhāvanya mvaṅ lakṣaṇanya, pūrvanya mvaṅ vәkasnya, maṅkana liṅ saṅ vala kula, nǝmbah hulun, Om̐ viku satakvan[,] tānaku, kita pva siksa ṅaran ika, duga-duga tumakvan, vuvus maṅkana, rәṅə̄n siptan i ṅhulun.

2435<p n="III.287">hana brata, ambhairava pakṣa, siṅ pinaṅan, tuhun tan trәṣṇeṅ turu, bhaṭāra pavakānugrahani, mvaṅ devata, [pha,] bhūta gandharva masih, janmanya puruṣa viśeṣa, subhaga hanulus, ajrih kaṅ sarva galak.</p>
.
.<p n="III.288">hana brata, tan paṅgilani sarva ti[46 v]naḍah, sambarana , ṅa, pha, viryavan siddha sugih saṅkan rare.</p>
.
.<p n="III.289">hana brata, ṅarәṅ, ṅa, amaṅan harәṅ rumuhun[,] bhaṭārī gaṅga hyaṅniṅ brata, ma, Om̐ gaṅgā ya namah, salek samayanya, pha, apәkik kerәṅan deniṅ jagat.</p>
2440
.<p n="III.290">hana brata, yan amaṅan maivak harәṅ tumpə̄r, pәtaṅ tavun samayanya, pha, keḍәp riṅ samanta janma, kinasihaniṅ rāt, keḍәpiṅ arabi anak anak. </p>
.
.<p n="III.291">hana brata, maṅan apisan, pituṅ lek pituṅ vәṅi samayanya, pha, kinasihaniṅ rāt.</p>
.
2445<p n="III.292">hana brata nitīkrama, ṅa, amaṅan sadina sapisan, saṅ hyaṅ smara hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, siṅ prih meṅgal katәmu, dirghyuṣa. </p>
.
.<p n="III.293">nahan brata, maṅan piṅ saptami, pituṅ lek samayanya, kinasihaniṅ rāt phalanya.</p>
.
.<p n="III.294">hana brata, ambhūmi amasar bhuvana, ṅa, pha, sugih lәmah sīma. </p>
2450
.<p n="III.295">hana brata, maṅaniṅ lәmah, pituṅ śaśih lavasnya, kinasihaniṅ rāt phalanya, bhūmi ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.</p>
.
.<p n="III.296">hana brata, mañcavara, ṅa, U, marәp maṅe[47r]tan amaṅan, pa, marәp kidul amaṅan. pva, marәp aṅulon. va, marәp aṅalor amaṅan. ka, siṅ harәpira maṅan, duluranya lalab kabeh, mvaṅ kǝmbaṅ hanūt kadi varṇaniṅ sәga, pañcavarṇa, putih kuniṅ abaṅ Irәṅ, riṅ teṅah pañcavarṇa, deva rata hyaṅnya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga pada bhaṭāra śiva, !pamit!, ma, Om̐ Om̐ śrī jagat guru paduke bhyo namah ||0| sasarnya mañjanma rata añakravr̥tti, tan kapadhān. </p>
.
2455<p n="III.297">hana brata, mañca vara dalәm, ṅa, kramanya, amaṅan uyah kevala, amaṅan sәkul kevala, salek tәluṅ dina samayanya, vus maṅkana, ulam kevala, vus maṅkana, toya kevala, vus maṅkana, aṅinaṅ kevala, vus maṅkana lavasnya, kәneṅ paṅan, tan kәneṅ turu, samaṅkana lavasnya, saṅ hyaṅ vәkasiṅ anuṅku rāt hyaṅnya ikaṅ brata, tan upir upir sukanta, mantuk riṅ svargan bhaṭāra dharma, janmanya suka maṅan aṅaṅgur, tan aṅhel panambut gave, suka sugih tan pasaṅkan, kaṅ vvaṅ masih deva bikṣuka, muleh iri [47v] kita.|</p>
.
.<p n="III.298">hana brata, luhuriṅ kayu, ṅa, tigaṅ lek samayanya, pha, vrәddhi putra, tur keḍәp siṅ paṅucap.
.
.</p>
2460
.<p n="III.299">hana brata, aturu luhuriṅ kayu, salek divasanya, pha, śakti kasiddhyan kapaṅguh.</p>
.
.<p n="III.300">hana brata, aṅalasa , ṅa, asaṅidaniṅ alas savәguṅ, tan papasa deniṅ voṅ, ṅuniveh sarva sato, asǝp, pha, prajurit riṅ paravu, aṅuṅgahana bahanya, va, harәṅ prajurit riṅ darāt luṅguhana vatu, [devatanya] saṅ buddha subrata, sasarnya dam puvavaṅ riṅ paravu, sugih savah, tur sugih paravu.</p>
.
2465<p n="III.301">hana brata, ṅraka sabran tilәm mvaṅ pūrṇama, sarva putus, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ silih asih maveh brata, pha, tinuṅgviṅ rāma reṇa, suka sugih prih avak, tur tan paṅubiṅ voṅ atuha.</p>
.
.<p n="III.302">hana brata, maṅan gǝḍaṅ tan kinulitan, tәluṅ vәṅi samayanya, saṅ hyaṅ murṣita hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, apәkik, yen istri mǝṅgǝpiṅ pahyunan, abәcikiṅ buddhi, vruhiṅ kaliṅanya, pituturiṅ bapebu.</p>
.
.<p n="III.303">hana brata, maṅan tuhuṅ pitpit rumuhun, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik [48r]muñcar, ṅaraniṅ brata, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik aṅuñci pǝpǝt sira turunābrata, pinakabaghā, pinakarūpa, paṅadǝganiṅ vavadon, pinakalistvayu, [pha] drәman manis ta kita, lindihǝn voṅ apәkik, drәman anak anak, aputu riṅ niṣkala.</p>
2470
.<p n="III.304">hana brata, ṅgilir kacaṅ, ṅa, kramanya, aṅuvāsa savәguṅ, amaṅan savәguṅ, hyaṅ prajā sadā hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, mantuk riṅ svargan bhaṭāra Iśvara, sasarnya mañjanma suka sugih, lәvih anulus, yan lanaṅ puruṣa kula pratyakṣa anurāga kita, sugih pisis riṅ dlāha, yan istri samaṅkana.</p>
.
.<p n="III.305">hana brata, yan amaṅan sinaren kasumba, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik pari rāja, ṅa, hyaṅ maṇik teja bhūmi turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakarah-dagiṅ, pinakahati, [pha,] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, suka sugih, listvayu, sәkar analum, akǝmbaṅ avoh riṅ niṣkala.
.
2475</p>
.
.<p n="III.306">hana brata, maṅan sәkul sapuluṅ, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik tampa, ṅaraniṅ brata, saṅ hyaṅ maṇḍala hyaṅniṅ brata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakakukusaniṅ śarīra, [pha,] asǝsǝkan kanakāguṅ, kalavan alit, aśrī a[48v]sambaṅ jarijya, siddhaniṅ vvaṅ suka sugih, tan pәgat sādhana, mvaṅ mās maṇik, kinanti jagat kinanti japa kita riṅ dlāha.</p>
.
.<p n="III.307">hana brata, maṅān sәkul putih kuniṅ, aṅkǝn kalivon, humārәp purvva, mevaka bhīra, paṅan pisan saṅaṅ kalivon divasanya, Uttamā saṅaṅ vulan, bhaṭāra śiva hyaṅniṅ brata, papalihan hyaṅ antadeva, ya pinakarūpa , pinakasamūha , pinakadirgha yuṣa, yan lanaṅ pinakapәkikan, pinakapolah , pinakararas , yan vadon pinakakahayon pinakapolah , pinakahibon , pha, mulihiṅ svarga bhaṭāra śiva, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ prabhu añakravarti, viku, bhujaṅga, śeva sogata, sugih malǝṅkә riṅ mās pirak, sarva sosoca , rare, hulun, kәbo sapi, mrәgādi, vrәddhi putra, tinuṅgviṅ bapebu, kaki nini, ma, Om̐ hram̐ hrim̐ sah parāmaśivāditya ya namah, ahyas.</p>
2480
.<p n="III.308">hana brata, amiśe[49r]ṣa, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan pahupa, anlasana sәkul, yan vus kinurәn kurәn, ma, Atma tuturakәna mariṅ bhaṭāra viśeṣa, umuṅguh riṅ vindu nadha, sakāla niṣkāla, viśeṣa bhaṭāra baja, maty aturu, maty aluṅguh, maty aṅadǝg, lәsālәyǝp, pavak tan paśarīra sakāla niṣkāla.</p>
.
.<p n="III.309">hana brata, nūtakǝn saśila bhaṭāra gaṇa, amuṣpa gaṇa, ṅa, yan amaṅan sәga nǝm kǝpǝl, sarahina, tiṅkahiṅ amaṅan, śīla gaṇā, nǝm vulan samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ bhaṭāra guru, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ viku Ijo, śakti dūra darśana, sojar ira keḍǝp.</p>
.
2485<p n="III.310">hana brata, maṅan sәga sinaṅga ri taṅan kiva, tan patәdha tan patambǝh, tan apilih ivaknya, Apan mayoni, ṅa, hyaṅ siddhi narasiṅha turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa , pinakalaku , [pha,] siddhaniṅ vaṅ anambadani śabda, sihniṅ rāt, ma, Om̐ Om̐ siddhi kāraṇa ya namah svāhā, yan ahyas.</p>
.
.<p n="III.311">hana brata, jaṅga varṇa, ṅa, amaṅan [49v] sәga balaka, pituṅ dina lavasnya mābhyāsa, pha, keḍәp savuvusta deniṅ rāt, prajñan vicakṣaṇa, biṣa gamǝl aṅiduṅ.
.
.</p>
2490
.<p n="III.312">hana brata, jaga śatru, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ saptanala hyaṅniṅ brata, kramanya, taṅgal pisan piṅ ro tәmu taṅgal piṅ pitu, lamun huvus sumurup vulan juga kita vәnaṅ aturu, livat saṅkeṅ taṅgal piṅ pitu, sakarәptāturu, maṅkāneṅ krәṣṇa pakṣa, lamun mәtu vulan juga kita turu, livat saṅke rika, sakarәpta turu, pha, riṅ dadi vvaṅ sugih, tan hana nuskr̥ta , riṅ niṣkāla.
.
.</p>
.
2495<p n="III.313">hana brata, mūrāba, ṅa, maṅlәkasa taṅgaliṅ kapat mabrata, maṅana purāṇa, kǝmbaṅ nāgasāri, kulalaṭa, malabahaniṅ pūrṇama , polihnyāpәkik hayu tan pasiriṅ, ma, Om̐ smara ya namah, yan ahyas.</p>
.
.<p n="III.314">hana brata, taṅgal piṅ savlas, Atikukus, ṅa, phalanya virya, drәman anulus.
.
.</p>
2500
.<p n="III.315">hana brata, maṅan aronāron, ulam kalapa binakar, lima vәlas dina divasanya, saṅ hyaṅ viśeṣa hyaṅ[50r]niṅ brata, pha, abәcik kaṅ hulon.
.
.</p>
.
2505<p n="III.316">hana brata, amaṅan tan paron, pituṅ lek divasanya, pha, siddhakārya, jaya patra ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana. </p>
.
.<p n="III.317">hana brata, ṅavaśakәn sakvehiṅ brata, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra Umapati, [pha,] janmanya prabhu añakravartti, viku śakti bahu sikṣa, labdha vara subhaga.</p>
.
.<p n="III.318">hana brata, kadi rare, tan kinatәṅǝtakәn , pha, tan pavali valyañjanma kita, sasarnya dadi ratu. </p>
2510
.<p n="III.319">nihan brata, amati agni , asisirih, 3, dina, tan pamaṅan sakalvirnya, tutug 3, dina, alabahan, tur tīrthanana, pha, hilaṅ pāpa kleṣaniṅ śarīra.
.
.</p>
.
2515<p n="III.320">hana brata, amaṅan sǝsǝdhǝp rumuhun, pituṅ tavun divasanya, bhaṭārī vastu hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, keḍәpiṅ rāt.</p>
.
.<p n="III.321">hana brata, maṅan mevak uyah harәṅ, pha, keḍәp riṅ rāt, kineriṅan deniṅ bhuvana, kinajrihaniṅ śatru.
.
.</p>
2520
.<p n="III.322">Ana brata, mamaṅan catur varṇa, limaṅ vәṅi lavasanya, prajña śakti phalanika, tәhǝr kinasihaniṅ rāt, Apurvva kita, sakabdhu [50v] ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.
.
.</p>
.
2525<p n="III.323">hana brata maṅan riyana, 5, tәluṅ lek lavasnya, pha, halus jarijinta, niromanira.</p>
.
.<p n="III.324">hana brata, ṅantara, ṅa, maṅan tṅaṅ ve , tәṅah vәṅi, tigaṅ lek lavasnya mabhyāsa, pha, śakti saturasta, suka magə̄ṅ.</p>
.
.<p n="III.325">hana brata, maṅan pituṅ kәpǝl, sadina, pituṅ rahina samayanya, mabrata, catur ṅaraniṅ brata, [pha] riṅ dadi vvaṅ sarva vәsi tan tumamāhi śariranta, riṅ niṣkāla.</p>
2530
.<p n="III.326">hana brata, yan amaṅan tan paluṅguh, saṅ hyaṅ hayu maveh brata, saṅ hyaṅ laku laku haraniṅ brata, ya pinakarūpa hayu raspati, [pha] suka riṅ lakunta, lәbur tampakta aśri iṅiriṅan, deniṅ pavoṅan, siddhaniṅ vvaṅ suka sugih, amūkti sāriniṅ kaḍaton, kita riṅ dlāha.</p>
.
.<p n="III.327">hana brata, amadhapa, ṅa, amaṅan riṅ paṅkon, malamak patra, saṅ hyaṅ sūkṣma maveh brata, phalanya sapolahta pantǝs, tan pәgat sihniṅ malakya rabi, salek samayanya, ma, Om̐ sūkṣma ya namah, pamit.
.
2535</p>
.
.<p n="III.328">hana brata, tan pa[51 r]maṅan sarvāmbǝkan, naṅkǝn pon, mvaṅ kalivon, pha, keḍәpiṅ rāt.</p>
.
.<p n="III.329">hana brata, yan amaṅan aṅilo riṅ pahesan, naṅkǝn pūrṇama, satavun divasanya, pha, mañjanma riṅ kabayan buyut sugih.</p>
2540
.<p n="III.330">nihan aji rambut, amaṅan sәga hirәṅ, naṅkǝn caturthi, śukla pakṣa, ma, hulun aṅaji rambut, tan abaṅ, tan ana raṅraṅ, tan ana putih, sәlǝm abuluniṅ gagak, adava, alambas, atәtәl, ṅkon rambutin hulun, katәmu maṅko, lәvih kaṅ tǝmbe hulun aṅaji rambut, vastu hulun aṅaji rambut, Om̐ sa ba ta A I namā śiva ya.</p>
.
.<p n="III.331">hana brata, mona mūjā, pha, deva masih iri kita. </p>
.
2545<p n="III.332">hana brata, mona, ṅa, yan aṅisiṅ, yan ahuyuh, yan adyus, yan alәlәṅa, yan abasahan, yan lumaku, pituṅ lek samayanya, bhaṭāra śiva maveh brata, sasarnya sugih duve, sugih vәka, tur keḍәp, mañjanma riṅ mantrī.</p>
.
.<p>I śaka, 1722. Vei, ka, vrә, vara mrakih, praṭipadā [51 v] riṅ śukla pakṣa, Asuji maśa, rah, 2, tǝṅgǝk, 2. I rika divasanya, pūrṇna linikhita. </p>
.
.
2550
.</div>
.
.<!-- Mon 29 Desember 2025-->
.

hana brata yan amaṅan anūtakǝn vulan ... śiṣya təka] In P the title of the brata, mantra, and result is same with other witnesses, but tend to different in the technique to perform the observance. This is the complete passage of the ms P. "hana bratā hañutakәn hulan·, yan hamaṅan taṅgal hapisan·, sakәpәl·, taṁ, 2, rvaṁ kәpәl·, muṅga- -ḥ sakәpәl· sadinā, tәkāniṁ taṅgal·, piṁ, 14, pūṛnama hamr̥ti, yan paṅloṁ hapisan·, piṁ, 14, sinuddhana sakәpәl·, tәkaniṁ til̥- -m hamr̥ti, tigaṁ lek· ṣamayanya, bhaṭārendra hyaṁnya, ma, Ōm̐ surendra ya namaḥ, pamit·. phalanya mantukiṁ bhaṭāra śivā, sasaṛnya mañjanmā riṁ ratu, mvaṁ riṁ vikva bhavu siṣyā kitā." G U in III.26 M N P in III.29 mañjanma M N

mva Gbhaṭāra M N
